tika-abh03t:5_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ desento bhagavā yasmiṃ samaye desesi, taṃ samayaṃ dassetuṃ, vibhaṅgānantaraṃ
tika-abh03t:5_1: desitassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vā “aṭṭhārasahī”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-abh03t:5_3: samudayappahānapariññāvasena khandhamārassa, maccumārassa ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā
tika-abh03t:5_4: parūpanissayarahitaṃ niratisayaṃ taṃ bhañjanaṃ upādāya bhagavā eva “mārabhañjano”ti
tika-abh03t:5_5: thomito. Tattha māre abhañjesi, mārabhañjanaṃ vā etassa, na pararājādibhañjananti
tika-abh03t:6_0: Khandhādayo araṇantā dhammā sabhāvaṭṭhena dhātuyo, abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
tika-abh03t:6_1: vāti katvā tesaṃ kathanato imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathāti adhivacanaṃ. Yadipi aññesu
tika-abh03t:6_2: ca pakaraṇesu te sabhāvā kathitā, ettha pana tesaṃ sabbesaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīsu cuddasasu
tika-abh03t:6_3: nayesu ekekasmiṃ kathitattā sātisayaṃ kathananti idameva evaṃnāmakaṃ. Ekadesakathanameva
tika-abh03t:6_4: hi aññattha katanti. Khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā khandhādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādayo
tika-abh03t:6_5: nayā vuttāti tattha mahāvisayānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena dhātūhi kathā dhātukathāti evaṃ
tika-abh03t:6_6: assa nāmaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Dvidhā tidhā chadhā aṭṭhārasadhāti anekadhā dhātubhedaṃ
tika-abh03t:6_7: pakāsesīti dhātubhedappakāsanoti. Tassatthanti tassā dhātukathāya atthaṃ. A-kāre
tika-abh03t:6_8: ā-kārassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. “Yaṃ dhātukatha”nti vā ettha pakaraṇanti vacanaseso sattannaṃ
tika-abh03t:6_9: pakaraṇānaṃ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattāti tena yojanaṃ katvā tassa pakaraṇassa atthaṃ
tika-abh03t:6_10: tassatthanti a-kāralopo vā. Tanti taṃ dīpanaṃ suṇātha, taṃ vā atthaṃ taṃdīpanavacanasavanena
tika-abh03t:6_11: upadhārethāti attho. Samāhitāti nānākiccehi avikkhittacittā, attano citte āhitāti vā attho.
tika-abh03t:10_0: 1. Ko panetassa pakaraṇassa paricchedoti? Na so idha vattabbo, aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pakaraṇaparicchedo
tika-abh03t:10_1: vutto evāti dassento āha “cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vutta”nti. Khandhādīnaṃ desanā
tika-abh03t:10_2: nīyati pavattīyati etehi, khandhādayo eva vā nīyanti ñāyanti etehi pakārehīti nayā,
tika-abh03t:10_3: nayānaṃ mātikā uddeso, nayā eva vā mātikāti nayamātikā. Etesaṃ padānaṃ mūlabhūtattāti
tika-abh03t:12_1: ca yesu dvādasasu aṅgesu paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaddo vattati, tadatthāni dvādasa
tika-abh03t:12_2: padāni dassitānīti tesaṃ tathādassitānaṃ sarūpeneva dassitānaṃ phassādīnañca padānaṃ
tika-abh03t:12_3: vasena āha “pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā”ti. Tattha kammupapattikāmabhavādīnaṃ idha
tika-abh03t:12_4: vibhattānaṃ bhāvanabhavanabhāvena bhave viya sokādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇassa viya aniṭṭhattā
tika-abh03t:12_5: tannidānadukkhabhāvena ca jarāmaraṇe antogadhatāya paṭiccasamuppādassa dvādasapadatā
tika-abh03t:12_6: daṭṭhabbā. Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ bhinditvā avissajjitānampi satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ bhinditvā
tika-abh03t:12_7: gahaṇaṃ karonto tesaṃ bhinditvāpi vissajjitabbataṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:13_0: Nayamātikādikā lakkhaṇamātikantā mātikā pakaraṇantarāsādhāraṇatāya dhātukathāya mātikā
tika-abh03t:13_1: nāma, tassā abbhantare vutto vibhajitabbānaṃ uddeso abbhantaramātikā nāmāti imamatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:13_2: pakāsento “ayañhī”tiādimāha. Tattha evaṃ avatvāti yathā “sabbāpi…pe… mātikā”ti ayaṃ
tika-abh03t:13_3: dhātukathāmātikato bahiddhā vuttā, evaṃ avatvāti attho. Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti
tika-abh03t:13_4: ca dhātukathāmātikāya abbhantareyevāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tadāveṇikamātikāabbhantare
tika-abh03t:13_5: hi ṭhapitā tassāyeva abbhantare ṭhapitāti vuttā. Atha vā evaṃ avatvāti yathā “sabbāpi…pe…
tika-abh03t:13_6: mātikā”ti etena vacanena dhātukathāto bahibhūtā kusalādiaraṇantā mātikā pakaraṇantaragatā
tika-abh03t:13_7: vuttā, evaṃ avatvāti attho. Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca imassa pakaraṇassa abbhantare
tika-abh03t:13_8: eva sarūpato dassetvā ṭhapitattāti attho. Sabbassa abhidhammassa mātikāya asaṅgahitattā
tika-abh03t:15_1: uddeso nayamukhamātikā. Cuddasapi hi saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogānaṃ vomissakatāvasena
tika-abh03t:15_2: pavattāti yehi te cattāropi honti, te dhammā cuddasannampi nayānaṃ mukhāni hontīti.
tika-abh03t:15_3: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadādīsu saccādīhipi yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgaho yadipi
tika-abh03t:15_4: vutto, so pana saṅgāhakabhūtehi tehi vutto, na saṅgahabhūtehi, sopi “cakkhāyatanena
tika-abh03t:15_5: ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”tiādinā pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhāre
tika-abh03t:15_6: tatthāpi khandhādīheva saṅgahehi niyametvā vutto, tasmā “tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho”ti
tika-abh03t:15_7: vuttaṃ. Pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhārepi pana pucchāvissajjanesu ca rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:15_8: araṇantānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sampayogavippayogā catūheva khandhehi hontīti “catūhi
tika-abh03t:16_0: Nanu ca vippayogo rūpanibbānehipi hoti, kasmā “catūhi vippayogo”ti vuttanti? Rūpanibbānehi
tika-abh03t:16_1: bhavantassapi catūheva bhāvato. Na hi rūpaṃ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh03t:16_2: nibbānaṃ vā rūpena, catūheva pana khandhehi hotīti catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ rūpanibbānehi
tika-abh03t:16_3: vippayogopi vippayujjamānehi catūhi khandhehi niyamito tehi vinā vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:16_4: So cāyaṃ vippayogo anārammaṇassa, anārammaṇaanārammaṇamissakehi missakassa ca na
tika-abh03t:16_5: hoti, anārammaṇassa pana missakassa ca sārammaṇena, sārammaṇassa sārammaṇena anārammaṇena
tika-abh03t:18_0: 4. Saṅgahoyeva saṅgahanayo. Sabhāgo. Visabhāgoti etassa “tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho”ti
tika-abh03t:18_1: etena, “catūhi sampayogo, catūhi vippayogo”ti etenapi visuṃ yojanā kātabbā. Tena
tika-abh03t:18_2: saṅgaho asaṅgaho ca sabhāgo visabhāgo ca bhāvo, tathā sampayogo vippayogo cāti ayamattho
tika-abh03t:18_3: viññāyati. Yassa vā saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca, so dhammo sabhāgo visabhāgo ca, tathā
tika-abh03t:18_4: yassa sampayogo vippayogo ca, sopi sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti. Tattha yena rūpakkhandho…pe…
tika-abh03t:18_5: manoviññāṇadhātūti dhammā gaṇanaṃ gacchanti, so ruppanādiko samānabhāvo saṅgahe sabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t:20_0: 5. Evaṃ dhātukathāya mātikato bahi ṭhapitattāti “sabbāpi…pe… mātikā”ti etena ṭhapanākārena
tika-abh03t:20_1: bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattāti attho. Etena vā ṭhapanākārena kusalādīnaṃ araṇantānaṃ
tika-abh03t:20_2: idha aṭṭhapetvā dhātukathāya mātikato bahi pakaraṇantaramātikāya imassa pakaraṇassa
tika-abh03t:21_0: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saṅgaho ekavidhova, so kasmā “catubbidho”ti vuttoti? Saṅgahoti
tika-abh03t:21_1: atthaṃ avatvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā. Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saddesu
tika-abh03t:21_2: saṅgahasaddo tāva attano atthavasena catubbidhoti ayañhetthattho. Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso
tika-abh03t:21_3: sāmaññena gahetabbataṃ patto “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”tiādīsu “saṅgaho”ti vuttoti na koci
tika-abh03t:21_4: doso. Niddhārite hi visese tassa ekavidhatā siyā, na tato pubbeti. Jātisaddassa sāpekkhasaddattā
tika-abh03t:21_5: “jātiyā saṅgaho”ti vutte “attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa avuttattāti
tika-abh03t:21_6: jātisaṅgahoti rūpakaṇḍe vutto sajātisaṅgaho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t:22_0: Ettha nayamātikāya “saṅgaho asaṅgaho, sampayogo vippayogo”ti ime dve pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaṃ
tika-abh03t:22_1: aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayauddesā, avasesā niddhāretvā.
tika-abh03t:22_2: “Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti hi “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahita”nti vattabbe ekassa
tika-abh03t:22_3: asaṅgahitasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. Tena saṅgahitavisesavisiṭṭho yo asaṅgahito dhammaviseso,
tika-abh03t:22_5: ca visesane karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo tatiyādīsu dasamāvasānesu nayuddesesu
tika-abh03t:22_6: chaṭṭhavajjesu. Tesupi hi vuttanayena dvīhi dvīhi padehi pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:22_7: katvā tattha tattha antimapadasadisena tatiyapadena pucchanavissajjananayā uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t:22_8: Tattha catutthapañcamesu kattuatthe karaṇaniddeso, sattamādīsu ca catūsu sahayoge
tika-abh03t:22_9: daṭṭhabbo, na dutiyatatiyesu viya samānādhikaraṇe visesane. Tattha hi sabhāvantarena
tika-abh03t:22_10: sabhāvantarassa visesanaṃ kataṃ, etesu dhammantarena dhammantarassāti. Ekādasamādīsu
tika-abh03t:22_11: pana catūsu ādipadeneva dhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ katvā itarehi pucchanavissajjananayā
tika-abh03t:22_12: uddiṭṭhā. Visesane eva cettha karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pucchāvissajjanānañhi nissayabhūtā
tika-abh03t:22_13: dhammā saṅgahitatādivisesena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttavippayuttādibhāvaṃ attano visesentīti.
tika-abh03t:23_0: Vikappatoti vividhakappanato, vibhāgatoti attho. Sanniṭṭhānavasenāti adhimokkhasampayogavasena.
tika-abh03t:23_1: Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā,
tika-abh03t:23_2: tesaṃ sādhāraṇavasenāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Adhimokkho hi sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh03t:23_3: vuttānaṃ cittuppādānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena vutto, itare sabbesanti. Tattha sādhāraṇā
tika-abh03t:23_4: pasaṭā pākaṭā cāti ādito pariggahetabbā, tasmā tesaṃ saṅgahādipariggahatthaṃ uddeso
tika-abh03t:23_5: kato, asādhāraṇāpi pana pariggahetabbāvāti tesu mahāvisayena aññesampi saṅgahādipariggahaṃ
tika-abh03t:23_6: dassetuṃ adhimokkho uddiṭṭho. “Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā”ti ca dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:23_7: paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh03t:23_8: ye vuttā, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇatoti pana atthe sati sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu vattabbesu
tika-abh03t:23_9: yo asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayo adhimokkho, tassa vasena vuttasabbacittuppādasādhāraṇato
tika-abh03t:23_10: phassādayo sabbasādhāraṇāti adhimokkho ca asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayoti katvā vutto aññassa
tika-abh03t:24_0: Jīvitindriyaṃ panettha rūpamissakattā na vuttanti veditabbaṃ, cittekaggatā pana asamādhisabhāvā
tika-abh03t:24_1: sāmaññasaddeneva sāmaññavisesasaddehi ca samādhisabhāvā visesasaddavacanīyaṃ aññaṃ
tika-abh03t:24_3: tasseva dhammassa bhedadīpakehi vattabbā, na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vuttalakkhaṇaviparītehi
tika-abh03t:24_4: sāmaññavisesasaddeheva, tasmā “cittekaggatā”ti ayaṃ sāmaññasaddo samādhisabhāve visesasaddanirapekkho
tika-abh03t:24_5: pavattamāno sayameva visesasaddamāpajjitvā asamādhisabhāvameva pakāseyya, itaro ca
tika-abh03t:24_6: samādhisabhāvamevāti dvidhā bhinnā cittekaggatā asādhāraṇā ceva appavisayā cāti idha
tika-abh03t:24_7: uddesaṃ na arahati. Abhinnāpi vā phassādīnaṃ viya pākaṭattābhāvato aññadhammanissayena
tika-abh03t:24_8: vattabbato ca sā jīvitañca na arahatīti na uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t:29_0: 6. Khandhāyatanadhātuyomahantare abhiññeyyadhammabhāvena vuttā, tesaṃ pana sabhāvato
tika-abh03t:29_2: indriyādīni ca vuttānīti saccādiviseso viya saṅgahāsaṅgahaviseso ca abhiññeyyanissito
tika-abh03t:29_3: vuccamāno suviññeyyo hotīti “tīhi saṅgaho. Tīhi asaṅgaho”ti nayamukhamātikā ṭhapitāti
tika-abh03t:29_4: veditabbā. Evañca katvā “catūhī”ti vuttā sampayogavippayogā ca abhiññeyyanissayena
tika-abh03t:29_5: khandhādīheva pucchitvā vissajjitāti. Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenāti ye dhammā “rūpakkhandho”ti
tika-abh03t:29_6: vuccanti, tesaṃ pañcasu khandhesu rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hotīti rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena,
tika-abh03t:29_7: rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā gaṇanena saṅgahaṃ gaṇanaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “yañhi
tika-abh03t:29_8: kiñcī”tiādi. Rūpakkhandhoti hi saṅgahitabbadhammo dassito. Yena saṅgahena saṅgayhati,
tika-abh03t:29_9: tassa saṅgahassa dassanaṃ “ekena khandhenā”ti vacanaṃ. Pañcasu khandhagaṇanesu ekena
tika-abh03t:29_10: khandhagaṇanena gaṇitoti ayañhettha attho. Yasmā ca khandhādivacanehi saṅgaho vuccati,
tika-abh03t:30_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddeseti idaṃ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti etasseva nayassa ekadesanayabhāvena
tika-abh03t:30_1: vuttaṃ, na nayantaratāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā
tika-abh03t:30_2: dassitāti etena vedanākkhandhamūlakā purimena yojiyamāne viseso natthīti pacchimeheva
tika-abh03t:30_3: yojetvā tayo dukā dve tikā eko catukko, saññākkhandhamūlakā dve dukā eko tiko, saṅkhārakkhandhamūlako
tika-abh03t:30_4: eko dukoti ete labbhantīti dasseti. Tesaṃ pana bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantaraṃ
tika-abh03t:30_5: pucchāvissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ saṃkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, vuttanayena vā sakkā ñātunti
tika-abh03t:32_0: 40. Yasmā ca dukatikesūti yadipi ekakepi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ, ekake pana sadisavissajjanānaṃ
tika-abh03t:32_1: cakkhundriyasotindriyasukhindriyādīnaṃ dukādīsu asadisavissajjanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Na hettha
tika-abh03t:32_3: idha pana dukkhasamudayadukkhamaggadukānaṃ aññamaññaṃ tikena ca sadisaṃ vissajjananti
tika-abh03t:32_4: dukatikesveva sadisavissajjanataṃ samudayānantaraṃ maggasaccassa vacane kāraṇaṃ vadati.
tika-abh03t:34_0: 61. “Pucchaṃ anārabhitvā avijjā ekena khandhena, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhenā”ti
tika-abh03t:34_1: likhitabbepi pamādavasena “avijjā ekena khandhenā”ti idaṃ na likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:34_2: Sarūpekasesaṃ vā katvā avijjāvacanena avijjāvissajjanaṃ dassitanti. Sabbampi vipākaviññāṇanti
tika-abh03t:34_3: ettha vipākaggahaṇena visesanaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Kusalādīnampi hi viññāṇānaṃ dhātukathāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:34_5: “vipākā dhammā”ti imassa vissajjanāsadisena tesaṃ vissajjanena dassitā, idha ca nāmarūpassa
tika-abh03t:35_1: vinibbhujjitvā anupalabbhamānāni paramatthānaṃ sabhāvamattabhūtāni, tāni rūpassa
tika-abh03t:35_6: tāni cakkhāyatanādīhi ekantaparamatthakiccehi agayhamānāni nissattaṭṭhena dhammāyatanadhammadhātudhammehi
tika-abh03t:35_7: sabhāgāni, tena tehi khandhādīhi saṅgayhantīti “jāti dvīhi khandhehī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:38_0: 171. Saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese yaṃ taṃ uddese asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbaṃ
tika-abh03t:38_1: vissajjitabbañca saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhaṃ asaṅgahitaṃ dhammajātaṃ niddhāritaṃ, tadeva
tika-abh03t:38_2: tāva dassento “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena
tika-abh03t:38_3: asaṅgahitā”ti āha. Sabbattha khandhādisaṅgahasāmaññānaṃ niccaṃ visesāpekkhattā bhedanissitattā
tika-abh03t:38_4: ca pucchāvissajjanānaṃ savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā suddhā. Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitavacanamattena
tika-abh03t:38_5: dhammavisesassa niddhāritattā tīsu saṅgahesu ekena dvīhi vā ye saṅgahitā hutvā aññehi
tika-abh03t:38_6: asaṅgahitā, teyeva dhammā “khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti
tika-abh03t:38_7: ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṃ, tesaṃ pana evaṃvidhānaṃ asambhavā nayamātikāya ca abbhantarabāhiramātikāpekkhattā
tika-abh03t:38_8: uddesepi yaṃ yaṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu saṅgāhakaṃ, taṃ taṃ apekkhitvā saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitaṃ
tika-abh03t:38_9: niddhāritanti viññāyatīti tena tena saṅgāhakena yathāniddhāritaṃ dhammaṃ niyametvā
tika-abh03t:38_11: natthi, tasmiṃ paṭhamanaye chaṭṭhanaye ca pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvena, itaresu
tika-abh03t:38_12: ca yaṃ yaṃ pucchitabbavissajjitabbaṃ niddhāritaṃ, tassa tassa niyāmakabhāvena rūpakkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t:39_1: “khandhasaṅgahena āyatanasaṅgahena dhātusaṅgahenā”ti karaṇatthe. Ettha ca yena yena
tika-abh03t:39_2: saṅgāhakena khandhādisaṅgahesu tena tena saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṃ aññaṃ atthi, taṃ
tika-abh03t:39_3: tadeva saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakabhāvena uddhaṭaṃ. Rūpakkhandhena pana khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbo
tika-abh03t:39_4: añño dhammo natthi, tathā vedanākkhandhādīhi, na ca so eva tassa saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh03t:39_5: vā hoti. Yañca “rūpakkhandho ekena khandhena saṅgahito”ti vuttaṃ, tañca na tasseva
tika-abh03t:39_6: tena saṅgahitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, rūpakkhandhabhāvena pana rūpakkhandhavacanena
tika-abh03t:40_0: Yadi ca so eva tena saṅgayheyya, saṅgahitenasampayuttavippayuttapadaniddese – “vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh03t:40_1: ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t:40_2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā”tiādi vattabbaṃ
tika-abh03t:40_3: siyā, na ca vuttaṃ, tasmā yathā cittaṃ cittena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t:40_4: evaṃ rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hoti, tathā vedanākkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t:40_5: vedanākkhandhādīhi. Na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti. Teneva na ekadesā
tika-abh03t:40_6: viya samudāyassa, samudāyo ekadesānaṃ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca. Yathā rūpakkhandho
tika-abh03t:40_7: cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ, saraṇā dhammā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ.
tika-abh03t:40_8: Samudāyantogadhānañhi ekadesānaṃ na vibhāgo atthi, yena te samudāyassa samudāyo ca
tika-abh03t:40_9: tesaṃ sabhāgo visabhāgo ca siyāti, tathā na samudāyo ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānaṃ saṅgāhako
tika-abh03t:40_10: asaṅgāhako ca. Yathā dhammāyatanaṃ sukhumarūpasabhāgassa vedanādivisabhāgassa ca
tika-abh03t:40_13: Na hi ekadesasabhāgaṃ samudāyasabhāgaṃ, nāpi ekadesavisabhāgaṃ samudāyavisabhāganti,
tika-abh03t:40_14: tasmā satipi attato attani antogadhato attekadesasabhāgato ca aññassa asaṅgāhakatte
tika-abh03t:40_15: saṅgāhakattameva etesaṃ natthi, yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakā siyunti saṅgāhakattābhāvato
tika-abh03t:41_0: Yaṃ pana “dhammāyatanaṃ asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti,
tika-abh03t:41_1: “cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena saṅgahita”nti ca vuttaṃ, na tena ekadesānaṃ
tika-abh03t:41_2: samudāyasaṅgāhakattaṃ, samudāyassa ca ekadesasaṅgāhakattaṃ dasseti, catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehi
tika-abh03t:41_3: pana dhammāyatanassa gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvena pañcadhā bhinnataṃ, cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:41_5: gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbānaṃ taṃtaṃgaṇanehi gaṇanadassanamattameva hi paṭhamanayo kammakaraṇamattasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t:41_6: dutiyādayo pana saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakehi saṅgahitāsaṅgahitānaṃ agaṇanādidassanāni kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā.
tika-abh03t:41_7: Tathā paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃkhandhādibhāvābhāvo
tika-abh03t:41_9: samānakkhandhādibhāvo sabhāgatā, tadabhāvo ca visabhāgatā. Pucchāvissajjanesu taṃtaṃkhandhādibhāvābhāvo
tika-abh03t:42_0: Samudayasaccasukhindriyasadisāni pana tehi saṅgahetabbameva atthi, na saṅgahitaṃ
tika-abh03t:42_1: asaṅgahetabbanti asaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭāni. Dukkhasaccasadisāni tehi visabhāgasamudāyabhūtehi
tika-abh03t:42_2: anekakkhandhehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbaṃ, itarehi asaṅgahetabbañca natthīti
tika-abh03t:42_5: uddhaṭānīti veditabbāni. Tattha “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti
tika-abh03t:42_6: cakkhāyatanavajjā rūpadhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti veditabbā, na rūpakkhandhoti.
tika-abh03t:43_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana khandhapadenāti khandhapadasaṅgahenāti attho, na saṅgāhakenāti.
tika-abh03t:43_1: “Kenaci saṅgāhakenā”ti idaṃ pana ānetvā vattabbaṃ. Taṃ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjatīti
tika-abh03t:43_2: taṃ vissajjanaṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu saṅgāhakesu na yujjatīti attho. Rūpakkhandhena hi…pe…
tika-abh03t:43_3: saṅgahitoti etena nayena cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito, so ca aḍḍhekādasahi
tika-abh03t:43_4: āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthīti evaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnipi na gahetabbānīti
tika-abh03t:43_5: āpajjatīti ce? Nāpajjati. Na hi aññamattanivāraṇaṃ evasaddassa attho, atha kho saṅgāhakato
tika-abh03t:43_6: aññanivāraṇaṃ. So cātiādi ca na nirapekkhavacanaṃ, atha kho saṅgāhakāpekkhanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh03t:43_7: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahitoti yathā cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanato
tika-abh03t:43_8: aññampi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṃ atthi, yaṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ
tika-abh03t:43_9: hoti, na evaṃ rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhato aññaṃ khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:43_10: yaṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ siyā, rūpakkhandhena pana rūpakkhandhova khandhasaṅgahena
tika-abh03t:43_11: saṅgahitoti ayañhettha adhippāyo yutto. Siyā panetaṃ “so eva rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t:43_12: āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahito hotū”ti, taṃ nivārento āha “so ca aḍḍhekādasahi
tika-abh03t:43_13: āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthī”ti. Ettha ca “rūpakkhandhenā”ti ānetvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:43_14: Tattha rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhassa vā tadekadesānaṃ vā cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi
tika-abh03t:43_15: saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca na hotīti iminā pariyāyena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti
tika-abh03t:43_16: yujjati, na rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhassa tadekadesānaṃ vā aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi
tika-abh03t:43_17: saṅgahitatāya. Na hi sā saṅgahitatā atthi. Yadi siyā, saṅgahitenasampayuttavippayuttapadaniddese
tika-abh03t:43_18: rūpakkhandhopi uddharitabbo siyā. Tena hi tīhipi saṅgahehi rūpakkhandho tadekadeso
tika-abh03t:43_19: vā saṅgahitā siyuṃ, atthi ca tesaṃ vippayuttatāti.
tika-abh03t:44_0: Evaṃ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni, aññāni cāti etthāpi cakkhāyatanādīhi viya etehi
tika-abh03t:44_1: aññehi ca saṅgahitānaṃ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca yathā vā tathā vā
tika-abh03t:44_2: etāni viya ayujjamānavissajjanattā evarūpāni padāni saṅgāhakabhāvena na gahitānīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:45_0: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito”ti, taṃ teneva tassa
tika-abh03t:45_1: saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattābhāvadassanena nivāritaṃ. Yañhettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:45_2: tañca satipi saṅgahitatte asaṅgahitatāya abhāvatoti viññāyamānaṃ samudayasaccādīsu
tika-abh03t:45_3: yujjeyya sati tehi saṅgahite tadasaṅgahitattābhāvato. Rūpakkhandhādīhi pana saṅgahitameva
tika-abh03t:45_4: natthi, kuto tassa asaṅgahitatā bhavissati, tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvo evettha aggahaṇe
tika-abh03t:45_5: kāraṇanti yuttaṃ. Saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṃ yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā attano
tika-abh03t:45_6: attani antogadhassa attekadesasabhāgassa ca natthi, aññassa pana atthīti na dukkhasaccādīsu
tika-abh03t:45_7: viya ubhayābhāvo cettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttoti. Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnañca
tika-abh03t:45_8: khandhacatukkadukādisaṅgāhakatte sati na tesaṃ saṅgahitānaṃ tehi dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t:45_9: āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitatā natthīti asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo anekantiko, tasmā
tika-abh03t:45_10: pubbe vuttanayeneva aggahitānaṃ aggahaṇe, gahitānañca gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ veditabbanti.
tika-abh03t:46_0: Anidassanaṃ punadeva sappaṭighanti ettha anidassananti etena “sanidassanasappaṭigha”nti
tika-abh03t:46_1: ettha vuttena sappaṭighasaddena saddhiṃ yojetvā anidassanasappaṭighā dassitā. Punadevāti
tika-abh03t:46_2: etena tattheva avisiṭṭhaṃ sanidassanapadaṃ nivattetvā gaṇhanto sanidassanadukapadaṃ
tika-abh03t:46_3: dasseti. “Cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanamevekaṃ saṅgahita”nti idaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:46_4: Na hi “cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanaṃ āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahita”nti ca “asaṅgahita”nti
tika-abh03t:46_5: ca vattabbanti dassitoyaṃ nayoti. Evaṃ sabbattha tasseva samudāyekadesānañca saṅgāhakasaṅgahitanti
tika-abh03t:46_6: vacanesu asaṅgāhakaasaṅgahitanti vacanesu ca tadavattabbatā yojetabbā. Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato
tika-abh03t:46_7: eva hi cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhāyatanādīhi asaṅgahitānīti na vuccanti, na saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti.
tika-abh03t:49_1: vedanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ nibbānassa ca sukhumarūpena saha āyatanadhātusabhāgatte
tika-abh03t:49_2: satipi na sukhumarūpameva rūpakkhandhoti rūpakkhandhena āyatanadhātusabhāgattaṃ natthi,
tika-abh03t:49_3: tasmā na tena tāni āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitāni. Na kevalaṃ saṅgahitāneva, asaṅgahitānipi
tika-abh03t:49_4: tena tāni tehi saṅgahehi na honteva tadekadesena sukhumarūpena āyatanadhātusabhāgattā,
tika-abh03t:49_5: saṅgahitābhāvo eva pana idhādhippeto, viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi pana asaṅgahitā
tika-abh03t:49_6: na te tehi kathañci sammissāti sabbathā te tehi na saṅgahitā. Dukkhasaccādīhi ca
tika-abh03t:49_8: viya āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ tehi na hoti, tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva
tika-abh03t:49_10: pana abyākatadhammādīnaṃ asaṅgāhakattābhāvatova. Na hi taṃ kañci atthi, yassa te
tika-abh03t:49_11: khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgāhakā siyuṃ, na ca attano ekadeso attekadesasabhāgo ca attanā
tika-abh03t:49_12: asaṅgahito hotīti attanā asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattā pana vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ katanti.
tika-abh03t:50_0: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti, taṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh03t:50_1: Dhammāyatanena hi na koci dhammo kenaci saṅgahena saṅgahito atthi visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā,
tika-abh03t:50_2: khandhasaṅgahena sayameva attano saṅgāhakaṃ na hotīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi ca saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti
tika-abh03t:50_3: dassitoyaṃ nayoti etassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena gaṇitāti attho. Yāni…pe… gahitānīti
tika-abh03t:50_4: etena viññāṇasammissaṃ dhammāyatanekadesaṃ dīpentāni iddhipādādipadāni, oḷārikarūpasammissaṃ
tika-abh03t:50_5: dīpentāni rūpakkhandhādipadāni, sabbena sabbaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ adīpentāni viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādipadāni,
tika-abh03t:50_6: sakaladhammāyatanadīpakāni dhammāyatanādipadāni ca vajjetvā dhammāyatanekadesaṃ aññāyatanena
tika-abh03t:53_0: 191. Saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese yasmā yathā dutiyatatiyanayā tiṇṇaṃ saṅgahānaṃ
tika-abh03t:53_2: ca uddiṭṭhā, nevaṃ catutthapañcamā. Saṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṃ
tika-abh03t:53_3: uddiṭṭhaṃ, asaṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva ca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitanti, tasmā saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe
tika-abh03t:53_4: saṅgahitadhammāsaṅgahitadhammavisese nissitā ete dve nayāti ettha kenaci saṅgahitena
tika-abh03t:53_5: dhammavisesena puna saṅgahito dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito saṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo
tika-abh03t:53_6: vissajjitabbo ca, tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṃ dassento “samudayasaccena ye dhammā
tika-abh03t:53_7: khandha…pe… saṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha…pe… saṅgahitā”ti āha. Ettha
tika-abh03t:53_8: ca ye tīhipi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhadhammāyatanadukkhasaccādīni
tika-abh03t:53_9: viya, ye ca dvīhāyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā cakkhāyatanādīni viya, ye ca ekena
tika-abh03t:53_11: viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viya ca, te dhammā saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā saṅgāhakabhāvena
tika-abh03t:53_12: na uddhaṭā, tīhipi pana saṅgahehi ye saṅgāhakā, te saṅgāhakattābhāvābhāvato idha
tika-abh03t:53_13: uddhaṭā. Tehi saṅgahitāpi hi ekantena attano saṅgāhakassa saṅgāhakā honti, yassa
tika-abh03t:54_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakalena hi khandhādipadenāti sakalavācakena rūpakkhandhādipadenāti
tika-abh03t:54_1: attho. Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ
tika-abh03t:54_2: gaccheyyā”ti, taṃ tena khandhādipadenāti evaṃ ayojetvā taṃ aññaṃ saṅgahitaṃ nāma
tika-abh03t:54_3: natthīti evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Na hi yena yaṃ saṅgahitaṃ, teneva tassa saṅgaho pucchito
tika-abh03t:54_4: vissajjito, na ca tasseva, atha kho tena saṅgahitassāti. Yathā vedanā saddo ca khandho
tika-abh03t:54_5: āyatanañca, na evaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ, taṃ pana khandhāyatanānaṃ ekadesova, tasmā “sukhumarūpekadesaṃ
tika-abh03t:54_6: vā”ti avatvā “sukhumarūpaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbattha ca aññena asammissanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:54_7: Yampi cetaṃ vuttaṃ “tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṃ, te dhamme sandhāyā”ti,
tika-abh03t:54_8: tampi tathā na sakkā vattuṃ. Na hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitassa saṅgahitena saṅgaho ettha
tika-abh03t:54_9: pucchito vissajjito ca, atha kho saṅgahova, tasmā ekena khandhenāti ekena khandhagaṇanenāti
tika-abh03t:54_10: ayamevettha attho, na saṅgāhakenāti. Na hi eko khandho attano ekadesassa saṅgāhakoti.
tika-abh03t:57_1: veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca sasukhumarūpaviññāṇasahitadhammasamudāyā ye te dukkhasaccaanidassanaappaṭighaacetasikānupādāsadisā
tika-abh03t:57_2: satipi ekena dvīhi vā saṅgahehi kesañci asaṅgāhakatte tīhipi asaṅgahetabbassa abhāvato
tika-abh03t:57_3: paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā na honti, abyākatadhammasadisā kenaci saṅgahena asaṅgahetabbabhāvato
tika-abh03t:57_4: asaṅgāhakā eva na honti, tena te asaṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā, itare pana tabbipariyāyena uddhaṭāti.
tika-abh03t:58_0: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tādisena hi padena nibbānaṃ khandhasaṅgahamattaṃ na gaccheyyā”ti
tika-abh03t:58_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ dukkhasaccaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anidassanaappaṭighesu pana asaṅgāhakesu
tika-abh03t:58_2: nibbānaṃ antogadhaṃ, na ca tadeva tassa asaṅgāhakanti. Sadisavissajjanānaṃ vasena
tika-abh03t:58_3: samodhānetvā katehi saddhinti evaṃ katehi dutiyapañhādīhi saddhiṃ paṭhamapañhanāmarūpapañhādayo
tika-abh03t:58_4: sabbepi catuttiṃsa hontīti attho. Yaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ padaṃ, tadevāti rūpakkhandhādivisesakapadaṃ
tika-abh03t:58_5: vadati, na niddhārite pucchitabbadhamme. Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitā, na padena sarūpatoti.
tika-abh03t:58_6: Tattha tadevāti eva-saddena na taṃ kadāci saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ na hotīti uddhaṭasseva
tika-abh03t:58_7: asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāve niyatataṃ aññassa ca aniyatataṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:58_8: “Tadeva yehi asaṅgahita”nti ettha hi “niyamato”ti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti. Atha
tika-abh03t:58_9: vā tadevāti pucchāya uddhaṭameva evaṃpakārameva hutvā yehi asaṅgahitanti tassa pucchāya
tika-abh03t:58_10: uddhaṭabhāvena evaṃ asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvaniyamanattho eva-saddo, na aññassa
tika-abh03t:58_12: asahitañca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ hoti. Rūpakkhandhādīni hi aññasahitāni viññāṇakkhandhādīni asahitānīti.
tika-abh03t:59_0: Avasesā saṅgahitāti idaṃ avasesā asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tehipi viññāṇadhammehi
tika-abh03t:59_1: te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti pucchāya uddhaṭā tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā
tika-abh03t:59_2: hutvā asaṅgahitāti adhippāyo. Anuddhaṭā vedanādayopi hi asaṅgahitā evāti. Ettha ca
tika-abh03t:59_3: paṭhame naye vedanādayopi viññāṇena asaṅgahitāti vuttā, dutiye rūpadhammāvāti ayaṃ
tika-abh03t:59_4: viseso. Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti oḷārikarūpehi
tika-abh03t:59_5: viññāṇena ca tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti attho. Rūpekadeso hi ettha rūpaggahaṇena gahitoti.
tika-abh03t:60_0: 196. Catutthapañhe cakkhāyatanaṃ vedanādīhi catūhīti ettha cakkhāyatananti etena
tika-abh03t:60_1: pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ asaṅgāhakaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cakkhāyatanena pana asaṅgahitena
tika-abh03t:60_2: asaṅgahitāni dasa oḷārikāyatanāni na cakkhāyatanamevāti. “Rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādinā
tika-abh03t:60_3: yehi dhammehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ taṃ viññāṇameva hoti, asaṅgahitena tena
tika-abh03t:60_4: asaṅgahitañca viññāṇavajjaṃ sabbaṃ teva dhamme udāneti. Sadisavissajjanā hi ekato
tika-abh03t:60_5: udānetvā dassetabbā. Tattha paṭhamena rūpakkhandhena sadisavissajjanesu ekato udānetvā
tika-abh03t:60_6: dassitesu aññe visadisavissajjanā nayadānena dassitā honti. Tenāha “rūpañca dhammāyatananti…pe…
tika-abh03t:60_7: aññenākārena saṅkhipitvā dassitā”ti. Tattha dve bhavāti asaññekavokārabhavā. Dveti
tika-abh03t:60_8: bāhirupādādhamme eva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yena asaṅgāhakena asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ
tika-abh03t:60_9: pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca paricchijjati, so rūpakkhandhādiko tassa pucchāvissajjanānañca
tika-abh03t:60_10: nissayabhāvato “visayo”ti vutto, yathādassitassa pana uddānassa nayadānamattattā
tika-abh03t:60_11: “nayo”ti vuttaṃ. “Dvevīsanayo cā”tipi pāṭho, dvevīsapadiko esa nayo cāti attho.
tika-abh03t:63_0: 228. Sampayogavippayogapade yaṃ labbhati, yañca na labbhati, taṃ sabbaṃ pucchāya
tika-abh03t:63_1: gahitanti idaṃ na rūpakkhandhādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho sampayogapadaṃ
tika-abh03t:63_2: vippayogapadañcāti veditabbaṃ. Rūpakkhandhādīsu hi yaṃ dhammāyatanādipadaṃ na labbhati,
tika-abh03t:63_3: taṃ pucchāyapi na gahitaṃ. Sampayogapadaṃ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu alabbhamānampi “rūpakkhandho
tika-abh03t:63_4: katihi…pe… sampayutto”ti evaṃ pucchāya gahitaṃ, vedanākkhandhādīsu labbhamānaṃ, vippayogapadaṃ
tika-abh03t:63_5: pana sabbattha labbhamānamevāti. Rūpadhammānaṃ pana rūpena nibbānena vā, nibbānassa
tika-abh03t:63_6: ca rūpena saddhiṃ sampayogo nāma natthīti ekuppādādisabhāgatāya abhāvato sampayogaṃ
tika-abh03t:63_7: nivārentena sā eva ekuppādāditā etesaṃ visabhāgatāti tadabhāvato vippayogopi nivārito
tika-abh03t:63_8: eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Catūsu hi khandhesu vijjamānā ekuppādāditā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh03t:63_9: sabhāgatā hoti rūpanibbānehi tesaṃ tehi ca rūpanibbānānaṃ visabhāgatā ca, na ca rūpekadesassa
tika-abh03t:63_10: nibbānassa vā sā ekuppādāditā atthi, yā rūpekadesena rūpekadesanibbānānaṃ nibbānena
tika-abh03t:63_11: ca rūpassa visabhāgatā siyā. Teneva “catūhi vippayogo”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh03t:64_0: Sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutteti yathā rūpabhavo tīhi viññāṇadhātūhi,
tika-abh03t:64_1: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā pañcahi, avitakkaavicārā ekāya vippayutte anārammaṇamissake
tika-abh03t:64_2: dhamme dīpenti, evaṃ adīpetvā ekāyapi vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi
tika-abh03t:64_3: vā tā dīpentīti adhippāyo. Avippayutteti hi ye vippayuttā na honti, te dhammeti vuttaṃ
tika-abh03t:64_4: hoti, na sampayutteti. Tena yāni tāhi sampayutte dīpenti dhammāyatanādipadāni, yāni
tika-abh03t:64_5: ca sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi navattabbaṃ dīpenti acetasikādipadāni, yāni ca sampayuttanavattabbāni
tika-abh03t:64_6: dīpenti dukkhasaccādipadāni, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ anārammaṇamissakadhammadīpakānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:64_8: khandhāyatanadhātūsu kenaci sampayogo vippayogo vā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:65_0: Yadi evaṃ vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t:65_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”ti na vattabbaṃ. Akusalābyākatā hi anārammaṇamissobhayadhammāti?
tika-abh03t:65_3: hi tadekadesā tadekadesaññasamudāyā ca, samudāyekadesānañca vibhāgābhāvato na sabhāgavisabhāgatā
tika-abh03t:65_4: atthi, tena tesaṃ khandhādīhi sampayogavippayogābhāvo hoti. Kusalā pana dhammā akusalābyākatehi
tika-abh03t:65_5: vibhattā, te ca kusalehi, na tesaṃ samudāyekadesabhāvo tadekadesaññasamudāyabhāvo
tika-abh03t:65_6: vā, tasmā khandhādīni anāmasitvā vippayuttatāmattena yathāniddhāritadhammadassane
tika-abh03t:65_7: kusalehi itaresaṃ, itarehi ca kusalānaṃ vippayogo na na hoti visabhāgatāsabbhāvatoti
tika-abh03t:65_8: tesaṃ aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā. Esa nayo sabbesu evarūpesu.
tika-abh03t:66_0: Uddāne pana aṭṭhārasa tato pareti idaṃ “soḷasā”ti vattabbaṃ, tevīsanti idañca “ekavīsa”nti.
tika-abh03t:66_2: ekadesā samudayasaccavedanākkhandhādayo ekadesasammissā ca iddhipādādayo anārammaṇehi
tika-abh03t:66_3: asammissā rūpakkhandhādayo ca sārammaṇehi asammissā sampayogīvippayogībhāvena samānakālasantānehi
tika-abh03t:66_4: ca ekadesantarehi vibhattā eva gahitāti tehi te kehici ekadesantarehi vibhattehi
tika-abh03t:66_5: yathāyogaṃ sampayogaṃ vippayogañca labhanti. Atthi hi tesaṃ ekuppādāditā sabhāgatā
tika-abh03t:66_6: visabhāgatā cāti. Tena tattha tattha “ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā
tika-abh03t:66_7: kehici sampayutta”nti ca, “ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:66_8: Bhinnakālasamudāyā eva pana vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā vattamānā ca ekekadhammā eva,
tika-abh03t:66_9: tasmā tesaṃ samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato na sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhassa
tika-abh03t:66_10: vibhāgaṃ karonti, cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo ca viññāṇakkhandhassa manāyatanassa ca.
tika-abh03t:66_11: Tena “sukhindriyaṃ ekena khandhena kehici vippayutta”nti, “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ekena
tika-abh03t:66_12: khandhena ekenāyatanena kehici vippayuttā”ti ca evamādi na vuttaṃ, khandhāyatanavibhāgavirahitampi
tika-abh03t:66_13: pana viññāṇaṃ dhātuvibhāgena vibhattameva vuttanti “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe… manoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh03t:66_14: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā”ti vuttaṃ, evamevaṃ indriyavibhāgena vibhattānaṃ sukhindriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:66_15: “sukhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu yathāyogaṃ vippayogo daṭṭhabbo, nāvibhattassa
tika-abh03t:67_0: 235. Yathā taṃsampayogībhāvaṃ sandhāya “samudayasaccaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayutta”nti
tika-abh03t:67_1: vuttaṃ, evaṃ taṃvippayogībhāvaṃ sandhāya “tīhi khandhehi vippayutta”nti kasmā na
tika-abh03t:67_2: vuttanti ce? Avibhāgehi tehi vippayogavacanassa ayuttattā. Vibhāge hi sati samudayasaccaṃ
tika-abh03t:67_4: yuttaṃ vattuṃ vibhāgeneva visabhāgatāya saṅgahitattā, vibhāgarahitehi pana vedanākkhandhādīhi
tika-abh03t:67_5: na yuttaṃ, tehi vijjamānehi vijjamānassa samudayassa visabhāgabhāvābhāvato. Yañhi
tika-abh03t:67_6: anuppannā dhammā viya āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ na hoti saṅkhataṃ uddharitabbaṃ, taṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:67_7: nissāya sampayogīvippayogībhāvena uddharīyati, tañca vibhāgarahitehi khandhādīhi
tika-abh03t:67_8: saṅkhatehi paccuppannabhāvameva nissāya anāmaṭṭhakālabhede atthitāya eva nissitabbattā.
tika-abh03t:67_9: Avijjamānassa hi avijjamānena, avijjamānassa ca vijjamānena, vijjamānassa ca avijjamānena
tika-abh03t:67_10: sampayogo natthi, vippayogo pana avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahite teneva visabhāgatāpi
tika-abh03t:67_11: gahitā evāti hoti. Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā
tika-abh03t:67_12: sati sabhāgatte vijjamānatāya eva dhammānaṃ sabhāgassa paricchindanato vijjamānatā
tika-abh03t:67_13: dassitāti ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātā sabhāgatāpi gahitā eva hoti. Tassā ca gahitattā
tika-abh03t:67_14: sampayogova labbhati, na vippayogo, tasmā samudayasaccaṃ vedanākkhandhādīhi sampayuttattena
tika-abh03t:67_15: vuttaṃ, na vippayuttattenāti. Esa nayo maggasaccādīsupīti.
tika-abh03t:68_1: ye padhānā vitakko viya koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā, te eva idha avitakkavicāramattāti
tika-abh03t:68_2: adhippetāti dasseti. Teneva hi anantaranaye samudayasaccena samānagatikā na savitakkasavicārehīti
tika-abh03t:68_3: te na gahitā. Dasamosānanayesu ca tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ tehi vippayuttānañca
tika-abh03t:68_4: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo aṭṭhārasasaṅgahito ca vutto. Vitakkasahitesupi pana tesu
tika-abh03t:68_5: gahitesu sabbepi te vicārena sampayuttāti “ekena khandhena kehici sampayuttā”ti sakkā
tika-abh03t:68_6: vattuṃ. So hi samudāyo vicāraṃ vajjetvā aññena kenaci sampayutto na hoti. Na hi tadekadesassa
tika-abh03t:68_7: vitakkassa vicārato aññena sampayogo samudāyassa hoti. Yathā nānācittuppādesu uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh03t:68_8: iddhipādānaṃ samudāyassa iddhipādassa ekadesānaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo samudāyassa
tika-abh03t:68_9: na hoti, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā pana tesu ekopi vedanāsaññākkhandhehi saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena
tika-abh03t:68_10: ca asampayutto nāma natthīti samudāyassa tehi sampayuttatā vuttā, evamidhāpi vicārena
tika-abh03t:68_11: asampayuttassa avitakkavicāramattassa kassaci abhāvato samudāyassa tena sampayuttatā
tika-abh03t:68_12: na na sakkā vattuṃ. Na hi avitakkavicāramattānaṃ dassanenapahātabbahetukādīnaṃ viya
tika-abh03t:68_13: sampayuttatā na vattabbā. Yathā hi dassanenapahātabbahetukesu keci saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena
tika-abh03t:68_14: mohena sampayuttā, keci asampayuttāti na samudāyo tena sampayutto, nāpi añño koci
tika-abh03t:68_15: dhammo atthi, yena so samudāyo sampayutto siyāti “dassanenapahātabbahetukā dhammā
tika-abh03t:68_16: sampayuttāti natthī”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukasahetukādayopi. Na panevaṃ
tika-abh03t:68_17: yena avitakkavicāramattasamudāyo sampayutto siyā, taṃ natthi avitakkavicāramattesu
tika-abh03t:68_18: kassaci vicārena asampayuttassa abhāvā, tasmā te “sampayuttā”ti na na vattabbāti.
tika-abh03t:68_19: Sabbattha ca ekadhammepi kehicīti bahuvacananiddeso saṅkhāya aniyamitattā katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:71_1: gahitā. Samudayasaccādīni satipi tehi sampayutte, sampayuttehi ca vippayutte sampayuttenavippayuttānaṃ
tika-abh03t:71_2: khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvato. Na hi samudayasaccena sampayuttehi lobhasahagatacittuppādehi
tika-abh03t:71_3: vippayuttānaṃ tato aññadhammānaṃ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo atthi. Nanu ca te eva
tika-abh03t:71_4: cittuppādā cattāro khandhā aḍḍhadutiyāni āyatanāni aḍḍhadutiyā dhātuyo ca hontīti
tika-abh03t:71_5: tehi vippayogo vattabboti? Na, tadaññadhammānaṃ khandhādibhāvato. Na hi te eva dhammā
tika-abh03t:71_6: cattāro khandhā, atha kho te ca tato aññe ca, tathā aḍḍhadutiyāyatanadhātuyopi. Na
tika-abh03t:71_7: ca tadaññasamudāyehi aññe vippayuttā honti samudāyekadesānaṃ ekadesaññasamudāyānañca
tika-abh03t:71_8: vippayogābhāvato. Esa nayo maggasaccasukhindriyādīsu. Avitakkavicāramattesupi niravasesesu
tika-abh03t:71_9: adhippetesu tesaṃ savitakkasavicārasamānagatikattā aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati.
tika-abh03t:72_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evarūpānīti yathā rūpakkhandhe vissajjanaṃ na yujjati, evaṃ yesu
tika-abh03t:72_1: aññesupi na yujjati, tāni vissajjanassa ayogena “evarūpānī”ti vuttāni, na sampayuttābhāvenāti
tika-abh03t:72_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme dīpentīti etena vedanākkhandhādipadāni
tika-abh03t:72_3: dasseti, viññāṇañca aññena asammissanti viññāṇakkhandhamanāyatanādipadāni. Tattha
tika-abh03t:72_5: hi sampayuttehi sammissaviññāṇadīpakāni idha gahitānīti. Etena ca lakkhaṇena evarūpāneva
tika-abh03t:72_6: gahitānīti dasseti, na evarūpāni gahitānevāti samudayasaccādiiddhipādādipadānaṃ asaṅgahitattā.
tika-abh03t:72_7: “Atha phassasattakaṃ cittaṃ saha yuttapadehi sattā”ti purāṇapāṭho, ayaṃ pana ūnoti
tika-abh03t:72_8: katvā “atha phassasattakaṃ, tike tayo satta mahantare cā”ti pāṭho kato.
tika-abh03t:73_0: 309. Pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṃ vippayuttānaṃ vasenāti idaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭapadena
tika-abh03t:73_1: sampayuttehi vippayuttā tena saddhiṃ vippayuttā hontīti katvā vuttaṃ. Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:73_2: dve ca manena yuttā, vitakkavicāraṇāti manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā dve vitakkavicārāti
tika-abh03t:76_1: yathāniddhāritaṃ natthīti “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye
tika-abh03t:76_2: dhammā sampayuttā”ti avatvā “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi
tika-abh03t:76_3: khandhehi…pe… sampayuttāti natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Tena rūpakkhandhena vippayuttānaṃ kenaci
tika-abh03t:76_5: kuto tassa puna khandhādīhi sampayuttatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:79_1: yassa khandhādino vasenāti attho. Tassevāti ca tasseva khandhādinoti attho. Idaṃ
tika-abh03t:79_2: vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ idha sampayuttaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu yena vedanākkhandhādinā
tika-abh03t:79_3: sampayuttaṃ, puna tasseva vedanākkhandhādino khandhādīhi sampayogaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ
tika-abh03t:79_4: kataṃ. Tañhi attanā sampayuttena sampayuttattā “sampayuttena sampayutta”nti niddhāritanti.
tika-abh03t:79_5: Rūpena vāti etena nirodhasaccaappaccayaasaṅkhatehipi ayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t:79_6: tathā rūpamissakehi vāti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi. Vakkhati
tika-abh03t:79_8: sampayogo labbhatīti vattamānesu ekampi dhammaṃ anapanetvā avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi
tika-abh03t:79_9: arūpabhavādīhīti attho. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – ye sampayogaṃ na labhanti rūpakkhandhādayo,
tika-abh03t:79_10: te sabbe na gahitā, itare ca vedanākkhandhādayo sabbe gahitāti.
tika-abh03t:82_1: tehi vippayuttassa abhāvā na gahitā, dukkhasaccacatumahābhavaabyākatādidhammā tehi
tika-abh03t:82_2: vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvatoti ayaṃ viseso veditabboti.
tika-abh03t:85_0: 409. Ekādasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṃ “te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi ekena manāyatanena sattahi
tika-abh03t:85_1: viññāṇadhātūhī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ “sampayuttā nāmā”ti etena saha sambandho. “Kehicī”ti
tika-abh03t:85_2: etassa panatthaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā
tika-abh03t:85_3: taṇha”nti etena “te cā”ti vutte samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitadhamme
tika-abh03t:85_4: visesetvā tesaṃ eva visesitānaṃ attavajjehi sesehi saṅkhārakkhandhe taṇhāya dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu
tika-abh03t:85_5: ca taṇhāya vedanāsaññākkhandhehi sampayogārahehi sampayuttataṃ sandhāyāha “sesehi
tika-abh03t:88: 417. Dvādasamanaye ca navamanaye viya sampayogārahāva labbhantīti āha “teyeva uddhaṭā”ti.
tika-abh03t:91_0: 448. Terasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṃ yehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ viññāṇameva hoti, te
tika-abh03t:91_2: sadisapañhā dhammā”ti vuttā. Yehi pana tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāni arūpabhavena
tika-abh03t:91_3: viya oḷārikāyatanāneva honti, te vuttāvasesā sabbe idha uddhaṭā “arūpabhavena sadisā”ti
tika-abh03t:91_4: vuttā. Sesāti sesā pañcamanaye āgatā vedanākkhandhādayo satipi asaṅgāhakatte idha
tika-abh03t:91_5: vissajjanaṃ na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā. Ye pana asaṅgāhakā eva na honti dukkhasaccādidhammā,
tika-abh03t:91_6: tesu vattabbameva natthi. Yathā pana vedanākkhandhādayo na ruhanti, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh03t:91_7: “vedanākkhandhena hī”tiādimāha. Tattha tesañca sampayogo nāma natthīti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh03t:92_0: Yadi pana te kadāci asabbaviññāṇadhātusampayuttā arūpadhammā rūpadhammā ca siyuṃ,
tika-abh03t:92_1: na tesaṃ vippayogo natthīti “vippayogo ca natthī”ti na vuttaṃ, na vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh03t:92_2: asaṅgahitānaṃ vippayogassa atthitāyāti veditabbaṃ. Ubhayābhāvato hi vedanākkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t:92_3: idha na ruhantīti. Evaṃ panettha siyā “vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena anārammaṇamissakā
tika-abh03t:92_4: sattaviññāṇadhātudhammā asaṅgahitā honti, tesañca sampayogo vippayogo ca natthī”ti.
tika-abh03t:92_8: catubbidho vippayogo. Tattha jātivippayogo “kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā”tiādi,
tika-abh03t:92_10: dhammā”tiādi, santānavippayogo “ajjhattā dhammā, bahiddhā dhammā”tiādi. Evaṃ vippayogo catudhā veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:95_1: vippayogassa aruhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jātiādittayassa cettha dhammasabhāvamattattā na
tika-abh03t:95_2: kathañci sampayogo vippayogo ca ruhati ajjhattabahiddhadhammānaṃ sabbadhammasamodhānattā,
tika-abh03t:96_0: Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṃ samucchede na labbhantīti pariyosāne naye na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t:96_1: Moghapucchakena cāti alabbhamānā ca te moghapucchakena hetunā na labbhanti tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:96_2: pucchāya moghattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā moghapucchako aṭṭhamo nayo, tena ca saha
tika-abh03t:96_3: osānanaye ete dhammā vippayogassapi abhāvā sabbathāpi na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t:101_0: 1. Dhammasaṅgahe tikadukavasena saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ vibhaṅge khandhādivibhāgaṃ
tika-abh03t:101_1: dassetvā tathāsaṅgahitavibhattānaṃ dhātukathāya saṅgahāsaṅgahādippabhedaṃ vatvā yāya
tika-abh03t:101_2: paññattiyā tesaṃ sabhāvato upādāya ca paññāpanaṃ hoti, taṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ “cha
tika-abh03t:101_3: paññattiyo”tiādinā puggalapaññatti āraddhā. Tattha ye dhamme pubbāpariyabhāvena pavattamāne
tika-abh03t:101_4: asabhāvasamūhavasena upādāya “puggalo, itthī, puriso, devo, manusso”tiādikā puggalapaññatti
tika-abh03t:101_5: hoti, tesaṃ aññesañca bāhirarūpanibbānānaṃ sasabhāvasamūhasasabhāvabhedavasena paññāpanā
tika-abh03t:101_6: sabhāvapaññattīti khandhapaññattiādikā pañcavidhā veditabbā. Tāya dhammasaṅgahādīsu
tika-abh03t:101_7: vibhattā sabhāvapaññatti sabbāpi saṅgahitā hoti. Puggalapaññatti pana asabhāvapaññatti.
tika-abh03t:101_8: Tāya ca samayavimuttādippabhedāya sattasantānagate pariññeyyādisabhāvadhamme upādāya
tika-abh03t:101_9: pavattito padhānāya “vihāro mañco”tiādikā ca sabbā asabhāvapaññatti saṅgahitā hoti.
tika-abh03t:102_0: Ettāvatā ca paññatti nāma vijjamānapaññatti avijjamānapaññatti ca. Tā eva hi vomissā
tika-abh03t:102_1: itarā catassoti. Tasmā tāsaṃ dassanena imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sabbā paññattiyo dassitāti
tika-abh03t:102_2: veditabbā. Khandhādipaññattīsu pana chasu aññattha adassitappabhedaṃ idheva ca dassitappabhedaṃ
tika-abh03t:102_3: puggalapaññattiṃ upādāya imassa pakaraṇassa puggalapaññattīti nāmaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:102_4: Ye dhamme idha paññapetukāmoti paññattiyā vatthubhāvena dassetukāmoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:102_5: Na hi etasmiṃ pakaraṇe paññāpanaṃ karoti, vatthūhi pana paññattiyo dassetīti.
tika-abh03t:103_0: Khandhāti paññāpanāti idaṃ khandhāti rūpaṃ pathavītiādikā sabbāpi sāmaññappabhedapaññāpanā
tika-abh03t:103_1: nāma hoti, taṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paññāpanāti etassa pana dassanā ṭhapanāti
tika-abh03t:103_2: ete dve atthā, tesaṃ pakāsanā nikkhipanāti. Tattha “rūpakkhandho…pe… aññātāvindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:103_4: nikkhipanā, na paññapetabbānaṃ mañcādīnaṃ viya ṭhānasambandhakaraṇaṃ. Yo panāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:103_5: “nāmapaññatti hi dasseti ca ṭhapeti cā”ti kattuniddeso kato, so bhāvabhūtāya karaṇabhūtāya
tika-abh03t:103_6: vā nāmapaññattiyā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ diṭṭhatāya ṭhapitatāya ca taṃnimittataṃ sandhāya katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:104_1: Kusalākusalassevāti kusalākusalassa viya. Vijjamānassāti etassa attho satoti, tassa
tika-abh03t:104_2: attho sambhūtassāti. Vijjamānassa satoti vā vijjamānabhūtassāti attho. Tamevatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:104_3: dassento āha “sambhūtassā”ti. Tena avijjamānabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tathā avijjamānassāti
tika-abh03t:104_4: yathā kusalādīni akusalādisabhāvato, phassādayo ca vedanādisabhāvato vinivattasabhāvāni
tika-abh03t:104_5: vijjanti, tathā avijjamānassa ye dhamme upādāya “itthī, puriso”ti upaladdhi hoti,
tika-abh03t:104_6: te apanetvā tehi vinivattassa itthiādisabhāvassa abhāvato asambhūtassāti attho. Yaṃ
tika-abh03t:104_7: panetassa “tenākārena avijjamānassa aññenākārena vijjamānassā”ti atthaṃ keci vadanti,
tika-abh03t:104_8: tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paññattiduke vuttameva. Avijjamānepi sabhāve lokaniruttiṃ
tika-abh03t:104_10: āha. Sābhinivesena pana cittena gayhamānaṃ pañcamasaccādikaṃ na sabhāvato, nāpi saṅketena
tika-abh03t:104_11: siddhanti “sabbākārenapi anupalabbhaneyya”nti vuttaṃ. Tāsu imasmiṃ…pe… labbhantīti
tika-abh03t:104_12: imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sarūpato tissannaṃ āgatataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:105_0: Yathāvuttassa pana aṭṭhakathānayassa avirodhena ācariyavādā yojetabbā, tasmā paññapetabbaṭṭhena
tika-abh03t:105_1: cesā paññattīti etassa sabhāvato avijjamānattā paññapetabbamattaṭṭhena paññattīti
tika-abh03t:105_2: attho. Paññapetabbampi hi sasabhāvaṃ tajjaparamatthanāmalābhato na parato labhitabbaṃ
tika-abh03t:105_3: paññattināmaṃ labhati, nisabhāvaṃ pana sabhāvābhāvato na attano sabhāvena nāmaṃ labhatīti.
tika-abh03t:105_4: Sattotiādikena nāmena paññapitabbamattaṭṭhena paññattīti nāmaṃ labhati, nisabhāvā
tika-abh03t:105_5: ca sattādayo. Na hi sasabhāvassa rūpādīhi ekattena aññattena vā anupalabbhasabhāvatā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:106_0: Kirīṭaṃ makuṭaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti kirīṭī. Etasmiñca ācariyavāde anūnena lakkhaṇena
tika-abh03t:106_1: bhavitabbanti sabbasamorodho kātabbo. Dutiyaṃ tatiyanti evaṃpakārā hi upanidhāpaññatti
tika-abh03t:106_2: upanikkhittakapaññatti ca saṅkhātabbappadhānattā chapi paññattiyo bhajatīti yuttaṃ
tika-abh03t:106_3: vattuṃ, itarā ca yathāyogaṃ taṃ taṃ paññattinti. Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ dve tīṇītiādi pana
tika-abh03t:106_4: saṅkhā nāma kāci natthīti tāsaṃ upādāsantatipaññattīnaṃ avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ,
tika-abh03t:106_7: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ dve tīṇītiādīnaṃ upanidhāupanikkhittakapaññattīnaṃ avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattibhāvameva
tika-abh03t:106_8: maññati. Yañhi paṭhamādikaṃ apekkhitvā yassa cekādikassa upanikkhipitvā paññāpīyati,
tika-abh03t:106_9: tañca saṅkhānaṃ kiñci natthīti. Tathā santatipaññattiyā ca. Na hi asīti āsītiko ca vijjamānoti.
tika-abh03t:107_0: Ekaccā bhūmipaññattīti kāmāvacarādipaññattiṃ sandhāyāha. Kāmāvacarādī hi sabhāvadhammāti
tika-abh03t:107_1: adhippāyo. Kāmoti pana okāse gahite avijjamānenavijjamānapaññatti esā bhavituṃ arahati,
tika-abh03t:107_2: kammanibbattakkhandhesu gahitesu vijjamānenavijjamānapaññatti. Yathā pana vacanasaṅkhātāya
tika-abh03t:107_3: vacanasamuṭṭhāpakacetanāsaṅkhātāya vā kiriyāya bhāṇakoti puggalassa paññatti vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññattipakkhaṃ
tika-abh03t:107_4: bhajati, evaṃ kiso thūloti rūpāyatanasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānena puggalādīnaṃ paññāpanā
tika-abh03t:107_5: vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti bhavituṃ arahati. Saṇṭhānanti vā rūpāyatane aggahite
tika-abh03t:107_6: avijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti. Rūpaṃ phassotiādikā pana vijjamānapaññatti ruppanādikiccavasena
tika-abh03t:107_8: Vijjamānāvijjamānapaññattīsu ca vuttāsu tāsaṃ vomissatāvasena pavattā itarāpi vuttāyeva
tika-abh03t:108_1: Tattha yāvatā pañcakkhandhāti yāvatā rūpakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandhoti khandhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:108_2: khandhapaññatti, ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti, evaṃ pāḷiyojanaṃ katvā saṅkhepappabhedavasena
tika-abh03t:108_3: ayaṃ attho vuttoti veditabbo. “Yāvatā pañcakkhandhā”ti, “khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti
tika-abh03t:108_4: hi imassa attho “yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato pañcakkhandhāti vā”ti etena dassito,
tika-abh03t:108_6: rūpakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandhoti pabhedanidassanamattametaṃ. Tena avuttopi sabbo
tika-abh03t:108_7: saṅgahito hotīti “tatrāpi rūpakkhandho kāmāvacaro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ vā ettha pāḷiyā
tika-abh03t:108_8: atthayojanā – “yāvatā”ti idaṃ sabbehi padehi yojetvā yattakā pañcakkhandhā, tattakā
tika-abh03t:108_9: khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti. Yattako pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ tappabhedānañca rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:108_10: pabhedo, tattako khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattiyā pabhedoti pakaraṇantare vuttena vatthubhedena
tika-abh03t:108_11: khandhapaññattiyā pabhedaṃ dasseti. Esa nayo “yāvatā āyatanāna”ntiādīsupi.
tika-abh03t:113_1: Yena hi saddhintiādinā paṭhamaṃ samaṅgibhāvatthaṃ vivarati. Phassenapi phuṭṭhāyeva
tika-abh03t:113_2: nāmāti etena “apicesā”tiādinā vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ samphassena phusanatthaṃ, itarehi itare
tika-abh03t:113_3: kāraṇatthe. Samaṅgibhāvaphusanakāraṇabhāvā hi phusanāti vuttāti. Punapi paṭhamatthameva
tika-abh03t:113_4: dubbiññeyyattā vivaranto “tatrāssā”tiādimāha. Ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgāni sesā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammāti
tika-abh03t:113_5: ettha vedanāsomanassindriyāni saṅgahitānīti āha “cattāro khandhā hontī”ti. Evaṃ sati
tika-abh03t:113_6: vedanāsomanassindriyehi sukhassa phusitabbattā tiṇṇañca tesaṃ anaññattā teneva tassa
tika-abh03t:113_8: vuttattā. Atha vā ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgānīti aṅgānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacanaṃ. Tesu pana paccekampi
tika-abh03t:113_9: yojanā kātabbā “vitakkaṃ ṭhapetvā”tiādinā. Tattha “sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti imissā yojanāya
tika-abh03t:113_10: sesā tayo khandhā honti, itarāsu cattāroti. Sabbayojanāsu ca tayo anto katvā “cattāro
tika-abh03t:114_0: 2. Yo asamayavimokkhena ekaccehi āsavehi vimutto asamayavimokkhūpanissayalābhena
tika-abh03t:114_1: ca sātisayena samayavimokkhena, so eva samayavimutto. So hi tena vimutto jhānalābhī
tika-abh03t:114_2: sekkho rūpārūpabhavato apunarāvaṭṭako kāmarāgādīhi tathāvimuttova hotīti samayavimuttapaññattiṃ
tika-abh03t:114_3: laddhuṃ arahati. Puthujjano pana jhānalābhī punarāvaṭṭakadhammo puna kāmarāgādisamudācārabhāvato
tika-abh03t:114_4: vimutto nāma na hotīti samayavimuttapaññattiṃ nārahati, tena so “samayavimutto”ti
tika-abh03t:114_5: na vutto. Arahato pana aparikkhīṇā āsavā natthi, yato vimucceyya. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramattā
tika-abh03t:114_6: hi tassa aṭṭha vimokkhāti. Tasmā tassa na aṭṭha vimokkhā samayavimuttapaññattibhāvassa
tika-abh03t:114_7: asamayavimuttapaññattibhāvassa vā kāraṇaṃ. Tadakāraṇabhāvameva dassetuṃ “na heva
tika-abh03t:114_8: kho…pe… viharatī”ti vuttaṃ, na sukkhavipassakasseva asamayavimuttabhāvaṃ dassetunti
tika-abh03t:114_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbopi hi arahā asamayavimuttoti. Bāhirānanti lokuttarato bahibhūtānaṃ, lokiyānanti attho.
tika-abh03t:115_0: 3. Arūpakkhandhanibbānamattavācako arūpasaddo na hotīti dassanatthaṃ “rūpato añña”ntiādi
tika-abh03t:115_1: vuttaṃ. Cittamañjūsanti samādhiṃ. Abhiññādīnañhi dhammānaṃ pādakabhāvena samādhi
tika-abh03t:115_2: mañjūsāsadiso hoti. Addhānaṃ pharitunti dīghakālaṃ byāpetuṃ, pavattetunti attho.
tika-abh03t:115_3: “Sammajjitabba”nti cintetvā tattha ādarassa akatattā vattabhedoti veditabbo. Evaṃ
tika-abh03t:115_4: vattabhedamattena naṭṭhā pana samāpatti kāmacchandādīhi naṭṭhā viya na kiñcena paccāharitabbā
tika-abh03t:115_5: hoti mandapāripanthakattā, tasmā vattasamitakaraṇamatteneva paccāharitabbattā “appentova nisīdī”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:116_0: 4. Attano anurūpena pamādena vītināmentānampi samāpatti na kuppatīti parihīno nāma
tika-abh03t:116_1: na hoti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ byāsaṅge paṭisaṃhaṭamatte samāpajjituṃ samatthatāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:116_2: “Kissa pana, bhante, khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno lābhasakkārasiloko antarāyāyāti? Yā hissa
tika-abh03t:116_3: sā, ānanda, akuppā cetovimutti, nāhaṃ tassā lābhasakkārasilokaṃ antarāyāya vadāmi.
tika-abh03t:116_4: Ye ca khvassa, ānanda, appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārā
tika-abh03t:116_5: adhigatā, tesāhamassa lābhasakkārasilokaṃ antarāyāya vadāmī”ti sutte pana samayena
tika-abh03t:116_6: samayaṃ āpajjanena pariharitabbānaṃ samāpattisukhavihārānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ byāsaṅgakāle
tika-abh03t:116_7: anipphattito lābhasakkārasiloko antarāyoti vuttoti adhippāyenassa tena avirodho veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:117_0: 5. Dhammānaṃ…pe… pīti ettha “dhammehī”ti vattabbaṃ. Idha hi tāhi samāpattīhi parihāyeyyāti
tika-abh03t:117_1: dhammehi puggalassa parihānampi aparihānampi vuttaṃ. Tattha ca puggalassa pamādamāgamma
tika-abh03t:117_2: tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyunti dhammānaṃ kuppanaṃ akuppanañca vuttaṃ, puggalassa pana
tika-abh03t:117_3: parihānadhammānameva vināsoti vacananānattamattena vacanatthanānattamattena vā pariyāyantaratā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:118_0: 7-8. Cetanā samāpatticetanā tadāyūhanā ca. Anurakkhaṇā samāpattiupakārānupakārapariggāhikā
tika-abh03t:118_1: paññāsahitā sati. Tāhi cetiyamānaanurakkhiyamānasamāpattīnaṃ bhabbā cetanābhabbā anurakkhaṇābhabbā.
tika-abh03t:119: 10. Puthujjanagottanti puthujjanasikkhaṃ, puthujjanagatā tisso sikkhā atikkantāti attho. Tā hi saṃyojanattayānupacchedena “puthujjanasikkhā”ti vuccantīti.
tika-abh03t:120: 11. Arahattamaggaṭṭho ca vaṭṭabhayato paññubbegena ubbijjanto uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanehi uparatoti bhayūparato nāmāti āha “satta sekkhā bhayūparatā”ti.
tika-abh03t:121_2: Paññāya hi vinā na tadupanissayo atthīti.
tika-abh03t:122: 14. Yattha niyatāniyatavomissā pavatti atthi, tattheva niyatadhammā hontīti uttarakurūsu tadabhāvā niyato nāma natthīti dassento “yā pana uttarakurukāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:123_0: 16. Terasasu sīsesu palibodhasīsādīni pavattasīsañca pariyādiyitabbāni, adhimokkhasīsādīni
tika-abh03t:123_1: pariyādakāni, pariyādakaphalaṃ gocarasīsaṃ. Tañhi visayajjhattaphalavimokkhoti. Pariyādakassa
tika-abh03t:123_2: maggassa phalassa ca ārammaṇaṃ saṅkhārasīsaṃ saṅkhāravivekabhūto nirodhoti pariyādiyitabbānaṃ
tika-abh03t:123_3: pariyādakaphalārammaṇānaṃ saha viya saṃsiddhidassanena samasīsibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:123_4: terasa sīsāni vuttāni. Idha pana “apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañcā”ti
tika-abh03t:123_5: vacanato tesu kilesapavattasīsānameva vasena yojanaṃ karonto “tattha kilesasīsa”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:123_6: Tattha pavattasīsampi vaṭṭato vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena
tika-abh03t:123_7: yadipi pariyādiyati, yāva pana cuti, tāva pavattisabbhāvato “pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:123_8: cuticittaṃ pariyādiyatī”ti āha. Kilesapariyādānena pana attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā
tika-abh03t:123_9: paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti. “Vimuttasmiṃ
tika-abh03t:123_10: vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vacanato hi paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ
tika-abh03t:123_11: samāpitaṃ nāma hoti. Taṃ pana parisamāpanaṃ yadi cuticittena hoti, teneva jīvitaparisamāpanañca
tika-abh03t:123_13: hotīti āha “vārasamatāyā”ti. Bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyatīti ettha parinibbānacittameva
tika-abh03t:124: 17. Mahāpayogoti mahākiriyo vipattikaraṇamahāmeghuṭṭhānākāravināso. Tiṭṭheyyāti vināso nappavatteyyāti attho.
tika-abh03t:126: 20. Yāya katakiccatā hoti, tāya aggavijjāya adhigatāya tevijjatābhāvo nippariyāyatā, sā ca āgamanavasena siddhā sātisayā tevijjatāti āha “āgamanīyameva dhura”nti.
tika-abh03t:127: 22. Tattha cāti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇappattiyā ādhārabhāve vā. Tattheva hi sabbaññutaṃ patto nāma hotīti.
tika-abh03t:128: 23. Ananussutesu dhammesūti ca ananussutesu saccesūti attho.
tika-abh03t:129_0: 24. “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā “yato
tika-abh03t:129_1: kho, ānanda, bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā
tika-abh03t:129_2: āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. Ayaṃ vuccati, ānanda, bhikkhu ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti yadipi
tika-abh03t:129_3: mahānidānasutte vuttaṃ, taṃ pana ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭhavasena vuttanti idha kīṭāgirisuttavasena
tika-abh03t:129_5: viharatī”ti āha. Kīṭāgirisutte hi “idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā
tika-abh03t:129_6: atikkamma rūpe āruppā, te kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā
tika-abh03t:129_7: honti. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti arūpasamāpattivasena
tika-abh03t:129_8: cattāro ubhatobhāgavimuttā vuttā, ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho ca vuttalakkhaṇopapattitoti.
tika-abh03t:130_0: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti na āsavā paññāya passanti, dassanakāraṇā
tika-abh03t:130_1: pana parikkhīṇā disvā parikkhīṇāti vuttā. Dassanāyattaparikkhayattā eva hi dassanaṃ
tika-abh03t:130_2: purimakiriyā hotīti. Nāmanissitako esoti eso ubhatobhāgavimutto rūpato muccitvā nāmaṃ
tika-abh03t:130_3: nissāya ṭhito puna tato muccanato “nāmanissitako”ti vatvā tassa ca sādhakaṃ suttaṃ
tika-abh03t:130_4: vatvā “kāyadvayato suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti āhāti attho. Sutte hi ākiñcaññāyatanalābhino
tika-abh03t:130_5: upasīvabrāhmaṇassa bhagavatā nāmakāyā vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimuttoti muni akkhātoti.
tika-abh03t:131_0: Paṭhamattheravāde dvīhi bhāgehi vimutto ubhatobhāgavimutto, dutiyattheravāde ubhato
tika-abh03t:131_1: bhāgato vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimuttoti, tatiyattheravāde dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti
tika-abh03t:131_2: ayametesaṃ viseso. Tattha vimuttoti kilesehi vimutto, kilesavikkhambhanasamucchedanehi
tika-abh03t:131_3: vā kāyadvayato vimuttoti attho daṭṭhabbo. Arūpāvacaraṃ pana nāmakāyato ca vimuttanti
tika-abh03t:131_4: nīvaraṇasaṅkhātanāmakāyato vimuttanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tañhi nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena nāmakāyato
tika-abh03t:131_5: rūpataṇhāvikkhambhanena rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā ekadesena ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ nāma
tika-abh03t:131_6: hotīti arahattamaggassa pādakabhūtaṃ ubhatobhāgavimuttanāmalābhassa kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:132_0: 25. Etesu hi ekopi aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī na hotīti ubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ
tika-abh03t:132_1: rūpakāyato vimuttaṃ ekampi vimokkhaṃ anadhigatoti adhippāyo. Arūpāvacaresu hi ekampi
tika-abh03t:133_0: 26. Phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikarotīti phuṭṭhānaṃ anto phuṭṭhanto, phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
tika-abh03t:133_1: anantaro kāloti adhippāyo. Accantasaṃyoge cettha upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Phuṭṭhānantarakālameva
tika-abh03t:133_2: sacchikaroti sacchikātabbopāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Ekamantaṃ nisīdī”tiādīsu viya bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ
tika-abh03t:133_3: vā etaṃ. Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena
tika-abh03t:133_4: vimutto, tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti, na pana kāyena
tika-abh03t:133_5: sacchikato. Nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato
tika-abh03t:133_6: hoti, tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhīti
tika-abh03t:133_7: vuccati, na tu vimuttoti ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-abh03t:134_0: 27. Diṭṭhattā pattoti etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ
tika-abh03t:134_1: dīpeti. “Diṭṭhantaṃ patto”ti vā pāṭho, dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ
tika-abh03t:134_2: pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti.
tika-abh03t:135_0: 28. Imaṃ pana nayaṃ “no”ti paṭikkhipitvāti ettha diṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttabhāvappattānaṃ
tika-abh03t:135_1: paññānānattaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana yena visesena so viseso patto, so vuttoti imaṃ dosaṃ
tika-abh03t:135_2: disvā paṭikkhepo katoti daṭṭhabbo. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsūti ca vacanena āgamanīyanānattasanniṭṭhānameva
tika-abh03t:135_3: thiraṃ karotīti veditabbaṃ. Saddahanto vimuttoti etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena
tika-abh03t:135_4: vimuttabhāvaṃ dasseti. Saddhāvimuttoti vā saddhāya adhimuttoti attho.
tika-abh03t:136: 29. Paññaṃ vāhetīti paññaṃ sātisayaṃ pavattetīti attho. Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti nibbānābhimukhaṃ gametīti attho.
tika-abh03t:137_0: 31. Evaṃ maggakkhaṇepīti ayaṃ api-saddo kasmā vutto, nanu ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena
tika-abh03t:137_1: samannāgato maggakkhaṇe eva hotīti tadā eva sotāpanno nāmāti āpannanti? Nāpannaṃ.
tika-abh03t:137_2: Maggena hi attanā sadisassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa vā sattaṅgikassa vā phalassa sototi nāmaṃ
tika-abh03t:137_3: dinnanti tenapi samannāgatassa sotāpannabhāvato, sotena vā maggena pavattetuṃ aparihīnena
tika-abh03t:137_4: phalaṭṭhopi samannāgato eva nāma, na ca tena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe viya soto samāpajjiyamāno,
tika-abh03t:137_5: tasmā samāpannasotattā paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya “sotāpanno”ti vattuṃ yutto. Vuttañhi
tika-abh03t:137_6: “ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannā, sabbe te sotāpannā. Tesaṃ sotāpannānaṃ
tika-abh03t:137_7: pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhā”ti. Tattha dutiyaphalaṭṭhādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:137_8: visuṃ nāmaṃ atthīti paṭhamaphalaṭṭho eva itarehi visesiyamāno “sotāpanno”ti vattuṃ
tika-abh03t:137_9: yuttoti so eva idhādhippeto. Paṭiladdhamaggena bujjhatīti etena paṭiladdhamaggassa
tika-abh03t:137_10: catusaccapaccavekkhaṇādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ nissayo
tika-abh03t:137_11: etassāti hi sambodhiparāyaṇoti. Dutiyenatthena sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ gati etassāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
tika-abh03t:138: 32. Kevalena kulasaddena mahākulameva vuccatīti āha “mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho”ti.
tika-abh03t:139_0: 33. Khandhabījaṃ nāma paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ. Ihaṭṭhakanijjhānikavaseneva imasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-abh03t:139_1: kathitāti sajjhānako ajjhattasaṃyojanasamucchede akatepi anāgāmisabhāgo anāvattidhammo
tika-abh03t:139_2: idha gaṇanūpago na hoti, heṭṭhā upari ca saṃsaraṇako kāmabhavagato hīnajjhānako idha
tika-abh03t:140: 34. Yaṃ vattabbanti “dvīhi kāraṇehi tanubhāvo veditabbo”tiādi yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-abh03t:141_0: 36. Upapannaṃ vā samanantarāti upapannaṃ vā etena puggalena hoti, atha samanantarā
tika-abh03t:141_1: ariyamaggaṃ sañjaneti. Appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ tassa puggalassa
tika-abh03t:141_2: vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ hoti, etthantare ariyamaggaṃ sañjanetīti ayamettha pāḷiattho.
tika-abh03t:141_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “appatvā pabbataṃ nadī”ti viya āyuppamāṇaṃ vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ
tika-abh03t:141_4: vā hutvāti parasaddayoge parato bhūto hutvā saddo vacanasesabhūto payuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:142: 37. Upahaccāti etassa upagantvāti attho, tena vemajjhātikkamo kālakiriyopagamanañca saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “atikkamitvā vemajjha”ntiādi.
tika-abh03t:143_0: 40. Uddhaṃvāhibhāvenāti uddhaṃ vahatīti uddhaṃvāhī, taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vā, tassa
tika-abh03t:143_1: bhāvo, tena uddhaṃvāhibhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Avihesu uddhaṃsoto yadipi tattha parinibbāyī
tika-abh03t:143_2: na hoti, yattha vā tattha vā gantvā parinibbāyatu, parinibbāyino pana tassa asaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā
tika-abh03t:143_3: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyitā ca atthīti tattha dasa anāgāmino vuttā, evaṃ atappādīsupi.
tika-abh03t:143_6: adhimattatā viya samuddaṃ patvā nibbāyanakato anadhimattatā viya ca antarā upahaccaparinibbāyīhi
tika-abh03t:143_7: uddhaṃsotato ca adhimattānadhimattatā. Te eva hi asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyinoti.
tika-abh03t:144_0: No cassa no ca me siyāti avijjāsaṅkhārādikaṃ hetupañcakaṃ no ca assa, viññāṇādikaṃ
tika-abh03t:144_1: idaṃ phalapañcakaṃ vattamānaṃ no ca me siyāti attho. Tena atītabhavasaṃsiddhito dukkhasamudayato
tika-abh03t:144_2: imassa dukkhassa pavattidassanato paccayasamudayaṭṭhena khandhānaṃ udayadassanapaṭipatti
tika-abh03t:144_3: vuttā hoti. Na bhavissati, na me bhavissatīti yadi etarahi hetupañcakaṃ na bhavissati,
tika-abh03t:144_4: anāgate phalapañcakaṃ na me bhavissatīti attho. Etena paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vayadassanapaṭipatti
tika-abh03t:144_5: vuttā hoti, etarahi anāgate ca attattaniyanivāraṇavasena suññatāpaṭipatti vā catūhipi
tika-abh03t:144_6: vuttā. Yadatthīti yaṃ atthi. Bhūtanti sasabhāvaṃ nibbattaṃ vā yathādiṭṭhaudayabbayaṃ
tika-abh03t:144_8: nāmarūpamattanti attho. Vivaṭṭānupassanāya vivaṭṭamānaso taṃ bhūtaṃ pajahāmīti upekkhaṃ
tika-abh03t:144_9: paṭilabhati, saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇena upekkhako hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:145_0: Bhave na rajjati, sambhave na rajjatīti avisiṭṭhe visiṭṭhe ca bhave na rajjatīti
tika-abh03t:145_1: keci vadanti. Paccuppanno pana bhavo bhavo, anāgato jātiyā gahaṇena gahito sambhavoti
tika-abh03t:145_2: veditabbo. Atha vā bhavoti bhūtameva vuccati, sambhavo tadāhāro, tasmiṃ dvaye na
tika-abh03t:145_3: rajjatīti sekkhapaṭipattiṃ dasseti. Bhūte hi sasambhave ca virāgo sekkhapaṭipatti.
tika-abh03t:145_4: Yathāha “bhūtamidanti, bhante, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passati, bhūtamidanti yathābhūtaṃ
tika-abh03t:145_5: sammappaññāya disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti. Tadāhārasambhavanti
tika-abh03t:145_6: yathābhūtaṃ…pe… disvā tadāhārasambhavassa nibbidāya…pe… paṭipanno hoti. Tadāhāranirodhāya
tika-abh03t:145_7: yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ nirodhadhammanti yathābhūtaṃ…pe… disvā nirodhadhammassa nibbidāya
tika-abh03t:145_8: virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhante, sekkho hotī”ti. Athuttarīti
tika-abh03t:145_9: atha evaṃ arajjamāno uttari santaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ anukkamena maggapaññāya sammā passati,
tika-abh03t:145_10: tañca khvassa padaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ sacchikataṃ catutthamaggeneva sacchikātabbassa
tika-abh03t:148_0: 63. Kassaci kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kassaci kathañci avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa
tika-abh03t:148_1: visesapaccayoti ajjhattaṃ nāma. Tattha bandhanaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ, tena sampayutto ajjhattasaṃyojano.
tika-abh03t:149_0: 83. Kāraṇena vinā pavattahitacitto akāraṇavacchalo. Anāgatampi payojanaṃ apekkhamāno
tika-abh03t:149_1: purimaggahitaṃ taṃ kataṃ upādāya kataññū eva nāma hoti, na pubbakārīti āha “karissati
tika-abh03t:149_2: me”tiādi. Tamojotiparāyaṇo puññaphalaṃ anupajīvanto eva puññāni karotīti “pubbakārī”ti
tika-abh03t:149_3: vutto. “Iṇaṃ demī”ti saññaṃ karotīti evaṃsaññaṃ akarontopi karonto viya hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:150: 86. Acchamaṃsaṃ labhitvā sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyatīti acchamaṃsanti jānantopi sūkaramaṃsanti na kukkuccāyati, madditvā vītikkamatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:154_1: “katame ca thapati akusalā sīlā? Akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ pāpako ājīvo”ti
tika-abh03t:154_2: vuttehi samannāgamena. Tassa hi…pe… evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hotīti evaṃ sāsaṅko samācāro hotīti attho.
tika-abh03t:156: 107. Samādhi vā ādīti lokuttaradhammā hi paramatthato sāsananti tadattho pādakasamādhi tassa ādi vutto, tadāsannattā vipassanā, tassa mūlekadesattā maggo.
tika-abh03t:157_0: 108. Ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabboti ucchaṅgasadisapaññatāya eva
tika-abh03t:157_1: paññā viya puggalopi ucchaṅgo viya hoti, tasmiṃ dhammānaṃ aciraṭṭhānatoti adhippāyena
tika-abh03t:158: 109. Yathā ca ucchaṅgasadisā paññā, evaṃ nikkujjakumbhasadisā paññā evāti daṭṭhabbo, tattha dhammānaṃ anavaṭṭhānato.
tika-abh03t:159: 113. Ciraṭṭhānato thiraṭṭhānato ca pāsāṇalekhasadisā parāparādhanibbattā kodhalekhā yassa so pāsāṇalekhūpamasamannāgato pāsāṇalekhūpamoti vutto, evaṃ itarepi.
tika-abh03t:160: 118. Sutādivatthurahito tucchamāno naḷo viyāti “naḷo”ti vuccati, so uggato naḷo etassāti unnaḷo.
tika-abh03t:161: 122. “Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ sīlakathābhavanaṃ paṭhamārambhopi dussīlena saha na hotīti dassento āha neva sīlakathā hotī”ti.
tika-abh03t:162: 123. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ anuggahetabbe paññāya sodhetabbe ca vaḍḍhetabbe ca adhikasīlaṃ nissāya uppannapaññāya anuggaṇhāti nāmāti attho.
tika-abh03t:163: 124. Gūthakūpo viya dussīlyanti etena dussīlyassa gūthasadisattameva dasseti.
tika-abh03t:164_0: 130. No ca sammā paññapetuṃ sakkontīti yebhuyyena na sakkontīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:164_1: vuttaṃ, uppanne tathāgate tasmiṃ anādariyaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ uppādetuṃ vāyamantassa
tika-abh03t:164_2: asamatthabhāvaṃ vā. Titthiyā vā pūraṇādayo adhippetā.
tika-abh03t:167: 133. Parena kataṃ dussīlyaṃ āṇattiyā attanā ca payogena katanti āṇattiyā pāpassa dāyādo “tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo”ti vutto.
tika-abh03t:169: 148. Desanāya dhammānaṃ ñāṇassa āpāthabhāvasampādanaṃ ñāṇugghāṭanaṃ. Saha udāhaṭavelāyāti udāhaṭavelāya saddhiṃ tasmiṃ kāle anatikkante evāti attho.
tika-abh03t:170: 152. Tanti anantaravacanaṃ vadati. “Katamo loko”ti vutte “pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti mahantaṃ atthaṃ saṅgahitvā ṭhitavacanaṃ atthayuttaṃ. Lujjatīti lokoti kāraṇayuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:171_0: 156. Sahitāsahitassāti sahitāsahiteti attho, sahitāsahitassa paricchindaneti vā.
tika-abh03t:171_1: Dveyevāti dutiyacatutthāyeva. Desakasāvakasampattiyā bodhetuṃ samatthatāya sabhāvadhammakathikā,
tika-abh03t:172: 157. Kusaladhammehi cittassa vāsanābhāvanā vāsadhuraṃ. Ayaṃ pāpapuggaloti catuttho vutto, na paṭhamo. Paṭhamo hi avisaṃvādetukāmo verañjabrāhmaṇasadiso adhippetoti.
tika-abh03t:173_0: 159. Puggalepi ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatāti puggale abhikkamanādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ
tika-abh03t:173_1: abhikkamanādisadisatāti attho, ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādinā puggalassa sadisatāti vā
tika-abh03t:174_0: 166. Dussīlaṃ “dussīlo”ti vadanto bhūtaṃ bhāsati nāma. Pāṇātipātena dussīlaṃ adinnādānena
tika-abh03t:174_1: dussīloti avatvā pāṇātipātenevāti vadanto tacchaṃ bhāsati nāma. Yamidaṃ “kālenā”ti
tika-abh03t:174_2: vuttaṃ, tatra tasmiṃ vacane, yo “kālena bhaṇatī”ti vutto, so kīdisoti dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:174_3: “kālaññū hotī”tiādi vuttanti dassento “yamidaṃ kālenāti vuttaṃ, tatra yo puggalo”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:175_0: 168. Āgamanavipatti nāma kammaṃ, pubbuppannapaccayavipatti sukkasoṇitaṃ. Pavatte,
tika-abh03t:175_1: pavattassa vā paccayā pavattapaccayā, āhārādayo. Jotetīti joti, āloko. Kulasampattiyādīhi
tika-abh03t:176_0: 173. Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇāpi yehi kilesehi vimutto avimutto ca, tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:177_0: 174. Yāni kānici tantāvutānanti tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ yāni kānici vatthānīti vuttaṃ
tika-abh03t:177_1: hoti. Sāyaṃ tatiyaṃ assāti sāyatatiyo. Anuyuñjanaṃ anuyogo. Taṃ anuyuttoti upayogavacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:178_0: 178. Tattha sikkhanabhāvenāti sikkhāya sājīve ca sikkhanabhāvena. Sikkhaṃ paripūrentoti
tika-abh03t:178_1: sīlasaṃvaraṃ paripūrento. Sājīvañca avītikkamantoti “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo
tika-abh03t:178_2: byañjanakāyo”ti vuttaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ avītikkamanto hutvāti attho.
tika-abh03t:178_3: Idameva ca dvayaṃ “sikkhana”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha sājīvānatikkamo sikkhāpāripūriyā paccayo.
tika-abh03t:178_4: Tato hi yāva maggā saṃvarapāripūrī hotīti. Vināsanabhāvatoti hiṃsanabhāvato. Haliddirāgo
tika-abh03t:178_5: viya na thirakatho hotīti ettha kathāya aṭṭhitabhāvena haliddirāgasadisatā veditabbā, na puggalassa.
tika-abh03t:179_0: 179. Dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchantīti iti-saddena evaṃpakāre dasseti. Aññaṃ dassetvā
tika-abh03t:179_1: aññassa parivattananti dasagghanakaṃ vatthayugaṃ dassetvā tassa ajānantassa pañcagghanakassa dānaṃ.
tika-abh03t:181_0: 187. Khandhadhammesu aniccādivasena pavattā vipassanā maggaphalalābhena paṭiladdhā
tika-abh03t:181_1: nāma hoti tadalābhena anavaṭṭhānatoti maggaphalalābhī eva “adhipaññādhammavipassanālābhī”ti
tika-abh03t:181_2: vutto, maggaphalañāṇameva ca adhikapaññābhāvato catusaccadhamme sabbadhammassa vare
tika-abh03t:181_3: nibbāne eva vā visiṭṭhadassanabhāvato ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:182: 189. Sutena anupapannoti yathāsutena vā atthena vā na samannāgatoti attho.
tika-abh03t:185_0: 191. Paṭhamapañcake uddeseneva puggalavibhāgo viññāyatīti yathā tesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:185_1: tāya paṭipattiyā te vibhajanto “tatra yvāya”ntiādimāha. Ārambhasaddoti ārambhakiriyāvācako
tika-abh03t:185_2: saddoti attho. Phaluppattiyā maggakiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ hotīti “maggakiccavasena phalameva
tika-abh03t:185_3: vutta”nti āha. Āyācanasādhūti na pasaṃsanādisādhūti attho.
tika-abh03t:186_0: 192. Ādito dheyyaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ ādheyyaṃ, dassanasavanapaṭivacanadānavasena mukhena
tika-abh03t:186_1: viya pavattaṃ gahaṇaṃ mukhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ mukhaṃ ādheyyaṃ, gahaṇatthaṃ pakatimukhameva
tika-abh03t:186_2: vā ādheyyaṃ yassa so ādheyyamukho, avicāretvā ādikathāya eva ṭhapitagahaṇoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:188_0: 199. Gavā khīraṃ aggamakkhāyatīti na evaṃ sambandho, uppattito pana pañca gorase
tika-abh03t:188_1: dassetvā tesu sappimaṇḍassa aggabhāvadassanatthaṃ “gavā khīra”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha
tika-abh03t:191_0: 202. Chakke ekantato pākaṭā sammāsambuddhādayo te yathāvuttaguṇā puggalāti dassento
tika-abh03t:191_1: “sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo”tiādimāha. Tattha tenāti sāmaṃ saccābhisamayo tattha
tika-abh03t:191_2: ca sabbaññutappattibalesu ca vasibhāvappattīti etena sabbena samuditena. “Sabbaññutaññāṇenā”ti
tika-abh03t:191_3: pana vutte sabbamidaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti sāmaṃ saccābhisamayena balesu ca vasibhāvappattiyā
tika-abh03t:191_4: ca vinā sabbaññutaññāṇassa abhāvā, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇenā”ti ettakameva
tika-abh03t:191_5: vuttaṃ. Tattha anācariyakena attanā uppāditenāti vacanena sabbaññutaññāṇassa sācariyakattaṃ
tika-abh03t:191_6: parato uppattiñca paṭisedheti, na sācariyakaṃ parehi uppāditañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
tika-abh03t:191_7: Na hi taṃ tādisaṃ nivāretabbaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh03t:194_0: 203. Saddhā nāma sādhuladdhikāti ummujjatīti etena kusalesu dhammesu antogadhā, bodhipakkhiyadhammesu
tika-abh03t:194_1: vā adhimokkhabhūtā saddhā sādhūti ummujjamānaṃ kusalaṃ dasseti, evaṃ hirīyādīsu ca.
tika-abh03t:194_2: Kusalesu dhammesūti ettha bhummaniddeso tadantogadhatāya tadupakāratāya vā veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:194_3: Ettha ca ummujjati sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesūtiādinā saddhādīnaṃ ummujjanapaññāya
tika-abh03t:194_4: saddhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ dasseti. Teneva “tassa sā saddhā neva tiṭṭhatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:194_5: “Sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesū”ti vā ummujjanassa upakārakaṃ ānisaṃsadassanaṃ vatvā
tika-abh03t:194_6: “ummujjatī”ti etena saddhāsaṅkhātameva ummujjanaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ. Caṅkavāreti
tika-abh03t:194_7: rajakānaṃ khāraparisāvane. Ekakammanibbattā paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisantati eko cittavāroti
tika-abh03t:194_8: cutito anantaro yathāgahito dutiyo hotīti āha “dutiyacittavārenā”ti. Ummujjitvā ṭhitādayo
tika-abh03t:194_9: cattāro tāya tāya jātiyā arahattaṃ asacchikarontā aneke puggalā veditabbā, sacchikaronto
tika-abh03t:194_10: pana ekopi pubbabhāge tatiyapuggalādibhāvaṃ āpajjitvā ante sattamapuggalo hotīti.
tika-abh03t:197_0: 209. Pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhāti ettha ye sotāpannādayo
tika-abh03t:197_1: rūpārūpabhave upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, te idha vihāya niṭṭhāpakkhaṃ bhajamānāpi
tika-abh03t:197_2: ajjhattasaṃyojanānaṃ asamucchinnattā puthujjanasādhāraṇe ca ṭhāne upapattiyā na gahitā.
tika-abh03t:197_3: Asādhāraṇaṭṭhānuppattivasena pana antarāparinibbāyīādayo eva “idha vihāya niṭṭhā”ti
tika-abh03t:202_0: Kathānaṃ vatthubhāvatoti kathāsamudāyassa pakaraṇassa attano ekadesānaṃ okāsabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:202_1: vadati. Samudāye hi ekadesā antogadhāti. Yena pakārena saṅkhepena adesayi, taṃ dassento
tika-abh03t:204_0: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti parinibbānameva parinibbānassa parinibbānantarato
tika-abh03t:204_1: visesanatthaṃ karaṇabhāvena vuttaṃ. Yāya vā nibbānadhātuyā adhigatāya pacchimacittaṃ
tika-abh03t:204_2: appaṭisandhikaṃ jātaṃ, sā tassa appaṭisandhivūpasamassa karaṇabhāvena vuttāti. Dubbalapakkhanti
tika-abh03t:204_3: na kāḷāsokaṃ viya balavantaṃ, atha kho ekamaṇḍalikanti vadanti. Dhammavādīadhammavādīvisesajananasamatthāya
tika-abh03t:204_4: pana paññāya abhāvato dubbalatā vuttā. Tesaṃyevāti bāhuliyānameva, bahussutikātipi
tika-abh03t:204_5: nāmaṃ. Bhinnakāti mūlasaṅgītito mūlanikāyato vā bhinnā, laddhiyā suttantehi liṅgākappehi
tika-abh03t:205_0: Mūlasaṅgahanti pañcasatikasaṅgītiṃ. Aññatra saṅgahitātiādīsu dīghādīsu aññatra saṅgahitato
tika-abh03t:205_1: suttantarāsito taṃ taṃ suttaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā aññatra akariṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṅgahitato
tika-abh03t:205_2: vā aññatra asaṅgahitaṃ suttaṃ aññatra katthaci akariṃsu, aññaṃ vā akariṃsūti attho.
tika-abh03t:205_3: Atthaṃ dhammañcāti pāḷiyā atthaṃ pāḷiñca. Vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasūti vinaye ca
tika-abh03t:206_0: “Dvepānanda, vedanā vuttā mayā pariyāyenā”tiādi pariyāyadesitaṃ. Upekkhāvedanā hi
tika-abh03t:206_1: santasmiṃ paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatāti ayañhettha pariyāyo. “Tisso imā, bhikkhave,
tika-abh03t:206_2: vedanā sukhā dukkhā upekkhā vedanā”tiādi nippariyāyadesitaṃ. Vedanāsabhāvo hi tividhoti
tika-abh03t:206_3: ayamettha nippariyāyatā. “Sukhāpi vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā”tiādi nītatthaṃ. “Yaṃ kiñci
tika-abh03t:206_4: vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkha”ntiādi neyyatthaṃ. “Tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā
tika-abh03t:206_5: manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse”tiādikaṃ aññaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:206_6: bhaṇitaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. “Natthi devesu brahmacariyavāso”tiādikaṃ
tika-abh03t:206_7: suttañca aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ atthañca aññaṃ ṭhapayiṃsūti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:206_8: “Atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādi byañjanacchāyāya saṇhasukhumaṃ suññatādiatthaṃ bahuṃ vināsayuṃ.
tika-abh03t:207_0: Vinayagambhīranti vinaye gambhīrañca ekadesaṃ chaḍḍetvāti attho. Kilesavinayena vā
tika-abh03t:207_1: gambhīraṃ ekadesaṃ suttaṃ chaḍḍetvāti attho. Patirūpanti attano adhippāyānurūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:207_2: suttaṃ, suttapatirūpakaṃ vā asuttaṃ. Ekacce aṭṭhakathākaṇḍameva vissajjiṃsu, ekacce
