tika-abh03t:889_0: Tenettha saṃsayo hoti – kiṃ khandhato aññampi rūpaṃ atthi, yato vinivattaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:889_1: khandhavisesanaṃ hoti, sabbeva khandhā kiṃ khandhavisesanabhūtena rūpena visesitabbāti,
tika-abh03t:889_2: kiṃ pana taṃ khandhavisesanabhūtaṃ rūpanti? Bhūtupādāyarūpaṃ tasseva gahitattā. Niddese
tika-abh03t:889_3: “khandhā rūpakkhandho”ti padaṃ uddharitvā vissajjanaṃ katanti. Evaṃ etasmiṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne
tika-abh03t:889_4: na khandhato aññaṃ rūpaṃ atthi, teneva cetena rūpasaddena vuccamānaṃ suddhena khandhasaddena
tika-abh03t:889_5: vuccate, na ca sabbe khandhā khandhavisesanabhūtena rūpena visesitabbā, teneva te
tika-abh03t:889_6: vibhajitabbā, esa nayo vedanākkhandhādīsupīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ khandho,
tika-abh03t:890_0: Tato “rūpaṃ khandho”ti etasmiṃ anuññāyamāne “na kevalaṃ ayaṃ khandhasaddo rūpavisesanova,
tika-abh03t:890_1: atha kho vedanādivisesano cā”ti rūpassa khandhabhāvanicchayānantaraṃ khandhānaṃ rūpavisesanayoge
tika-abh03t:890_2: ca saṃsayo hoti. Tattha na sabbe khandhā vedanādivisesanayuttā, atha kho keci kenaci
tika-abh03t:890_3: visesanena yuñjantīti dassetuṃ suddhakhandhamūlacakkavāro vuttoti. Evaṃ yesaṃ uppādādayo
tika-abh03t:890_4: vattabbā, tesaṃ khandhānaṃ paṇṇattisodhanavasena tannicchayatthaṃ paṇṇattivāro vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:891_0: Cattāri cattāri cakkāni bandhitvāti ettha cakkāvayavabhāvato cakkānīti yamakāni vuttāni
tika-abh03t:891_1: ekekakhandhamūlāni cattāri cattāri yamakāni bandhitvāti. Iminā hi ettha atthena bhavitabbanti.
tika-abh03t:891_2: Cattāri cattāri yamakāni yathā ekekakhandhamūlakāni honti, evaṃ bandhitvāti vā attho
tika-abh03t:891_3: daṭṭhabbo. Tattha “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho”ti evamādikaṃ mūlapadaṃ nābhiṃ katvā “khandhā”ti
tika-abh03t:891_4: idaṃ nemiṃ, “vedanākkhandho”tiādīni are katvā cakkabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo, na maṇḍalabhāvena
tika-abh03t:891_5: sambajjhanato. Vedanākkhandhamūlakādīsupi hi heṭṭhimaṃ sodhetvāva pāṭho gato, na
tika-abh03t:891_6: maṇḍalasambandhenāti. Teneva ca kāraṇenāti suddhakhandhalābhamattameva gahetvā khandhavisesane
tika-abh03t:891_8: dassetuṃ khandhasaddena saha yojetvā “khandhā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā nayena padaṃ uddharitvā
tika-abh03t:894_0: 26. Piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ…pe… rūpā loke…pe… cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t:894_2: rūpataṇhā…pe… rūpavitakko…pe… rūpavicāro”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ taṇhāvatthubhūtaṃ tebhūmakaṃ
tika-abh03t:894_3: veditabbaṃ, tasmā yaṃ pañcakkhandhasamudāyabhūtaṃ piyarūpasātarūpaṃ, taṃ ekadesena
tika-abh03t:894_4: rūpakkhandho hotīti āha “piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho”ti. Piyasabhāvatāya
tika-abh03t:894_5: vā rūpakkhandho piyarūpe pavisati, na ruppanasabhāvenāti “piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:894_6: na rūpakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ. Saññāyamake tāva diṭṭhisaññāti “viseso”ti vacanaseso.
tika-abh03t:894_7: Tattha diṭṭhi eva saññā diṭṭhisaññā. “Sayaṃ samādāya vatāni jantu, uccāvacaṃ gacchati
tika-abh03t:894_8: saññasatto”ti, “saññāvirattassa na santi ganthā”ti ca evamādīsu hi diṭṭhi ca “saññā”ti vuttāti.
tika-abh03t:895_0: 28. “Na khandhā na vedanākkhandhoti? Āmantā”ti evaṃ khandhasaddappavattiyā abhāve
tika-abh03t:895_1: vedanākkhandhasaddappavattiyā ca abhāvoti paṇṇattisodhanamattameva karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:895_2: na aññadhammasabbhāvo evettha pamāṇaṃ. Evañca katvā “nāyatanā na sotāyatananti? Āmantā”tiādiṃ vakkhatīti.
tika-abh03t:896_0: 39. Rūpato aññe vedanādayoti ettha lokuttarā vedanādayo daṭṭhabbā. Te hi piyarūpā
tika-abh03t:896_1: ca sātarūpā ca na honti taṇhāya anārammaṇattāti rūpato aññe hontīti. Rūpañca khandhe
tika-abh03t:896_2: ca ṭhapetvā avasesāti idampi etehi saddhiṃ na-saddānaṃ appavattimattameva sandhāya
tika-abh03t:896_3: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca katvā “cakkhuñca āyatane ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva
tika-abh03t:896_4: cakkhu na ca āyatanā”tiādiṃ vakkhati. Na hi tattha avasesaggahaṇena gayhamānaṃ kañci
tika-abh03t:896_5: atthi. Yadi siyā, dhammāyatanaṃ siyā. Vakkhati hi “dhammo āyatananti? Āmantā”ti.
tika-abh03t:896_6: Taṇhāvatthu ca na taṃ siyā. Yadi siyā, piyarūpasātarūpabhāvato rūpaṃ siyā “rūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:896_7: khandhoti? Āmantā”ti vacanato khandho cāti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avijjamānepi vijjamānaṃ
tika-abh03t:896_8: upādāya itthipurisādiggahaṇasabbhāvaṃ sandhāya avasesāti ettha paññattiyā gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:899_0: 50-205. Pavattivāre vedanākkhandhādimūlakāni pacchimeneva saha yojetvā tīṇi dve ekañca
tika-abh03t:899_1: yamakāni vuttāni, na purimena. Kasmā? Amissakakālabhedesu vāresu atthavisesābhāvato.
tika-abh03t:899_2: Purimassa hi pacchimena yojitayamakameva pacchimassa purimena yojanāya pucchānaṃ
tika-abh03t:899_3: uppaṭipāṭiyā vucceyya, atthe pana na koci visesoti. Pucchāvissajjanesupi viseso natthi,
tika-abh03t:899_4: tena tathā yojanā na katāti. Kālabhedā panettha cha eva vuttā. Atītena paccuppanno,
tika-abh03t:899_5: anāgatena paccuppanno, anāgatenātītoti ete pana tayo yathādassitā missakakālabhedā
tika-abh03t:899_6: eva tayo, na visuṃ vijjantīti na gahitā. Tattha tattha hi paṭilomapucchāhi atītena
tika-abh03t:899_7: paccuppannādayo kālabhedā dassitā, teneva ca nayena “yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t:899_8: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjatī”tiādi sakkā yojetuṃ. Teneva hi missakakālabhedesu
tika-abh03t:899_9: ca na pacchimapacchimassa khandhassa purimapurimena yojanaṃ katvā yamakāni vuttāni,
tika-abh03t:899_10: amissakakālabhedesu gahitaniyāmena sukhaggahaṇatthampi pacchimapacchimeneva yojetvā vuttānīti.
tika-abh03t:900_0: Imināyeva ca lakkhaṇenātiādinā yena kāraṇena “purepañho”ti ca “pacchāpañho”ti ca
tika-abh03t:900_1: nāmaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ dasseti. Yassa hi sarūpadassanena vissajjanaṃ hoti, so paripūretvā
tika-abh03t:900_2: vissajjetabbatthasaṅgaṇhanato paripuṇṇapañho nāma. Taṃvissajjanassa pana purimakoṭṭhāsena
tika-abh03t:900_4: vuttaṃ. Sadisatthatā ca sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayapadavisesaṃ avicāretvā ekena padena saṅgahitassa
tika-abh03t:900_6: vā khandhassa anuññātavasena purepañho vuttoti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:901_0: Sanniṭṭhānatthasseva paṭikkhipanaṃ paṭikkhepo, saṃsayatthanivāraṇaṃ paṭisedhoti ayaṃ
tika-abh03t:901_1: paṭikkhepapaṭisedhānaṃ viseso. Pāḷipadameva hutvāti pucchāpāḷiyā “nuppajjatī”ti yaṃ
tika-abh03t:901_2: padaṃ vuttaṃ, na-kāravirahitaṃ tadeva padaṃ hutvāti attho. Tattha uppattinirodhapaṭisedhassa
tika-abh03t:901_3: paṭisedhanatthaṃ pāḷigatiyā vissajjanaṃ uppattinirodhānameva paṭisedhanatthaṃ paṭisedhena
tika-abh03t:902_0: Catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ pañcannañca vissajjanānaṃ sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu pakkhepo tadekadesapakkhepavasena
tika-abh03t:902_1: vuttoti veditabbo. Paripuṇṇapañho eva hi sarūpadassanena ca vissajjanaṃ sattavīsatiyā
tika-abh03t:903: Kiṃ nu sakkā ito paranti ito pāḷivavatthānadassanādito añño kiṃ nu sakkā kātunti aññassa sakkuṇeyyassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:904_0: “Suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjitthā”ti
tika-abh03t:904_1: etena suddhāvāsabhūmīsu ekabhūmiyampi dutiyā upapatti natthīti ñāpitaṃ hoti. Paṭisandhito
tika-abh03t:904_2: pabhuti hi yāva cuti, tāva pavattakammajasantānaṃ ekattena gahetvā tassa uppādanirodhavasena
tika-abh03t:904_3: ayaṃ desanā pavattā. Tasmiñhi abbocchinne kusalādīnañca pavatti hoti, vocchinne ca
tika-abh03t:904_4: appavattīti teneva ca uppādanirodhā dassitā, tasmā tassa ekasattassa paṭisandhiuppādato
tika-abh03t:904_5: yāva cutinirodho, tāva atītatā natthi, na ca tato pubbe tattha paṭisandhivasena kammajasantānaṃ
tika-abh03t:904_6: uppannapubbanti khandhadvayampi “nuppajjitthā”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā pana etāya pāḷiyā
tika-abh03t:904_7: sakalepi suddhāvāse dutiyā paṭisandhi natthīti na viññāyatīti? Uddhaṃsotapāḷisabbhāvā.
tika-abh03t:905_0: “Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjissatī”ti ettha “yassa yattha rūpakkhandho
tika-abh03t:905_1: uppajjissatī”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena visesitā asaññasattāpi santīti te eva gahetvā
tika-abh03t:905_2: “asaññasattāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tena ye sanniṭṭhānena vajjitā, te tato pañcavokāraṃ gantvā
tika-abh03t:905_3: parinibbāyissanti, na tesaṃ puna asaññe upapattippasaṅgo atthīti te sandhāyāha –
tika-abh03t:905_4: “pacchimabhavikānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjissati vedanākkhandho ca
tika-abh03t:905_5: nuppajjissatī”ti. Ettha kiṃ pañcavokārādibhāvo viya pacchimabhavopi koci atthi, yattha
tika-abh03t:905_6: tesamanuppatti bhavissatīti? Natthi pañcavokārādibhavesveva yattha vā tattha vā ṭhitānaṃ
tika-abh03t:905_7: pacchimabhavikānaṃ “yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjissatī”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t:905_8: saṅgahitattā. Tesaṃ tattha itarānuppattibhāvañca anujānanto “vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjissatī”ti āhāti.
tika-abh03t:906_1: taṃtaṃbhūmiyaṃ khandhaparinibbānavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbesañhi tesaṃ tattha
tika-abh03t:906_2: vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti. Yathā pana “nirujjhissatī”ti vacanaṃ paccuppannepi
tika-abh03t:906_3: uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgimhi pavattati, na evaṃ “uppajjitthā”ti vacanaṃ paccuppanne pavattati,
tika-abh03t:906_4: atha kho uppajjitvā vigate atīte eva, tasmā “parinibbantānaṃ nuppajjitthā”ti vuttaṃ
tika-abh03t:906_5: uppannasantānassa avigatattā. Anantā lokadhātuyoti okāsassa aparicchinnattā okāsavasena
tika-abh03t:906_6: vuccamānānaṃ uppādanirodhānampi paricchedābhāvato saṃkiṇṇatā hotīti “yattha vedanākkhandho
tika-abh03t:906_7: uppajjati, tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhatīti? Āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:909_0: 206-208. Puggalokāsavāro labbhamānopīti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu okāsavārassa alābhe tassapi
tika-abh03t:909_1: alābhena bhavitabbanti? Na, tattha puggalasseva pariññāvacanato. Puggalokāsavārepi
tika-abh03t:909_2: hi okāse puggalasseva pariññā vuccati, na okāsassa. Okāsavāropi ca yadi vucceyya,
tika-abh03t:909_3: “yattha rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātī”ti okāse puggalasseva parijānanavasena vucceyya,
tika-abh03t:909_4: tasmā puggalokāsavārasseva labbhamānatā vuttā, na okāsavārassāti. Tenāha – “āmantā…pe… siyā”ti.
tika-abh03t:910_0: Tenevāti pavatte cittakkhaṇavasena tiṇṇaṃ addhānaṃ lābhato eva, aññathā cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:910_1: rūpakkhandhaparijānanassa abhāvā “yo rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānāti, so vedanākkhandhaṃ
tika-abh03t:910_2: parijānātī”ti ettha “natthī”ti vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ siyā, “āmantā”ti ca katanti.
tika-abh03t:910_3: Sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayapadasaṅgahitānaṃ pariññānaṃ pavatte cittakkhaṇe eva lābhaṃ dassento
tika-abh03t:910_5: āmantāti vuttanti idaṃ puthujjanassa sabbathā pariññākiccassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. “Arahā
tika-abh03t:910_6: rūpakkhandhaṃ na parijānāti no ca vedanākkhandhaṃ na parijānittha, aggamaggasamaṅgiñca
tika-abh03t:910_7: arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā rūpakkhandhañca na parijānanti vedanākkhandhañca
tika-abh03t:910_8: na parijānitthā”ti pana vacanena “aggamaggasamaṅgiṃ ṭhapetvā añño koci parijānātī”ti
tika-abh03t:910_9: vattabbo natthīti dassitaṃ hoti, tena tadavasesapuggale sandhāya “āmantā”ti vuttanti viññāyatīti.
tika-abh03t:916_0: 1-9. Āyatanayamakādīsu ca paṇṇattivāre padasodhanavārādīnaṃ vacane kāraṇaṃ khandhayamake
tika-abh03t:916_1: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. “Ekādasa ekādasa katvā tettiṃsasataṃ yamakānī”tiādinā kesuci
tika-abh03t:916_2: potthakesu gaṇanā likhitā, sā tathā na hoti. “Dvattiṃsasata”ntiādinā aññattha likhitā.
tika-abh03t:919_0: 10-17. Vāyanaṭṭhenāti pasāraṇaṭṭhena, pākaṭabhāvaṭṭhena vā. “Kāyo dhammo”ti ca vuccamānaṃ
tika-abh03t:919_1: sabbaṃ sasabhāvaṃ āyatanamevāti “kāyo āyatana”nti, “dhammo āyatana”nti ca ettha “āmantā”ti
tika-abh03t:919_2: vuttaṃ. Kāyavacanena pana dhammavacanena ca avuccamānaṃ kañci sasabhāvaṃ natthīti
tika-abh03t:919_3: “na kāyo nāyatanaṃ, na dhammo nāyatana”nti ettha “āmantā”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:923_1: uppādanirodhavacane etasmiṃ alabbhamānavissajjanampi saddāyatanena saddhiṃ yamakaṃ
tika-abh03t:923_2: pucchāmattalābhena saṅgaṇhitvā vadatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Chasaṭṭhi yamakānīti ettha cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyarūpāyatanamūlakesu
tika-abh03t:923_3: ekekaṃ saddāyatanamūlakāni pañcāti ekādasa yamakāni vissajjanavasena hāpetabbāni.
tika-abh03t:923_4: Vakkhati hi “saddāyatanassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe anuppattito tena saddhiṃ yamakassa vissajjanameva natthī”ti.
tika-abh03t:924_0: Dutiyaṃ kiñcāpi paṭhamena sadisavissajjanantiādi puggalavārameva sandhāya vuttanti
tika-abh03t:924_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Okāsavāre pana asadisavissajjanattā vuttaṃ, na taṃ sabbattha sadisavissajjananti
tika-abh03t:924_2: ñāpetuṃ puggalavārepi vissajjitanti. Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanehi saddhiṃ tīṇi yamakāni
tika-abh03t:924_4: vissajjitabbattā vuttaṃ. Tesañhi virattakāmakammanibbattassa paṭisandhibījassa evaṃsabhāvattā
tika-abh03t:924_5: ghānādīni gandhādayo ca na santīti. Ghānāyatanayamakena sadisavissajjanattāti cakkhāyatanamūlakesu
tika-abh03t:924_6: ghānāyatanayamakena saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanattāti attho. Nanu tattha “sacakkhukānaṃ
tika-abh03t:924_7: aghānakānaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā vissajjanaṃ pavattaṃ, idha pana ghānāyatanamūlakesu
tika-abh03t:924_8: “yassa ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa jivhāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti? Āmantā”ti vissajjanena
tika-abh03t:924_9: bhavitabbanti natthi sadisavissajjanatāti? Saccaṃ, yathā pana tattha ghānāyatanayamakena
tika-abh03t:924_11: tasmā tattha tattheva sadisavissajjanatā pāḷiyaṃ anāruḷhatāya kāraṇanti. Nidassanabhāvena
tika-abh03t:924_12: pana gahitaṃ cakkhāyatanamūlakānaṃ sadisavissajjanakānaṃ sadisavissajjanaṃ nidassanabhāveneva
tika-abh03t:924_14: cettha ghānāyatanamūlakesu yebhuyyatāya daṭṭhabbā. Tesu hi jivhākāyāyatanayamakesu
tika-abh03t:925_0: Atha vā yathā vedanākkhandhādimūlakānaṃ saññākkhandhādiyamakānaṃ amissakakālabhedesu
tika-abh03t:925_2: kattabbanti apubbassa vattabbassa abhāvā vissajjanaṃ na kataṃ, evamidhāpi ghānāyatanamūlakaṃ
tika-abh03t:925_3: jivhāyatanayamakaṃ apubbassa vattabbassa abhāvā pāḷiṃ anāruḷhanti pākaṭoyamattho.
tika-abh03t:925_4: Kāyāyatanayamakaṃ pana dutiyapucchāya vasena vissajjitabbaṃ siyā, sā ca cakkhāyatanamūlakesu
tika-abh03t:925_5: ghānāyatanayamakena sadisavissajjanā, tasmā yassā pucchāya vissajjanā kātabbā, tassā
tika-abh03t:925_6: ghānāyatanayamakena sadisavissajjanattā taṃsesāni pāḷiṃ anāruḷhānīti evamettha attho
tika-abh03t:925_7: daṭṭhabbo. Tathāti idaṃ pāḷianāruḷhatāsāmaññeneva vuttaṃ, na kāraṇasāmaññena. Ghānajivhākāyāyatanānaṃ
tika-abh03t:925_8: pana agabbhaseyyakesu pavattamānānaṃ gabbhaseyyakesu ca āyatanapāripūrikāle sahacāritāya
tika-abh03t:925_9: avisesattā ca appavisesattā ca ekasmiṃ ghānāyatanayamake vissajjite itarāni dve,
tika-abh03t:925_10: ghānāyatanamūlakesu ca vissajjitesu itaradvayamūlakāni na vissajjīyantīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh03t:925_11: Rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi saddhinti “yassa rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa manāyatanaṃ
tika-abh03t:925_12: uppajjatī”ti etissā pucchāya vuttehi rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi saddhinti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:925_13: Rūpāyatanamūlakesu hi manāyatanayamake ādipucchāya gandharasaphoṭṭhabbayamakesu ādipucchānaṃ
tika-abh03t:925_14: sadisavissajjanatā yamakānaṃ avissajjane kāraṇabhāvena vuttā. Dutiyapucchānañhi paṭivacanavissajjanena
tika-abh03t:925_15: bhavitabbanti pubbe vuttanayena vissajjanaṃ na kātabbaṃ, ādipucchānañca na kātabbanti.
tika-abh03t:926_2: pubbe vuttanayeneva vissajjanaṃ na kātabbanti yesaṃ kātabbaṃ, tesaṃ gandharasaphoṭṭhabbamūlakānaṃ
tika-abh03t:926_5: sabbāni avissajjaneneva alabbhamānavissajjanatādassanena vissajjitāni nāma hontīti
tika-abh03t:927_0: Jaccandhampi jaccabadhirampīti ettha ca jaccabadhiraggahaṇena jaccandhabadhiro gahitoti
tika-abh03t:927_1: veditabbo. Saghānakānaṃ sacakkhukānanti paripuṇṇāyatanameva opapātikaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-abh03t:927_2: ettha eva-saddaṃ vuttanti-etassa parato yojetvā yathā “saghānakānaṃ acakkhukāna”nti
tika-abh03t:927_3: idaṃ aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na evaṃ “saghānakānaṃ sacakkhukāna”nti etaṃ.
tika-abh03t:927_4: Etaṃ pana paripuṇṇāyatanaṃ sandhāya vuttamevāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tena jaccabadhirampi
tika-abh03t:928_0: 22-254. Yattha cakkhāyatananti rūpībrahmalokaṃ pucchatīti niyamato tattha cakkhusotānaṃ
tika-abh03t:928_1: sahuppattimattaṃ passanto vadati, okāsavāre pana tasmiṃ puggalassa anāmaṭṭhattā yattha
tika-abh03t:928_2: kāmadhātuyaṃ rūpadhātuyañca cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tattha sotāyatanampi ekantena
tika-abh03t:929_0: “Yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjissatīti? Āmantā”ti
tika-abh03t:929_1: kasmā paṭiññātaṃ, nanu yo gabbhaseyyakabhāvaṃ gantvā parinibbāyissati, tassa rūpāyatanaṃ
tika-abh03t:929_2: paṭisandhiyaṃ uppajjissati, na pana cakkhāyatananti? Yassa rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjissati,
tika-abh03t:929_3: tassa tadavatthassa puggalassa rūpāyatanuppādato uddhaṃ cakkhāyatanasantānuppādassa
tika-abh03t:929_4: pavattiyampi bhavissantassa paṭiññātabbattā. Atha kasmā “yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ
tika-abh03t:929_5: nuppajjissati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā”ti paṭiññātaṃ, nanu gabbhaseyyakassa
tika-abh03t:929_6: pacchimabhavikassa upapajjantassa ekādasamasattāhā orato ṭhitassa rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati
tika-abh03t:929_7: no ca cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatīti? Tasmiṃ bhave bhavissantassa uppādassa anāgatabhāvena
tika-abh03t:929_8: avacanato. Bhavantare hi tassa tassa āyatanasantānassa yo ādiuppādo paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh03t:929_9: pavatte ca bhavissati, so anāgatuppādo tabbhāvena vuccati addhāpaccuppannānantogadhattā.
tika-abh03t:929_10: Na pana yo tasmiṃyeva bhave pavatte bhavissati, so anāgatuppādabhāvena vuccati addhāpaccuppannantogadhattā.
tika-abh03t:929_11: Addhāvasena hettha kammajapavattassa paccuppannādikālabhedo adhippeto. Evañca katvā
tika-abh03t:929_12: indriyayamake “yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjissatīti?
tika-abh03t:929_13: Pacchimabhavikānaṃ itthīnaṃ upapajjantīnaṃ, yā ca itthiyo rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ
tika-abh03t:929_14: upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
tika-abh03t:929_15: parinibbāyissanti, tāsaṃ upapajjantīnaṃ tāsaṃ itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, no ca tāsaṃ
tika-abh03t:929_16: purisindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ tasmiṃ bhave pavatte purisindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:929_17: na uppajjissati liṅgaparivattanasabbhāvā, bhavantare pana ādiuppādassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:929_18: “no ca tāsaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Bhavantare hi ādiuppādassa anāgatattaṃ
tika-abh03t:929_19: adhippetanti. Evañca katvā “katici bhave dassetvā”ti bhavaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
tika-abh03t:930_1: avassaṃbhāvīāyatanassa yāva āyatanapāripūri, tāva uppajjatīti pana atthe gayhamāne
tika-abh03t:930_2: pucchādvayavissajjanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hoti. Evañca sati “yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati,
tika-abh03t:930_3: tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? Pacchimabhavikānaṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ,
tika-abh03t:930_4: ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotāyatanaṃ
tika-abh03t:930_5: nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatī”ti evamādīsu gabbhaseyyakāpi
tika-abh03t:930_6: pacchimabhavikādayo upapajjantā gahitā honti. Evañca katvā indriyayamake “yassa vā
tika-abh03t:930_7: pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjatīti? Āmantā”ti idampi
tika-abh03t:930_8: upapannaṃ hoti. Somanassindriyuppādakassa kammassa ekantena cakkhundriyuppādanato
tika-abh03t:930_9: gabbhepi yāva cakkhundriyuppatti, tāva uppajjamānatāya tassā abhinanditabbattā.
tika-abh03t:931_0: Yaṃ pana “yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ
tika-abh03t:931_1: uppajjatīti? Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ, aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ, rūpāvacarānaṃ
tika-abh03t:931_2: tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”ti
tika-abh03t:931_3: ettha “aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantāna”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ ye ekādasamasattāhā
tika-abh03t:931_4: orato kālaṃ karissanti, tesaṃ ghānāyatanānibbattakakammena gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ
tika-abh03t:931_5: vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. “Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa tattha
tika-abh03t:931_6: rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti? Kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ, aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacarā
tika-abh03t:931_7: cavantānaṃ, rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha
tika-abh03t:931_8: rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti hi ettha “aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacarā cavantāna”nti vacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:931_9: anuppanneyeva ghānāyatane gabbhaseyyakānaṃ cuti atthīti dīpeti. Na hi kāmāvacare
tika-abh03t:931_10: gabbhaseyyakato añño aghānako atthi dhammahadayavibhaṅge “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:931_11: kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti avuttattāti. Atha kasmā opapātike eva sandhāya
tika-abh03t:931_12: idha, indriyayamake ca yathādassitāsu pucchāsu “āmantā”ti vuttanti na viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t:931_13: Yamake sanniṭṭhānena gahitatthassa ekadese saṃsayatthasambhavena paṭivacanassa akaraṇato.
tika-abh03t:931_14: Bhinditabbe hi na paṭivacanavissajjanaṃ hoti. Yadi siyā, paripuṇṇavissajjanameva
tika-abh03t:931_15: na siyāti. Atha kasmā “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:931_16: uppajjatīti? Āmantā”ti iminā “gabbhaseyyakānaṃ somanassapaṭisandhi natthī”ti na viññāyatīti?
tika-abh03t:931_17: “Kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassa dasindriyāni pātubhavanti? Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ
tika-abh03t:931_18: sahetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ upapattikkhaṇe dasindriyāni pātubhavanti kāyindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:931_19: manindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ vā purisindriyaṃ vā jīvitindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ vā upekkhindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:932_0: Nirodhavāre anāgatakālabhede yathā tasseva cittassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa
tika-abh03t:932_1: uppattikkhaṇe vutto, evaṃ tasseva kammajasantānassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa
tika-abh03t:932_2: uppāde vattabboti sabbattha upapajjantānaṃ eva so tathā vutto, na uppannānaṃ. Uppannānaṃ
tika-abh03t:932_3: pana aññassa anāgatassa santānassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena vattabbo, na tasseva. Tassa
tika-abh03t:932_4: hi uppādānantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hotīti. Tasmā arahataṃ pavatte sotassa cakkhussa
tika-abh03t:932_5: ca bhede satipi anāgatakālāmasanavaseneva “yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa
tika-abh03t:932_6: sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā. Yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa
tika-abh03t:932_7: cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā”ti vissajjanadvayaṃ upapannameva hotīti. Yasmā
tika-abh03t:932_8: ca upapattianantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hoti, taṃniṭṭhānabhāvato pana cutiyā nirodhavacanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:932_9: tasmā pavatte niruddhepi santānekadese aniruddhaṃ upādāya aniṭṭhitanirodhoti cutiyāva
tika-abh03t:932_10: tassa nirodhoti vuccati. Vakkhati hi “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh03t:932_11: tassa cakkhundriyaṃ nirujjhatīti? Āmantā”ti, tenetthāpi cutinirodhe eva ca adhippete
tika-abh03t:932_12: yañca pavatte nirujjhissati, tañca niṭṭhānavasena cutiyā eva nirujjhissatīti vuttanti
tika-abh03t:933_0: “Yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti? Sabbesaṃ
tika-abh03t:933_1: upapajjantānaṃ, acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca
tika-abh03t:933_2: tesaṃ sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti ettha āruppe pacchimabhavike ṭhapetvā sabbe
tika-abh03t:933_3: upapajjantā, acakkhukā cavantā ca gahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Te hi dutiyakoṭṭhāsena saṅgayhantīti
tika-abh03t:933_5: ettha ca arūpato pañcavokāraṃ agacchantā anaññūpapattikāpi “arūpe pacchimabhavikā”icceva
tika-abh03t:933_6: saṅgayhantīti veditabbā. Esa nayo aññesupi evarūpesūti.
tika-abh03t:937: 1-19. Labbhamānānanti idaṃ pavattivāre saddadhātusambandhānaṃ yamakānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātādisambandhānañca cutipaṭisandhivasena alabbhamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:942_0: 10-26. “Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccanti? Āmantā”ti ettha kiñcāpi dukkhadukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṃ
tika-abh03t:942_1: vipariṇāmadukkhanti tīsupi dukkhasaddo pavattati, “jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā jātiādīsu
tika-abh03t:942_2: ca, so pana dukkhadukkhato aññattha pavattamāno aññanirapekkho nappavattati. Suddhañcettha
tika-abh03t:942_3: dukkhapadaṃ aññanirapekkhaṃ gahetvā paṇṇattisodhanaṃ karoti, tena nippariyāyato dukkhasabhāvattā
tika-abh03t:942_4: eva yaṃ dukkhadukkhaṃ, tasmiṃ dukkhadukkhe esa dukkhasaddo, tañca ekantena dukkhasaccamevāti
tika-abh03t:942_5: “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ. Suddhasaccavāre saccavibhaṅge vuttesu samudayesu koci phaladhammesu
tika-abh03t:942_6: natthi, na ca phaladhammesu koci nirodhoti vuccamāno atthi, maggasaddo ca phalaphalaṅgesu
tika-abh03t:942_7: maggaphalattā pavattati, na maggakiccasabbhāvā. Pariniṭṭhitaniyyānakiccāni hi tāni.
tika-abh03t:942_8: Niyyānavācako cettha maggasaddo, na niyyānaphalavācako, tasmā samudayo saccaṃ, nirodho
tika-abh03t:942_9: saccaṃ, maggo saccanti etesupi “āmantā”icceva vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh03t:943_0: Atha vā padasodhanena padesu sodhitesu saccavisesanabhūtā eva dukkhādisaddā idha
tika-abh03t:943_1: gahitāti viññāyanti. Tesaṃ pana ekantena saccavisesanabhāvaṃ, saccānañca tabbisesanayogavisesaṃ
tika-abh03t:943_2: dīpetuṃ suddhasaccavāro vuttoti saccavisesanānaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ ekantasaccattā “dukkhaṃ
tika-abh03t:943_3: saccaṃ…pe… maggo saccanti? Āmantā”ti vuttanti. Yathā cettha, evaṃ khandhayamakādīsupi
tika-abh03t:943_4: suddhakhandhādivāresu khandhādivisesanabhūtānameva rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:943_5: pana “yasmā piyarūpasātarūpasaṅkhātaṃ vā rūpaṃ hotu bhūtupādārūpaṃ vā, sabbaṃ pañcasu
tika-abh03t:943_6: khandhesu saṅgahaṃ gacchateva, tasmā āmantāti paṭijānātī”ti vacanena rūpādicakkhādidukkhādiggahaṇehi
tika-abh03t:943_7: suddhakhandhādivāresupi khandhādivisesanato aññepi gahitāti ayamattho dīpito hoti,
tika-abh03t:946_0: 27-164. Antamaso suddhāvāsānampīti idaṃ tesaṃ ariyattā dukkhasaccena upapajjane āsaṅkā
tika-abh03t:946_1: siyāti katvā vuttaṃ. Taṇhāvippayuttacittassāti idaṃ pañcavokāravaseneva gahetabbanti
tika-abh03t:946_2: vuttaṃ. Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti etena pana sanniṭṭhānena sabbe upapajjantā
tika-abh03t:946_3: pavattiyaṃ catuvokāre maggaphalato aññacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino pañcavokāre
tika-abh03t:946_4: ca sabbacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino saṅgahitāti tesveva sanniṭṭhānena nicchitesu
tika-abh03t:946_5: keci “pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti etena dukkhasamudayesu ekakoṭṭhāsappavattisamaṅgino
tika-abh03t:946_6: dassīyanti sanniṭṭhānena gahitasseva vibhāgadassanato, tena catuvokārānampi gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:946_7: upapannameva. Na hi tesu maggaphaluppādasamaṅgīsu pasaṅgatā atthi taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:946_8: sanniṭṭhānena aggahitattāti. Idaṃ idha na gahetabbanti idaṃ catuvokāre phalasamāpatticittaṃ
tika-abh03t:946_9: idha saccānaṃ uppādavacane na gahetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:947_0: Ettha ca sabbesaṃ upapajjantānanti idaṃ kammajapavattassa paṭhamuppādadassanena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:947_1: asaññasattāpettha saṅgahitā. Pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti idaṃ
tika-abh03t:947_3: vuttaṃ. Taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇeti taṃsahitassa samudayasaccuppādavomissassa. Tesaṃ pana
tika-abh03t:947_4: asaññasattānaṃ pavattiyaṃ dukkhasaccassa uppādo sabbattha na gahito, tathā nirodho
tika-abh03t:947_5: cāti. Maggasaccayamakepi eseva nayo. Tesaṃ tasmiṃ upapattikkhaṇe ca taṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:947_6: cāti evamettha khaṇavasena okāso veditabboti vuttaṃ, evañca sati “yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-abh03t:947_7: uppajjati, tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatī”ti etassa vissajjane pacchimakoṭṭhāse
tika-abh03t:947_8: “itaresaṃ catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ, pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:947_9: tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjati samudayasaccañca uppajjissatī”ti idaṃ na yujjeyya.
tika-abh03t:947_10: Na hi upapattikkhaṇe cittuppattikkhaṇe ca samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti. Tasmā upapattikkhaṇataṇhāvippayuttacittuppattikkhaṇasamaṅgīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:947_11: puggalānaṃ yasmiṃ kāmāvacarādiokāse sā upapatti cittuppatti ca pavattamānā, tattha
tika-abh03t:947_12: tesanti okāsavasenevettha tattha-saddassa attho yujjati. Puggalokāsavāro hesa. Tattha
tika-abh03t:947_13: puggalavisesadassanatthaṃ “sabbesaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ, okāso pana yattha te, so evāti.
tika-abh03t:948_0: “Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āruppe maggassa ca phalassa ca
tika-abh03t:948_1: uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nuppajjati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjatī”ti ettha
tika-abh03t:948_2: pana “pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti cittapaṭibaddhavuttittā
tika-abh03t:948_3: cittajarūpameva idhādhippetaṃ, na kammajādirūpaṃ cittaṃ anapekkhitvāva uppajjanatoti
tika-abh03t:948_4: keci vadanti. “Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti etena pana sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t:948_5: gahito puggalo na cittaṃ apekkhitvāva gahito, atha kho yo koci evaṃpakāro, tasmā
tika-abh03t:948_6: “tassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti etena ca na cittāpekkhameva dukkhasaccaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:948_7: atha kho yaṃ kiñcīti cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yaṃ kiñci dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti ayamattho
tika-abh03t:948_8: viññāyatīti. Na hi yamake vibhajitabbe avibhattā nāma pucchā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:949_0: “Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye cittevattamāne”ti idaṃ sabbantimena paricchedena yassa yattha
tika-abh03t:949_1: dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha, no ca samudayasaccaṃ, taṃdassanavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana
tika-abh03t:949_2: dassite tena samānagatikattā dutiyākusalacittato purimasabbacittasamaṅgino teneva
tika-abh03t:949_3: dassitā honti. Tesampi hi tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ
tika-abh03t:949_4: uppajjitthāti. Evañca katvā “itaresaṃ catuvokārapañcavokārāna”nti ettha yathāvuttā
tika-abh03t:949_5: suddhāvāsā aggahitā honti. Yathā “yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati, tassa tattha
tika-abh03t:949_6: samudayasaccaṃ uppajjitthā”ti etassa vissajjane “suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti
tika-abh03t:949_8: dassitā hontīti na te “itaresa”nti etena gayhanti, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbanti. “Itaresa”nti
tika-abh03t:949_9: vacanaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ visesanatthaṃ, na catuvokārānaṃ. Na hi te pubbe vuttā vajjetabbā
tika-abh03t:949_10: santi pañcavokārā viya yathāvuttā suddhāvāsāti. “Abhisametāvīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca
tika-abh03t:949_11: uppajjittha maggasaccañca uppajjitthā”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena puggalokāsā aññamaññaparicchinnā
tika-abh03t:949_12: gahitāti yasmiṃ okāse abhisametāvino, te evaṃ “abhisametāvīna”nti etena gahitāti
tika-abh03t:949_13: daṭṭhabbā. Tena ye kāmāvacare rūpāvacare arūpāvacare vā abhisametāvino rūpāvacaraṃ
tika-abh03t:949_14: arūpāvacaraṃ vā upapannā, yāva tatthābhisamayo uppanno bhavissati, tāva te ettha
tika-abh03t:949_15: na gayhanti, te pana purimakoṭṭhāse “suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne”ti evaṃ
tika-abh03t:949_16: dassitehi suddhāvāse anuppannābhisamayehi samānagatikāti visuṃ na dassitā. “Anabhisametāvīna”nti
tika-abh03t:949_17: gahitā ye sabbattha tattha ca anabhisametāvino, tesu suddhāvāsānaṃ gahaṇakālavisesanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:950_0: Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissantīti etena vodānacittasamaṅginā samānagatikā
tika-abh03t:950_2: dassitāti veditabbā. Esa nayo aññesu evarūpesūti.
tika-abh03t:951_0: Pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti āgataṭṭhāne paṭisandhicittassapi bhaṅgakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:951_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ, tathā “pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti āgataṭṭhāne ca cuticittassapi
tika-abh03t:951_2: uppādakkhaṇassāti. “Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti
tika-abh03t:951_3: etassa vissajjane dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu “arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe”icceva
tika-abh03t:951_4: vuttaṃ, na visesitaṃ. Kasmā? Ekassapi maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgino
tika-abh03t:951_5: ubhayakoṭṭhāsabhajanato. Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhatīti etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitesu
tika-abh03t:951_6: hi arupe maggaphalabhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīsu kesañci tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ dvinnañca maggānaṃ
tika-abh03t:951_7: bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīnaṃ nirantaraṃ anuppādetvā antarantarā vipassanānikantiṃ bhavanikantiṃ
tika-abh03t:951_8: uppādetvā ye uparimagge uppādessanti, tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhissatīti tesaṃyeva
tika-abh03t:951_9: pana kesañci antarā taṇhaṃ anuppādetvā uparimaggauppādentānaṃ maggaphalabhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:951_10: samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti. Sāmaññavacanenapi ca purimakoṭṭhāse vuccamānena
tika-abh03t:951_11: pacchimakoṭṭhāse vakkhamāne vajjetvāva gahaṇaṃ hotīti dassitoyaṃ nayoti.
tika-abh03t:954_0: 165-170. Pariññāvāre …pe… tissopettha pariññā labbhantīti ettheva visesanaṃ khandhayamakādīsu
tika-abh03t:954_2: imassa vārassa appavattidassanatthañca. Dukkhassa pariññatthaṃ samudayassa ca pahānatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:954_3: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti pariññāpahānaṃ saccesu dassetuṃ dukkhe tīraṇapariññā
tika-abh03t:954_4: vuttā, na pahānapariññā. Samudaye ca pahānapariññā, na tīraṇapariññā. Ñātapariññā
tika-abh03t:954_5: pana sādhāraṇāti ubhayattha vuttā. Maggañāṇañhi dukkhasamudayāni vibhāvetīti ñātapariññā
tika-abh03t:954_6: ca hoti, dukkhatīraṇakiccānaṃ nipphādanato tīraṇapariññā ca, samudayassa appavattikaraṇatova
tika-abh03t:954_7: pahānapariññā cāti tissopi pariññā maggakkhaṇe eva yojetabbāti.
tika-abh03t:959_0: 1. Khandhādayo viya pubbe avibhattā kāyasaṅkhārādayoti tesaṃ aviññātattā “assāsapassāsā
tika-abh03t:959_1: kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādinā tayo saṅkhāre vibhajati. Kāyassa saṅkhāroti paṭhame atthe sāmiatthe
tika-abh03t:959_2: eva sāmivacanaṃ, dutiye atthe kattuatthe. Vaciyā saṅkhāroti kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-abh03t:959_3: Cittassa saṅkhāroti ca kattuattheyeva. So pana karaṇavacanassa atthoti katvā “karaṇatthe
tika-abh03t:960_1: attho dassito dvīhi padehi labbhamāno eko assāsapassāsādiko, tassa suddhikehi kāyādipadehi
tika-abh03t:960_2: suddhikena ca saṅkhārapadena avacanīyattā yathā rūpapadassa khandhekadeso khandhapadassa
tika-abh03t:960_3: khandhasamudāyo padasodhane dassito yathādhippeto attho atthi, evaṃ ekekapadassa
tika-abh03t:960_4: yathādhippetatthābhāvatoti adhippāyo. Kāyo kāyasaṅkhārotiādi pana vattabbaṃ siyāti
tika-abh03t:960_5: yadi visuṃ adīpetvā samudito kāyasaṅkhārasaddo ekattha dīpeti, kāyasaṅkhārasaddo
tika-abh03t:960_6: kāyasaṅkhāratthe vattamāno khandhasaddo viya rūpasaddena kāyasaddena visesitabboti
tika-abh03t:960_7: adhippāyena vadati. Suddhasaṅkhāravāro hesāti etena imassa vārassa padasodhanena
tika-abh03t:960_8: dassitānaṃ yathādhippetānameva gahaṇato tesañca kāyādipadehi aggahitattā “kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādivacanassa
tika-abh03t:960_9: ayuttiṃ dasseti. Idha pana saṅkhārayamake kāyādipadānaṃ saṅkhārapadassa ca asamānādhikaraṇattā
tika-abh03t:960_10: “kāyo saṅkhāro, saṅkhārā kāyo”tiādimhi vuccamāne adhippetatthapariccāgo anadhippetatthapariggaho
tika-abh03t:960_11: ca kato siyāti suddhasaṅkhārataṃmūlacakkavārā na vuttā. Padasodhanavārataṃmūlacakkavārehi
tika-abh03t:960_12: pana asamānādhikaraṇehi kāyādipadehi saṅkhārasaddassa visesanīyatāya dassitāya saṃsayo
tika-abh03t:960_13: hoti “yo atthantarappavattinā kāyasaddena visesito kāyasaṅkhāro, eso atthantarappavattīhi
tika-abh03t:960_14: vacīcittehi visesito udāhu añño”ti. Evaṃ sesesupi. Ettha tesaṃ aññattha dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:960_15: “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”tiādinā anulomapaṭilomavasena cha yamakāni vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:960_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana suddhasaṅkhāravāraṭṭhāne vuttattā ayaṃ nayo suddhasaṅkhāravāroti vutto.
tika-abh03t:963_0: 19. Pavattivāre saṅkhārānaṃ puggalānañca okāsattā jhānaṃ bhūmi ca visuṃ okāsabhāvena
tika-abh03t:963_1: gahitāti puggalavāre ca okāsavasena puggalaggahaṇena tesaṃ dvinnaṃ okāsānaṃ vasena
tika-abh03t:963_2: gahaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā “vinā vitakkavicārehi assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe”ti dutiyatatiyajjhānokāsavasena
tika-abh03t:963_3: gahitā puggalā visesetvā dassitāti daṭṭhabbā. Puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānanti
tika-abh03t:963_4: jhānokāsavasena puggalaṃ dasseti, kāmāvacarānanti bhūmokāsavasena. Dvippakārānampi
tika-abh03t:963_5: pana tesaṃ visesanatthamāha “assāsapassāsānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe”ti. Tena rūpārūpāvacaresu
tika-abh03t:963_6: paṭhamajjhānasamāpannake kāmāvacare gabbhagatādike ca nivatteti. Kāmāvacarānampi
tika-abh03t:963_7: hi gabbhagatādīnaṃ vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ uppatti atthi. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:963_8: pana ekantikattā rūpārūpāvacarā nidassitā. Vinā assāsapassāsehi vitakkavicārānaṃ
tika-abh03t:963_9: uppādakkhaṇeti etena pana dassitā puggalā paṭhamajjhānokāsā kāmāvacarādiokāsā ca
tika-abh03t:963_10: assāsapassāsavirahavisiṭṭhā daṭṭhabbā. Iminā nayena sabbattha puggalavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:964_1: vuttaṃ, etasmiṃ pana atthe sati “catutthajjhāne rūpāvacare arūpāvacare tattha cittasaṅkhāro
tika-abh03t:964_2: uppajjati, no ca tattha kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjatī”ti etthāpi rūpārūpāvacarabhūmīsu uppanne
tika-abh03t:964_3: catutthajjhāneti attho bhaveyya, so ca aniṭṭho bhūmīnaṃ okāsabhāvasseva aggahitatāpattito,
tika-abh03t:964_4: sabbacatutthajjhānassa okāsavasena aggahitatāpattito ca, tasmā jhānabhūmokāsānaṃ
tika-abh03t:964_5: saṅkaraṃ akatvā visuṃ eva okāsabhāvo yojetabbo. Paṭhamajjhānokāsepi hi kāyasaṅkhāro
tika-abh03t:964_6: ca uppajjati vacīsaṅkhāro ca uppajjati kāmāvacarokāse ca. Yadipi na sabbamhi paṭhamajjhāne
tika-abh03t:964_7: sabbamhi ca kāmāvacare dvayaṃ uppajjati, tattha pana taṃdvayuppatti atthīti katvā
tika-abh03t:964_8: evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Visuṃ okāsattā ca “aṅgamattavasena cetthā”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:964_9: na vattabbaṃ hotīti. Imamhi ca yamake avitakkavicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ vicāravasena
tika-abh03t:964_10: paṭhamajjhāne saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Muddhabhūtaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh03t:964_11: itaraṃ asaṅgahitanti vā. Yassayatthake “nirodhasamāpannāna”nti na labbhati. Na hi
tika-abh03t:965_0: 37. Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāneti tesaṃ paṭhamato avitakkaavicārato dutiye
tika-abh03t:965_1: savitakkasavicārepi bhavanikantiāvajjane vattamāne ubhayaṃ nuppajjitthāti dassentena
tika-abh03t:965_2: tato purimacittakkhaṇesupi nuppajjitthāti dassitameva hoti. Yathā pana cittasaṅkhārassa
tika-abh03t:965_3: ādidassanatthaṃ “suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantāna”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vacīsaṅkhārassa ādidassanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:970_1: khandhādīsu tīraṇabāhullato khandhādiyamakehi tīraṇapariññañca vibhāvetvā anusayapahānantā
tika-abh03t:970_2: pahānapariññāti pahātabbamuddhabhūtehi anusayehi pahānapariññaṃ vibhāvetuṃ anusayayamakaṃ
tika-abh03t:970_3: āraddhaṃ. Labbhamānavasenāti anusayabhāvena labbhamānānaṃ vasenāti attho. Tīhākārehi
tika-abh03t:970_4: anusayānaṃ gāhāpanaṃ tesu tathā aggahitesu anusayavārādipāḷiyā duravabodhattā.
tika-abh03t:971_0: Ayaṃ panettha purimesūti etesu sānusayavārādīsu purimesūti attho. Atthavisesābhāvato
tika-abh03t:971_1: “kāmadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassa kāmadhātuyā cutassa, rūpadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassa
tika-abh03t:971_2: kāmadhātuyā cutassā”ti evamādīhi avuccamāne kathamayaṃ yamakadesanā siyāti? Nāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:971_3: yamakadesanā, purimavārehi pana yamakavasena desitānaṃ anusayānaṃ cutiupapattivasena
tika-abh03t:971_5: anusayayamakanti nāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā paṭilomapucchāpi atthavasena labbhanti,
tika-abh03t:971_6: atthavisesābhāvato pana na vuttāti labbhamānatāvasena etissāpi desanāya yamakadesanatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:972_0: Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti etena kāraṇalābhe uppattiarahataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:972_1: Appahīnā hi anusayā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti. Yāva ca maggena tesaṃ anuppattiarahatā
tika-abh03t:972_2: na katā hoti, tāva te evaṃpakārā evāti “anusayā”ti vuccanti. So evaṃpakāro uppajjati-saddena
tika-abh03t:972_3: gahito, na khandhayamakādīsu viya uppajjamānatā. Teneva “yassa kāmarāgānusayo uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:972_4: tassa paṭighānusayo uppajjatīti? Āmantā”tiādinā uppajjanavāro anusayavārena ninnānākaraṇo
tika-abh03t:972_5: vibhatto. Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ pana labhitvā ye uppajjiṃsu uppajjamānā ca, tepi appahīnaṭṭhena
tika-abh03t:972_6: thāmagatā ahesuṃ bhavanti ca. Uppattiarahatāya eva ca te uppajjiṃsu uppajjanti ca,
tika-abh03t:972_7: na ca atītānāgatapaccuppannato aññe uppattiarahā nāma atthi, tasmā sabbe atītānāgatapaccuppannā
tika-abh03t:972_8: kāmarāgādayo “anusayā”ti vuccanti. Appahīnaṭṭheneva hi anusayā, appahīnā ca atītādayo
tika-abh03t:972_9: eva, maggassa pana tādisānaṃ anuppattiarahatāpādanena anusayappahānaṃ hotīti. Appahīnākāro
tika-abh03t:972_10: nāma dhammākāro, na dhammo, dhammo eva ca uppajjatīti iminā adhippāyenāha “appahīnākāro
tika-abh03t:972_11: ca uppajjatīti vattuṃ na yujjatī”ti. Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena santāne
tika-abh03t:972_12: anusentīti anusayā, atha kasmā satteva vuttā, nanu sattānusayato aññesampi kilesānaṃ
tika-abh03t:972_13: appahīnattā anusayabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Nāpajjati, appahīnamattasseva anusayabhāvassa
tika-abh03t:972_14: avuttattā. Vuttañhi “anusayoti pana appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatakileso vuccatī”ti, tasmā
tika-abh03t:972_15: appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagato kilesoyeva anusayo nāmāti yuttaṃ. Thāmagatanti ca aññehi
tika-abh03t:972_16: asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi dhammasabhāvabodhinā tathāgatena imeyeva “anusayā”ti
tika-abh03t:973_1: evaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ siyāti uppajjanavārena “uppajjatī”ti vacanassa avuttatā
tika-abh03t:973_2: sakkā vattunti ce? Taṃ na, vacanatthavisesena taṃdvayassa vuttattā. “Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:973_3: labhitvā uppajjatī”ti hi etasmiṃ atthe avisiṭṭhepi “anusetī”ti vacanaṃ santāne anusayitataṃ
tika-abh03t:973_4: thāmagatabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Yadi tameva “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ dīpeyya, kassaci visesassa
tika-abh03t:973_5: abhāvā uppajjanavāro na vattabbo siyā, “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ pana uppattiyoggaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh03t:973_6: Kasmā? Uppajjanavārena uppattiyoggassa dassitattā, anusayasaddassa sabbadā vijjamānānaṃ
tika-abh03t:973_8: yathādhippetasayanatthassa dassanatthaṃ “anusentīti anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantī”ti
tika-abh03t:973_9: yaṃ uppattiyoggavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ suvuttamevāti adhippāyo. Tampi suvuttameva iminā
tika-abh03t:973_10: tantippamāṇenāti sambandho. Tantittayenapi hi cittasampayuttatā dīpitā hoti.
tika-abh03t:976_0: 2. Kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsūti kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ sukhāya ca upekkhāya cāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:976_1: kāmadhātuggahaṇaṃ dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ visesanabhāvena vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati kāmadhātuyā
tika-abh03t:976_2: kāmarāgānusayassa anusayaṭṭhānatā na vuttā hoti. Dvīsu pana rāgesu bhavarāgassa tīsu
tika-abh03t:976_3: dhātūsu rūpārūpadhātūnaṃ anusayaṭṭhānatā vuttāti kāmadhātuyā kāmarāgassa anusayaṭṭhānatā
tika-abh03t:976_4: vattabbā. Dhātuvedanāsabbasakkāyapariyāpannavasena hi tippakāraṃ anusayānaṃ anusayaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:976_5: vuttanti. Tasmā tīsu dhātūsu kāmadhātuyā tīsu vedanāsu dvīsu vedanāsu ettha kāmarāgānusayo
tika-abh03t:976_6: anusetīti visuṃ anusayaṭṭhānatā dhātuyā vedanānañca yojetabbā. Dvīsu vedanāsūti idañca
tika-abh03t:976_7: vedanāsu anusayamāno kāmarāgānusayo dvīsveva anuseti, na tīsūti tiṇṇampi ṭhānatānivāraṇatthameva
tika-abh03t:976_8: vuttanti na sabbāsu dvīsu anusayanappatto atthi, tena vedanāvisesanatthaṃ na kāmadhātuggahaṇena
tika-abh03t:976_9: koci attho. Bhavarāgānusayanaṭṭhānañhi aṭṭhānañca anusayānaṃ apariyāpannaṃ sakkāye
tika-abh03t:976_10: kāmarāgānusayassa anusayaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti pākaṭametaṃ. Yathā ca “dvīsu vedanāsū”ti
tika-abh03t:976_11: vutte paṭighānusayānusayaṭṭhānato aññā dve vedanā gayhanti, evaṃ bhavarāgānusayānusayanaṭṭhānato
tika-abh03t:977_0: Ettha ca dvīhi vedanāhi sampayuttesu aññesu ca piyarūpasātarūpesu iṭṭharūpādīsu uppajjamāno
tika-abh03t:977_1: kāmarāgānusayo sātasantasukhagiddhiyā pavattatīti dvīsu vedanāsu tassa anusayanaṃ
tika-abh03t:977_2: vuttaṃ. Aññattha uppajjamānopi hi so imāsu dvīsu vedanāsu anugato hutvā seti sukhamicceva
tika-abh03t:977_3: abhilabhatīti. Evaṃ paṭighānusayo ca dukkhavedanāsampayuttesu aññesu ca appiyarūpāsātarūpesu
tika-abh03t:977_4: aniṭṭharūpādīsu uppajjamāno dukkhapaṭikūlato dukkhamicceva paṭihaññatīti dukkhavedanameva
tika-abh03t:977_5: anugato hutvā seti, tena pana tasmiṃ anusayanaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ kāmarāgapaṭighānaṃ tīsu
tika-abh03t:977_7: ca vasena iṭṭhādibhāvena gahitesu kāmarāgapaṭighānaṃ uppatti dassitā hoti. Tattha
tika-abh03t:977_8: uppajjamānā hi te tīsu vedanāsu anusenti nāma. Vedanāttayamukhena vā ettha iṭṭhādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:977_9: ārammaṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, kāmadhātuādiggahaṇena kāmassādādivatthubhūtānaṃ kāmabhavādīnaṃ.
tika-abh03t:977_10: Tattha kāmarāgānusayo bhavassādavasena anusayamāno kāmadhātuyā anuseti, kāmasukhassādavasena
tika-abh03t:977_11: anusayamāno sukhopekkhāvedanāsu. Paṭigho dukkhapaṭighātavaseneva pavattatīti yattha
tika-abh03t:977_12: tattha paṭihaññamānopi dukkhavedanāya eva anuseti. Rūpārūpabhavesu pana rūpārūpāvacaradhammesu
tika-abh03t:977_13: ca kāmassādassa pavatti natthīti tattha anusayamāno rāgo bhavarāgoicceva veditabbo.
tika-abh03t:977_15: nānuseti, tattha diṭṭhānusayo nānusetī”ti evamādīnaṃ vissajjanesu dhātuttayavedanāttayavinimuttaṃ
tika-abh03t:977_16: diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayaṭṭhānaṃ na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca anuttaresu vimokkhesu
tika-abh03t:977_17: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato pihapaccayā uppannadomanasse paṭighānusayo nānuseti, tathā nekkhammassitasomanassupekkhāsu
tika-abh03t:977_19: kāmāvacaravedanā santīti? Hontu, na pana dhātuttayavedanāttayato aññaṃ tadanusayanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:977_20: atthi, tasmā taṃ na vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana “yattha kāmarāgānusayo ca paṭighānusayo ca
tika-abh03t:977_21: mānānusayo ca nānusenti, tattha diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo nānusetīti? Āmantā”ti
tika-abh03t:977_22: vuttaṃ, tasmā avisesena dukkhaṃ paṭighānusayassa anusayanaṭṭhānanti samudāyavasena
tika-abh03t:977_23: gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā lokiyasukhopekkhā kāmarāgamānānusayanaṭṭhānanti.
tika-abh03t:978_0: Apica sutte “idhāvuso visākha, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ domanassaṃ
tika-abh03t:978_1: pajaheyya’nti, so iti paṭisañcikkhitvā paṭighaṃ tena pajahati, na tattha paṭighānusayo
tika-abh03t:978_2: anusetī”ti nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ uppādetvā taṃ vikkhambhetvā vīriyaṃ katvā anāgāmimaggena
tika-abh03t:978_3: paṭighassa samugghātanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi paṭigheneva paṭighappahānaṃ, domanassena
tika-abh03t:978_4: vā domanassappahānaṃ atthīti. Paṭighuppattirahaṭṭhānatāya pana idha sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-abh03t:978_6: sā pana pariyāyadesanā. Evañca katvā paṭhamajjhānavikkhambhitaṃ kāmarāgānusayaṃ tathā
tika-abh03t:978_7: vikkhambhitameva katvā anāgāmimaggena samugghātanaṃ sandhāya “vivicceva…pe… paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh03t:978_8: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, rāgaṃ tena pajahati, na tattha rāgānusayo anusetī”ti
tika-abh03t:978_9: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ catutthajjhānavikkhambhitaṃ avijjānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā
tika-abh03t:978_10: arahattamaggena samugghātanaṃ sandhāya “sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
tika-abh03t:978_11: viharati, avijjaṃ tena pajahati, na tattha avijjānusayo anusetī”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi
tika-abh03t:978_12: lokiyacatutthajjhānupekkhāya avijjānusayo sabbathā nānusetīti sakkā vattuṃ “sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu
tika-abh03t:978_13: dhammesu ettha avijjānusayo anusetī”ti vuttattā, tasmā avijjānusayasseva vatthu catutthajjhānupekkhā,
tika-abh03t:978_14: nekkhammassitadomanassañca paṭighānusayassa vatthu na na hotīti tatthāpi tassa anusayanaṃ
tika-abh03t:978_15: veditabbaṃ. Avatthubhāvato hi idha anusayanaṃ na vuccati, na suttantesu viya vuttanayena
tika-abh03t:979_0: Ettha ca ārammaṇe anusayaṭṭhāne sati bhavarāgavajjo sabbo lobho kāmarāgānusayoti
tika-abh03t:979_1: na sakkā vattuṃ. Dukkhāya hi vedanāya rūpārūpadhātūsu ca anusayamānena diṭṭhānusayena
tika-abh03t:979_2: sampayuttopi lobho lobho eva, na kāmarāgānusayo. Yadi siyā, diṭṭhānusayassa viya
tika-abh03t:979_3: etassapi ṭhānaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti. Atha pana ajjhāsayavasena tanninnatāya anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:979_4: vuttaṃ. Yathā iṭṭhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ sukhāya ca vedanāya appaṭiladdhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato
tika-abh03t:979_5: samanupassato, paṭiladdhapubbaṃ vā atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ pariṇataṃ samanupassato
tika-abh03t:979_6: uppajjamāno paṭigho dukkhe paṭihaññanavaseneva pavattatīti dukkhameva tassa anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:979_7: vuttaṃ, nālambitaṃ, evaṃ dukkhādīsu abhinivesanavasena uppajjamānena diṭṭhānusayena
tika-abh03t:979_8: sampayuttopi lobho sukhābhisaṅgavaseneva pavattatīti sātasantasukhadvayamevassa anusayaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:979_9: vuttanti bhavarāgavajjassa sabbalobhassa kāmarāgānusayatā na virujjhati, ekasmiṃyeva
tika-abh03t:979_10: ca ārammaṇe rajjanti dussanti ca. Tattha rāgo sukhajjhāsayo paṭigho dukkhajjhāsayoti
tika-abh03t:980_0: Evañca katvā “yattha kāmarāgānusayo anuseti, tattha paṭighānusayo anusetīti? No”ti
tika-abh03t:980_1: vuttanti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dvīsu vedanāsu iṭṭhārammaṇe ca domanassuppattiṃ vatvā
tika-abh03t:980_2: “domanassamattameva pana taṃ hoti, na paṭighānusayo”ti vuttattā yathā tattha paṭigho
tika-abh03t:980_3: paṭighānusayo na hoti, evaṃ dukkhādīsu uppajjamānena diṭṭhānusayena sahajāto lobho
tika-abh03t:980_4: kāmarāgānusayo na hoticceva viññāyatīti. Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “domanassamattameva pana
tika-abh03t:980_5: taṃ hoti, na paṭighānusayo”ti, ettha na paṭighānusayoti natthi paṭighānusayoti attho
tika-abh03t:980_6: daṭṭhabbo. Na hi domanassassa paṭighānusayabhāvāsaṅkā atthīti.
tika-abh03t:981_0: Desanā saṃkiṇṇā viya bhaveyyāti bhavarāgassapi kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva
tika-abh03t:981_1: uppatti vuttā viya bhaveyya, tasmā ārammaṇavisesena visesadassanatthaṃ evaṃ desanā
tika-abh03t:985: 3. Anuseti uppajjatīti paccuppannavohārā pavattāvirāmavasena veditabbā. Maggeneva hi anusayānaṃ virāmo vicchedo hoti, na tato pubbeti.
tika-abh03t:986_0: 20. Nāpi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne uppajjanti, na ekaṃ dhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontīti ettha purimena
tika-abh03t:986_1: ekasmiṃ cittuppāde uppatti nivāritā, pacchimena ekasmiṃ ārammaṇeti ayaṃ viseso. Puggalokāsavārassa
tika-abh03t:986_2: paṭilome tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ tassa tassa anusayassa ananusayanaṭṭhānaṃ pakatiyā
tika-abh03t:986_3: pahānena ca veditabbaṃ, “tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya tesaṃ tattha kāmarāgānusayo
tika-abh03t:986_4: nānuseti, no ca tesaṃ tattha paṭighānusayo nānuseti, tesaññeva puggalānaṃ rūpadhātuyā
tika-abh03t:986_5: arūpadhātuyā apariyāpanne tesaṃ tattha kāmarāgānusayo ca nānuseti, paṭighānusayo
tika-abh03t:986_6: ca nānusetī”ti pakatiyā dukkhādīnaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ ananusayaṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:986_7: “dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ sabbattha kāmarāgānusayo ca nānuseti, paṭighānusayo ca nānusetī”ti
tika-abh03t:986_8: anusayappahānena. Ettha purimanayena okāsaṃ avekkhitvā puggalassa vijjamānānaṃ anusayānaṃ
tika-abh03t:986_9: ananusayanaṃ vuttaṃ, pacchimanayena puggalaṃ avekkhitvā okāsassa kāmadhātuādikassa anokāsatāti.
tika-abh03t:989_1: vutto. Puggalassa ca imasmiṃ bhave sānusayoti evaṃ bhavavisesena vā, imasmiṃ kāmarāgānusayena
tika-abh03t:989_2: sānusayo imasmiṃ itaresu kenacīti evaṃ bhavānusayavisesena vā sānusayatāniranusayatādikā
tika-abh03t:989_3: natthi. Tathā dvīsu vedanāsu kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo, dukkhāya vedanāya niranusayoti
tika-abh03t:989_4: idampi natthi. Na hi puggalassa vedanā okāso, atha kho anusayānanti. Anusayassa pana
tika-abh03t:989_5: tassa tassa so so anusayanokāso puggalassa tena tena anusayena sānusayatāya, tassa
tika-abh03t:989_6: tassa pajahanaparijānanānañca nimittaṃ hoti, ananusayanokāso ca niranusayatādīnaṃ,
tika-abh03t:989_7: tasmā okāsavāresu bhummaniddesaṃ akatvā “yato tato”ti nimittatthe nissakkavacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:989_8: kataṃ, pajahanapariññāvāresu apādānatthe eva vā. Tato tato hi okāsato apagamakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:990_0: Tattha yatoti yato anusayaṭṭhānato anulome, paṭilome ananusayaṭṭhānatoti attho. Anusayānānusayasseva
tika-abh03t:990_1: hi nimittāpādānabhāvadassanatthaṃ “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā tato mānānusayena sānusayoti
tika-abh03t:990_3: niranusayoti, na pajahatī”ti ca evamādīsu rūpadhātuādayo eva bhummaniddeseneva niddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t:990_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana catutthapañhavissajjanena sarūpato anusayanaṭṭhānassa dassitattā
tika-abh03t:990_5: tadatthe ādipañhepi “yato”ti anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā puna
tika-abh03t:990_6: “yato”ti etassa vacanatthaṃ dassetuṃ “uppannena kāmarāgānusayena sānusayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:990_7: taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ viya dissati. Na hi uppanneneva anusayena sānusayo, uppattirahaṭṭhānatañca
tika-abh03t:990_8: sandhāyeva nissakkavacanaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Na hi apariyāpannānaṃ anusayuppattirahaṭṭhānatāti
tika-abh03t:990_9: taṃ tatheva dissati. Evaṃ panettha attho daṭṭhabbo – yato uppannenāti yato uppannena
tika-abh03t:990_10: bhavitabbaṃ, tenāti uppattirahaṭṭhāne nissakkavacanaṃ katanti. Tathā sabbadhammesu
tika-abh03t:990_11: uppajjanakenāti. Uppattipaṭisedhe akate anuppattiyā anicchitattā sabbadhammesu uppajjanakabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:990_12: āpannena anuppajjanabhāvaṃ apaneti nāma. Sabbatthāti etassa pana sabbaṭṭhānatoti
tika-abh03t:990_13: ayamattho na na sambhavati. Ttha-kārañhi bhummato aññatthāpi saddavidū icchantīti.
tika-abh03t:993_0: 132-197. Pajahanavāre yena kāmarāgānusayādayo sāvasesā pahīyanti, so te pajahatīti
tika-abh03t:993_1: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā vattabbo na hoti apajahanasabbhāvā, tasmā sanniṭṭhāne niravasesappajahanakoyeva
tika-abh03t:993_2: pajahatīti vutto, tasmā “yo vā pana mānānusayaṃ pajahati, so kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahatīti?
tika-abh03t:993_3: No”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana saṃsayapadena pahānakaraṇamattameva pucchati, na sanniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:993_4: karoti, tasmā yathāvijjamānaṃ pahānaṃ sandhāya “yo kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahati, so mānānusayaṃ
tika-abh03t:993_5: pajahatīti? Tadekaṭṭhaṃ pajahatī”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭilome pana “nappajahatī”ti pajahanābhāvo
tika-abh03t:993_6: eva sanniṭṭhānapadena saṃsayapadena ca vinicchito pucchito ca, tasmā yesaṃ pajahanaṃ
tika-abh03t:993_7: natthi niravasesavasena pajahanakānaṃ, te ṭhapetvā avasesā appajahanasabbhāveneva
tika-abh03t:993_8: nappajahantīti vuttā, na ca yathāvijjamānena pahāneneva vajjitāti daṭṭhabbāti. “Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgiñca
tika-abh03t:993_9: aṭṭhamakañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā kāmarāgānusayañca nappajahanti vicikicchānusayañca
tika-abh03t:993_10: nappajahantī”ti ettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puthujjano pahānapariññāya abhāvena nappajahati,
tika-abh03t:994_0: Tattha kiñcāpi kesañci vicikicchānusayo kesañci ubhayanti sesānaṃ tesaṃ pahīnatā
tika-abh03t:994_1: atthi, tathāpi sotāpannādīnaṃ vicikicchānusayassa pahīnatā ubhayāpajahanassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:994_2: na hotīti tesaṃ pahīnattā “nappajahantī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ, atha pana kāmarāgānusayañca
tika-abh03t:994_3: nappajahantīti imaṃ sanniṭṭhānena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ saṅgahitatādassanatthaṃ vuttanti
tika-abh03t:994_4: na tattha kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ, pucchitassa pana saṃsayatthassa kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ
tika-abh03t:994_5: sati “sesā tassa anusayassa pahīnattā”ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ “yo kāmarāgānusayaṃ
tika-abh03t:994_6: nappajahati, so diṭṭhānusayaṃ vicikicchānusayaṃ nappajahatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā pucchite
tika-abh03t:994_7: sadisavissajjanake diṭṭhivicikicchānusaye sandhāya kāraṇassa vattabbattā, tasmā tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:994_8: anusayānaṃ pahīnattāti tesaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchānusayānaṃ pahīnattā te saṃsayatthasaṅgahite
tika-abh03t:997_0: 264-274. Pahīnavāre phalaṭṭhavaseneva desanā āraddhāti anulomaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:997_1: Paṭilome hi puthujjanavasenapi desanā gahitāti. “Phalaṭṭhavasenevā”ti ca sādhāraṇavacanena
tika-abh03t:997_3: na koci anusayo uppattiraho, nāpi anuppattirahataṃ āpādito, tasmā te na anusayasānusayapahīnauppajjanavāresu gahitāti.
tika-abh03t:998_0: 275-296. Okāsavāre so so anusayo attano attano okāse eva anuppattidhammataṃ āpādito
tika-abh03t:998_1: pahīno, anāpādito ca appahīnoti pahīnāppahīnavacanāni tadokāsameva dīpenti, tasmā
tika-abh03t:998_2: anokāse tadubhayāvattabbatā vuttāti. Sādhāraṇaṭṭhāne tena saddhiṃ pahīno nāma hotīti
tika-abh03t:998_3: tena saddhiṃ samānokāse pahīno nāmāti attho, na samānakāle pahīnoti.
tika-abh03t:1001_0: 332-340. Dhātuvāre santānaṃ anugatā hutvā sayantīti yasmiṃ santāne appahīnā, taṃsantāne
tika-abh03t:1001_1: appahīnabhāvena anugantvā uppattiarahabhāvena sayantīti attho. Uppattirahatā eva
tika-abh03t:1001_2: hi anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti idhāpi yuttāti. Ettha ca na kāmadhātuādīni
tika-abh03t:1001_3: cha paṭinisedhavacanāni dhātuvisesaniddhāraṇāni na hontīti “na kāmadhātuyā cutassa
tika-abh03t:1001_4: na kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādimhi vuccamāne imaṃ nāma upapajjantassāti na viññāyeyya,
tika-abh03t:1001_5: tasmā taṃmūlikāsu yojanāsu “na kāmadhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ arūpadhātuṃ
tika-abh03t:1001_6: upapajjantassā”ti paṭhamaṃ yojetvā puna anukkamena “na kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādikā
tika-abh03t:1001_7: yojanā katā. Evañhi na kāmadhātuādipadehi yathāvuttadhātuyoyeva gahitā, na kañcīti
tika-abh03t:1001_8: viññāyati. Yathā anusayavāre “anusentīti padassa uppajjantīti attho gahito”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1001_9: tatthāpi uppajjamānameva sandhāya uppajjantīti gahetuṃ na sakkā “yassa kāmarāgānusayo
tika-abh03t:1001_10: anuseti, tassa paṭighānusayo anusetīti? Āmantā”tiādivacanato. Athāpi appahīnataṃ
tika-abh03t:1001_11: sandhāya uppajjantīti attho tattha gahito, idhāpi so na na yujjatīti. Bhaṅgāti bhañjitabbā,
tika-abh03t:1001_12: dvidhā kātabbāti attho. Nanu na koci anusayo yattha uppajjantassa anuseti nānuseti
tika-abh03t:1001_13: cāti dvidhā kātabbā, tattheva kasmā “kati anusayā bhaṅgā? Anusayā bhaṅgā natthī”ti
tika-abh03t:1001_14: pucchāvissajjanāni katāni. Na hi pakārantarābhāve saṃsayo yuttoti? Na na yutto, “anusayā
tika-abh03t:1006_0: 1-62. Cittayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ āditova tayo suddhikamahāvārā hontīti ime tayo mahāvārā
tika-abh03t:1006_1: sarāgādikusalādīhi missakā suddhikā ca, tesu ādito suddhikā hontīti attho. Missakesu
tika-abh03t:1006_2: ca ekekasmiṃ sarāgādimissakacitte tayo tayo mahāvārā, te tattha tattha pana vutte
tika-abh03t:1006_3: sampiṇḍetvā “soḷasa puggalavārā”tiādi vuttaṃ, na nirantaraṃ vutteti. “Yassa cittaṃ
tika-abh03t:1006_4: uppajjati na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissatī”tiādinā uppādanirodhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1006_6: vutto. Evaṃ sesānampi vārānaṃ taṃtaṃnāmatā pāḷianusārena veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:1009_1: puggale adhippete tañca cittaṃ adhippetameva hotīti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Arahato
tika-abh03t:1009_2: pacchimacittampīti nuppajjati nirujjhatīti evaṃpakāraṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1010_1: asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “cittassa
tika-abh03t:1010_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthā”ti etassa “sabbesaṃ cittaṃ khaṇapaccuppannameva
tika-abh03t:1010_3: hutvā uppādakkhaṇaṃ atītattā uppajjittha nāmā”ti attho vutto. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:1010_4: tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjati cāti etassapi uppādaṃ pattattā uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t:1010_5: anatītattā uppajjati nāmāti dvayametaṃ evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Na hi khaṇapaccuppanne
tika-abh03t:1010_6: “uppajjitthā”ti atītavohāro atthi. Yadi siyā, yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha, taṃ
tika-abh03t:1010_7: cittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “no”ti avatvā vibhajitabbaṃ siyā. Tathā “yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1010_8: taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthā”ti ettha ca “no”ti avatvā “āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. “Cittassa
tika-abh03t:1010_9: bhaṅgakkhaṇe”ti pana bhijjamānacittasamaṅgī puggalo vutto, tassa atītaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha,
tika-abh03t:1010_10: na ca kiñci cittaṃ uppajjati. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇeti ca uppajjamānacittasamaṅgī
tika-abh03t:1010_11: puggalo vutto, tassapi atītaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, taṃ pana cittaṃ uppajjatīti evamettha
tika-abh03t:1010_12: attho daṭṭhabbo. Cittanti hi sāmaññavacanaṃ ekasmiṃ anekasmiñca yathāgahitavisese
tika-abh03t:1010_13: tiṭṭhatīti. “Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti? Cittassa
tika-abh03t:1010_14: bhaṅgakkhaṇe”ti ettha yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissatīti etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitapuggalasseva
tika-abh03t:1010_15: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti evaṃ sabbattha sanniṭṭhānavasena niyamo veditabbo. Uppannuppajjamānavāro
tika-abh03t:1010_16: niruddhanirujjhamānavāro ca puggalavārādīsu tīsupi ninnānākaraṇā uddiṭṭhā niddiṭṭhā
tika-abh03t:1010_17: ca. Tattha puggalavāre avisesena yaṃ kañci tādisaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya “uppannaṃ uppajjamāna”ntiādi
tika-abh03t:1010_18: vuttaṃ, dhammavāre cittameva, puggaladhammavāre puggalaṃ cittañcāti ayamettha viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1011_0: 83. Atikkantakālavāre imassa puggalavārattā puggalo pucchitoti puggalasseva vissajjanena
tika-abh03t:1011_1: bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā yassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti etena na koci puggalo na gahito, evaṃ
tika-abh03t:1011_2: yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālanti etena sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t:1011_3: na koci na gahito. Na hi so puggalo atthi, yassa cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ atītaṃ natthi,
tika-abh03t:1011_4: te ca pana nirujjhamānakkhaṇātītacittā na na hontīti paṭhamo pañho “āmantā”ti vissajjitabbo
tika-abh03t:1011_5: siyā, tathā dutiyatatiyā. Catuttho pana “pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh03t:1011_6: bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, itaresaṃ
tika-abh03t:1011_7: cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca avītikkanta”nti vissajjitabbo
tika-abh03t:1011_8: bhaveyya, tathā avissajjetvā kasmā sabbattha cittameva vibhattanti? Cittavasena puggalavavatthānato.
tika-abh03t:1011_9: Khaṇassa hi vītikkantatāya atikkantakālatāvacanena vattamānassa ca cittassa vasena
tika-abh03t:1011_10: puggalo uppādakkhaṇātītacitto vutto atītassa ca, tattha purimassa cittaṃ na bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1011_11: vītikkantaṃ pacchimassa vītikkantanti evamādiko puggalavibhāgo yassa cittassa vasena
tika-abh03t:1011_13: dassito hotīti sabbavissajjanesu cittameva vibhattaṃ. Atha vā nayidha dhammamattavisiṭṭho
tika-abh03t:1011_14: puggalo pucchito, atha kho puggalavisiṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ, tasmā cittameva vissajjitanti
tika-abh03t:1011_15: veditabbaṃ. Yadipi puggalappadhānā pucchā, athāpi cittappadhānā, ubhayathāpi dutiyapucchāya
tika-abh03t:1011_16: “āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, tathā pana avatvā nirodhakkhaṇavītikkamena atikkantakālatā
tika-abh03t:1011_17: na uppādakkhaṇavītikkamena atikkantakālatā viya vattamānassa atthīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:1011_18: “atītaṃ citta”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānanti ettha uppajjamānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1011_19: khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ yassa cittaṃ na hotīti attho. Esa nayo “na
tika-abh03t:1012_0: 114-116. Missakavāresu yassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ
tika-abh03t:1012_1: nirujjhissati nuppajjissatīti pucchā, noti vissajjanañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1012_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “yassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, tassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh03t:1012_3: nirujjhissati nuppajjissatī”ti mātikāṭhapanāyaṃ vuttattā vissajjanepi tatheva sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayatthesu
tika-abh03t:1012_5: tesaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati nirujjhissati nuppajjissati, itaresaṃ
tika-abh03t:1012_6: sarāgacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati nirujjhissati
tika-abh03t:1012_7: ceva uppajjissati cā”ti evamādinā nayena yebhuyyena suddhikavārasadisameva vissajjanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1018_0: 1-16. Dhammayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāti yathā mūlayamake
tika-abh03t:1018_1: kusalādidhammā desitā, yathā ca khandhayamakādīsu “pañcakkhandhā”tiādinā aññathā
tika-abh03t:1018_2: saṅgahetvā desitā, tathā adesetvā yā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ “kusalākusalā dhammā”tiādikā
tika-abh03t:1018_3: mātikā, taṃ idha ādimhi ṭhapetvā desitassāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1021_0: 33-34. “Yassa kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, tassa abyākatā dhammā uppajjantī”ti etassa
tika-abh03t:1021_1: vissajjane “abyākatā cāti cittasamuṭṭhānarūpavasena vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1021_2: imasmiṃ pana pañhe kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpañca labbhati, taṃ pana paṭilomavārassa vissajjane
tika-abh03t:1021_3: sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ, pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe, āruppe akusalānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:1021_4: tesaṃ kusalā ca dhammā na uppajjanti abyākatā ca dhammā na uppajjantīti ettha pavatte
tika-abh03t:1021_5: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppajjamānampi kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpaṃ aggahetvā “abyākatā ca
tika-abh03t:1021_6: dhammā na uppajjantī”ti vuttattā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva idhādhippetaṃ. Kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpe
tika-abh03t:1021_7: na vidhānaṃ, nāpi paṭisedhoti keci vadanti, tathā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva sandhāya
tika-abh03t:1021_8: “yassa kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, tassa abyākatā dhammā nirujjhantīti? No”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh03t:1021_9: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānarūpādīnampi
tika-abh03t:1021_10: uppādassa uppādakkhaṇe ca nirodhassa evamādīhi eva pāḷīhi paṭisedhasiddhito.
tika-abh03t:1022_0: Ye ca vadanti “yathā paṭisambhidāmagge nirodhakathāyaṃ ‘sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātā
tika-abh03t:1022_1: dhammā ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ sabbepi virāgā ceva honti virāgārammaṇā virāgagocarā
tika-abh03t:1022_4: cittajarūpameva kathita”nti, tañca tathā na hoti. Yesañhi sotāpattimaggo sahajātapaccayo
tika-abh03t:1022_5: hoti, yesu ca virāgādiāsaṅkā hoti, te sotāpattimaggasahajātā dhammā sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:1022_6: jātā dhammāti tattha vuttā. Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātāti hi vacanaṃ magge jātataṃ
tika-abh03t:1022_7: dīpeti, na ca kammajādīni amagge jāyamānāni maggakkhaṇe jātavohāraṃ arahanti tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1022_8: tassa sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe sahajātapaccayattābhāvato, tasmā maggakkhaṇe taṃsahajātadhammesu
tika-abh03t:1022_9: ṭhapetabbaṃ ṭhapetuṃ “ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti vuttaṃ, idha pana kusalādidhammā
tika-abh03t:1022_10: yassa yattha uppajjanti nirujjhanti ca, tassa puggalassa tasmiñca okāse abyākatadhammānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1022_11: uppādanirodhānaṃ kusalādipaṭibaddhatā appaṭibaddhatā ca āmaṭṭhā, na ca kammajādirūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:1022_12: abyākataṃ na hoti, tasmā sanniṭṭhānena gahitassa puggalassa okāse vā uppādanirodhesu
tika-abh03t:1022_13: vijjamānesu abyākatānaṃ te veditabbā, avijjamānesu ca paṭisedhetabbā, na ca acittapaṭibaddhā
tika-abh03t:1022_14: abyākatāti ettha na gahitāti sakkā vattuṃ nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānañca uppādanirodhavacanatoti.
tika-abh03t:1023_0: Catutthapañhe pavatte akusalābyākatacittassa uppādakkhaṇeti idaṃ “yassa vā pana abyākatā
tika-abh03t:1023_1: dhammā uppajjantī”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena gahitesu pañcavokāre akusalābyākatacittānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1023_2: catuvokāre ca abyākatacittasseva uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha
tika-abh03t:1024_0: 79. “Ekāvajjanena 166 uppannassā”ti vuttaṃ, nānāvajjanenapi pana tato purimatarajavanavīthīsu
tika-abh03t:1024_1: uppannassa “uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ akusalā dhammā nuppajjissanti, no ca tesaṃ kusalā
tika-abh03t:1024_2: dhammā nuppajjantī”ti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ labbhateva, tasmā etena lakkhaṇena samānalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1024_3: sabbaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti, tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇeti
tika-abh03t:1024_4: eteneva kusalānāgatabhāvapariyosānena tāya eva samānalakkhaṇatāya dīpitaṃ hotīti
tika-abh03t:1024_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo akusalātītabhāvassa abyākatātītabhāvassa ca ādimhi “dutiye akusale”ti,
tika-abh03t:1024_6: “dutiye citte”ti ca vuttaṭṭhāne. Yathā hi bhāvanāvāre bhāvanāpahānānaṃ pariyosānena
tika-abh03t:1024_7: aggamaggena tato purimatarānipi bhāvanāpahānāni dassitāni honti, evamidhāpi taṃ taṃ
tika-abh03t:1024_8: tena tena ādinā antena ca dassitanti.
tika-abh03t:1025_0: 100. Pañcavokāre akusalānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ akusalā ca dhammā nirujjhanti abyākatā
tika-abh03t:1025_1: ca dhammā nirujjhantīti vacanena paṭisandhicittato soḷasamaṃ, tato parampi vā bhavanikanticittaṃ
tika-abh03t:1031_0: 1. Indriyayamake vibhaṅge viya jīvitindriyaṃ manindriyānantaraṃ aniddisitvā purisindriyānantaraṃ
tika-abh03t:1031_1: uddiṭṭhaṃ “tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1031_2: jīvitindriya”nti sutte desitakkamena. Pavattivāre hi ekantaṃ pavattiyaṃ eva uppajjamānānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1031_3: sukhindriyādīnaṃ kammajānaṃ akammajānañca anupālakaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cutipaṭisandhīsu
tika-abh03t:1031_4: ca pavattamānānaṃ kammajānanti taṃmūlakāni yamakāni cutipaṭisandhipavattivasena vattabbānīti
tika-abh03t:1031_5: veditabbāni. Cakkhundriyādīsu pana purisindriyāvasānesu yaṃ mūlakameva na hoti manindriyaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1031_6: taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesamūlakāni cutiupapattivaseneva vattabbāni āyatanayamake viya,
tika-abh03t:1031_7: tasmā jīvitindriyaṃ tesaṃ majjhe anuddisitvā ante uddiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:1034_0: 94. Itthī itthindriyanti ettha yasmā itthīti koci sabhāvo natthi, na ca rūpādidhamme
tika-abh03t:1034_1: upādāya itthiggahaṇaṃ na hoti, tasmā itthiggahaṇassa avijjamānampi vijjamānamiva
tika-abh03t:1034_2: gahetvā pavattito tathāgahitassa vasena “natthī”ti avatvā “no”ti vuttaṃ. Sukhassa
tika-abh03t:1034_3: ca bhedaṃ katvā “sukhaṃ somanassa”nti, dukkhassa ca “dukkhaṃ domanassa”nti vacaneneva
tika-abh03t:1034_4: somanassato aññā sukhā vedanā sukhaṃ, domanassato ca aññā dukkhā vedanā dukkhanti
tika-abh03t:1034_5: ayaṃ viseso gahitoyevāti “sukhaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhindriya”nti ettha “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1035: 140. Suddhindriyavāre cakkhu indriyanti ettha dibbacakkhupaññācakkhūni paññindriyāni hontīti “āmantā”ti vuttaṃ. Avasesaṃ sotanti taṇhāsotamevāha.
tika-abh03t:1038_0: 186. Pavattivāre “chayimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni. Katamāni cha? Cakkhundriyaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t:1038_1: kāyindriyaṃ manindriya”nti sutte vuttanayena idha uddiṭṭhaṃ manindriyaṃ cutipaṭisandhipavattīsu
tika-abh03t:1038_2: pavattamānehi kammajākammajehi sabbehipi yogaṃ gacchati, na ca jīvitindriyaṃ viya
tika-abh03t:1038_3: aññadhammanissayena gahetabbaṃ, pubbaṅgamattāva padhānaṃ, tasmā kūṭaṃ viya gopānasīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1038_4: sabbindriyānaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ ante ṭhapetvā yojitaṃ. Jīvitindriyādimūlakesu pavattiñca
tika-abh03t:1038_5: gahetvā gatesu “yassa jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa sukhindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? Sabbesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1038_6: upapajjantānaṃ, pavatte sukhindriyavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1038_7: uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sukhindriyaṃ uppajjati, sukhindriyasampayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:1038_8: tesaṃ jīvitindriyañca uppajjati sukhindriyañca uppajjatī”tiādinā sukhadukkhadomanassindriyehi
tika-abh03t:1038_9: lokuttarindriyehi ca yojanā labbhati, tathā “yassa sukhindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa
tika-abh03t:1038_10: dukkhindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No”tiādinā taṃmūlakā ca nayā. Tehi pana pavattiyaṃyeva
tika-abh03t:1038_11: uppajjamānehi yojanā taṃmūlakā ca cutipaṭisandhipavattīsu pavattamānehi somanassindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t:1038_12: yojanāya jīvitindriyamūlakehi ca nayehi pākaṭāyevāti katvā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1039_2: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi “catunnaṃyevā”ti niyamo kato, tena taṃsamānalakkhaṇā parittavipākarūpāvacarapaṭisandhiyopi
tika-abh03t:1039_3: dassitā honti. Tattha kāmāvacaresu somanassapaṭisandhisamānatāya mahāvipākehi catūhi
tika-abh03t:1039_4: nidassanaṃ kataṃ, tena yathā sasomanassapaṭisandhikā acakkhukā na honti, evaṃ itaramahāvipākapaṭisandhikāpīti
tika-abh03t:1039_5: ayamattho dassito hoti. Gabbhaseyyakānañca anuppannesu cakkhādīsu cavantānaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhikatā
tika-abh03t:1039_7: hoti. Gabbhaseyyakepi hi sandhāya “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa
tika-abh03t:1039_8: cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjatīti? Āmantā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ yathā yujjati, tathā āyatanayamake
tika-abh03t:1039_9: dassitaṃ. Na hi sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitānaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vajjane kāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-abh03t:1039_10: “itthīnaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantīna”ntiādīsu ca te eva vuttāti.
tika-abh03t:1040_0: Upekkhāya acakkhukānanti ahetukapaṭisandhivasena vuttanti ettha ca kāmāvacare sopekkhaacakkhukapaṭisandhiyā
tika-abh03t:1040_1: taṃsamānalakkhaṇaṃ arūpapaṭisandhiñca nidassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kesuci pana potthakesu
tika-abh03t:1041_0: “Tattha hi ekanteneva saddhāsatipaññāyo natthi, samādhivīriyāni pana indriyappattāni
tika-abh03t:1041_1: na hontī”ti vuttaṃ, yadi pana samādhivīriyāni santi, “indriyappattāni na hontī”ti
tika-abh03t:1041_2: na sakkā vattuṃ “samādhi samādhindriyanti? Āmantā”ti “vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyanti? Āmantā”ti
tika-abh03t:1041_3: vacanato. Ahetukapaṭisandhicitte ca yathā samādhileso ekaggatā atthi, na evaṃ vīriyaleso
tika-abh03t:1041_4: atthi, tasmā evamettha vattabbaṃ siyā “tattha hi ekanteneva saddhāvīriyasatipaññāyo
tika-abh03t:1041_5: natthi, ekaggatā pana samādhileso eva hotī”ti. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo siyā – yathā
tika-abh03t:1041_6: aññesu kesuci ahetukacittesu samādhivīriyāni honti indriyappattāni ca, evamidha samādhivīriyāni
tika-abh03t:1041_7: indriyappattāni na hontīti. Samādhivīriyindriyānameva abhāvaṃ dassento ahetukantarato
tika-abh03t:1041_8: viseseti. Tattha “samādhivīriyāni pana na hontī”ti vattabbe “indriyappattānī”ti samādhilesassa
tika-abh03t:1041_9: samādhindriyabhāvaṃ appattassa sabbhāvato vuttaṃ, na vīriyalesassa. Visesanañhi visesitabbe
tika-abh03t:1041_10: pavattati. Yesu pana potthakesu “tattha ekanteneva saddhāvīriyasatipaññāyo natthī”ti
tika-abh03t:1042_0: Yāva cakkhundriyaṃ nuppajjati, tāva gabbhagatānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ bhāvo atthīti iminā
tika-abh03t:1042_1: adhippāyenāha “sahetukānaṃ acakkhukānanti gabbhaseyyakavasena ceva arūpīvasena ca
tika-abh03t:1042_2: vutta”nti. Gabbhaseyyakāpi pana avassaṃ uppajjanakacakkhukā na labbhantīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1042_3: Sacakkhukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānanti kāmadhātuyaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ vasena vuttanti
tika-abh03t:1042_4: idhāpi ahetukapaṭisandhikā ca acakkhukā labbhanteva. Itthipurisindriyasantānānampi
tika-abh03t:1042_5: upapattivasena uppādo, cutivasena nirodho bāhullavasena dassito. Kadāci hi tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1042_6: paṭhamakappikādīnaṃ viya pavattiyampi uppādanirodhā hontīti. Ettha purisindriyāvasānesu
tika-abh03t:1042_7: indriyamūlayamakesu paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānehi gahitehi upapatticutivasena gacchantehi
tika-abh03t:1042_8: cakkhundriyādīhi niyamitattā jīvitindriyādīnaṃ pavattivasenapi labbhamānānaṃ upapatticutivaseneva
tika-abh03t:1043_2: arūpajīvitindriyaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti. Etesañceva aññesañca pañcindriyānaṃ yathālābhavasenāti
tika-abh03t:1043_3: ettha etesaṃ jīvitindriyādīnaṃ cutipaṭisandhipavattesu, aññesañca cakkhundriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1043_4: cutipaṭisandhīsūti evaṃ yathālābho daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ pana chedeyevāti ettha tassa tassa
tika-abh03t:1043_5: paripuṇṇapañhassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sarūpadassanena vissajjane vissajjite pacchimakoṭṭhāsassa
tika-abh03t:1044_0: Yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati, tassa jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjatīti?
tika-abh03t:1044_1: Vinā somanassena upapajjantānaṃ pavatte somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:1044_2: tesaṃ somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ na uppajjatīti ettha
tika-abh03t:1044_4: dīpeti. Tassa hi upapattiyaṃyeva uppādo vattabboti. “Vinā somanassena upapajjantāna”nti
tika-abh03t:1044_5: ettha asaññasatte saṅgahetvā pavattivasena te ca nirodhasamāpannā ca na vuttā, anuppādopi
tika-abh03t:1044_6: panetassa cutiupapattīsveva vattabbo, na pavatteti. Pacchimakoṭṭhāsepi “sabbesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1044_7: cavantānaṃ, pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyañca na uppajjati jīvitindriyañca
tika-abh03t:1044_8: na uppajjatī”ti evaṃ “sabbesaṃ cavantāna”nti ettheva asaññasatte saṅgaṇhitvā pavattivasena
tika-abh03t:1044_9: te ca nirodhasamāpannā na ca vuttā. Yassayatthake ca nirodhasamāpannā na dassetabbā
tika-abh03t:1044_10: na gahetabbāti attho. Na hi “nirodhasamāpannāna”nti vacanaṃ “asaññasattāna”nti vacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1044_11: viya okāsadīpakaṃ, nāpi “upekkhāsampayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe, sabbesaṃ cittassa
tika-abh03t:1044_12: bhaṅgakkhaṇe”tiādivacanaṃ viya somanassindriyādīnaṃ anuppādakkhaṇadīpakaṃ, atha kho
tika-abh03t:1045_0: Atītakālabhede suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca
tika-abh03t:1045_1: na uppajjittha jīvitindriyañca na uppajjitthāti ettha “upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti
tika-abh03t:1045_2: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu “suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ, asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca
tika-abh03t:1045_3: na uppajjittha manindriyañca na uppajjitthā”ti ettha viya “upapajjantāna”nti vattabbanti?
tika-abh03t:1045_4: Na vattabbaṃ. Yathā hi somanassamanindriyānaṃ vasena upapajjantā puggalā upapatticittasamaṅgino
tika-abh03t:1045_5: honti, na evaṃ somanassajīvitindriyānaṃ vasena upapattisamaṅginoyeva honti. Jīvitindriyassa
tika-abh03t:1045_6: hi vasena yāva paṭhamarūpajīvitindriyaṃ dharati, tāva upapajjantā nāma honti. Tadā
tika-abh03t:1045_7: ca dutiyacittato paṭṭhāya “jīvitindriyañca na uppajjitthā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ arūpajīvitindriyassa
tika-abh03t:1045_8: uppajjitvā niruddhattā, tasmā ubhayaṃ uppādakkhaṇena nidassitaṃ. Yathā hi “na nirujjhitthā”ti
tika-abh03t:1045_9: idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ upapatticittassa dvīsu khaṇesu labbhamānaṃ sabbapaṭhamena upapatticittassa
tika-abh03t:1046_0: Anāgatakālabhede uppajjissamāne sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā aññassa ca uppajjissamānatāva
tika-abh03t:1046_1: pucchitā. Tattha yathā paccuppannakālabhede sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayabhedehi uppajjamānasseva
tika-abh03t:1046_2: gahitattā “yassa cakkhundriyādīni uppajjanti, upapajjantassa tassa jīvitindriyādīni
tika-abh03t:1046_3: uppajjantī”ti upapajjantasseva pucchitānaṃ upapattiyaṃyeva tesaṃ uppādo sambhavati,
tika-abh03t:1046_4: na aññattha, na evamidha “yassa cakkhundriyādīni uppajjissanti, upapajjantassa tassa
tika-abh03t:1046_5: jīvitindriyādīni uppajjissantī”ti upapajjantasseva pucchitānaṃ tesaṃ upapattito aññattha
tika-abh03t:1046_6: uppādo na sambhavati, tasmā “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, tassa somanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1046_7: uppajjissatīti? Āmantā”ti vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā nirodhavārepi “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1046_8: nirujjhissati, tassa somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi yassa
tika-abh03t:1046_9: cakkhundriyaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa somanassindriyaṃ na nirujjhissati, api pacchimabhavikassa
tika-abh03t:1046_10: upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhikassa. Na hi upapajjantassa tassa cutito pubbeva somanassindriyanirodho
tika-abh03t:1046_11: na sambhavatīti. Ettha hi paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānattho pucchitabbatthanissayo
tika-abh03t:1046_12: mādisova upapattiuppādindriyavā ubhayuppādindriyavā attho paṭinivattitvāpi pucchitabbatthassa
tika-abh03t:1046_13: nissayoti evaṃ viya dutiyapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānatthameva niyameti, na tattheva pucchitabbaṃ
tika-abh03t:1046_14: anāgatabhāvamattena sarūpato gahitaṃ uppādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃsayatthanti. Yasmā
tika-abh03t:1046_15: cevaṃ sanniṭṭhānatthassa niyamo hoti, tasmā “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjissati,
tika-abh03t:1046_16: tassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissatīti? Āmantā”ti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo nirodhavārepi.
tika-abh03t:1047_0: Paṭilome pana yathā anulome “uppajjissati nirujjhissatī”ti uppādanirodhā anāgatā
tika-abh03t:1047_1: sarūpavasena vuttā, evaṃ avuttattā yathā tattha saṃsayapadena gahitassa indriyassa
tika-abh03t:1047_2: pavattiyampi uppādanirodhā cakkhundriyādimūlakesu yojitā, na evaṃ yojetabbā. Yathā
tika-abh03t:1047_3: hi uppādanirodhe atikkamitvā appatvā ca uppādanirodhā sambhavanti yojetuṃ, na evaṃ
tika-abh03t:1047_4: anuppādānirodhe atikkamitvā appatvā ca anuppādānirodhā sambhavanti abhūtābhāvassa
tika-abh03t:1047_5: abhūtābhāvaṃ atikkamitvā appatvā ca sambhavānuppattito, abhūtuppādanirodhābhāvo ca
tika-abh03t:1047_6: paṭilome pucchito, tasmāssa visesarahitassa abhūtābhāvassa vattamānānaṃ uppādassa
tika-abh03t:1047_7: viya kālantarayogābhāvato yādisānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ uppādanirodhābhāvena pucchitabbassa
tika-abh03t:1047_8: nissayo sanniṭṭhānena sannicchito, tannissayā tādisānaṃyeva upapatticutiuppādanirodhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1047_9: jīvitādīnampi anuppādānirodhā saṃsayapadena pucchitā hontīti “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1047_10: nuppajjissati, tassa somanassindriyaṃ nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā”ti ca, “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1047_11: na nirujjhissati, tassa somanassindriyaṃ na nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1047_12: na vuttaṃ “ye arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissantī”tiādinā jīvitindriyaupekkhindriyādīsu viya vissajjananti.
tika-abh03t:1048_0: Ye rūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ ghānindriyaṃ na uppajjissati,
tika-abh03t:1048_1: no ca tesaṃ somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjissatī”ti ettha ye sopekkhapaṭisandhikā bhavissanti,
tika-abh03t:1048_2: te “ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissantī”ti etena pacchimakoṭṭhāsavacanena
tika-abh03t:1048_3: taṃsamānalakkhaṇatāya saṅgahitāti ye somanassapaṭisandhikā bhavissanti, te eva vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1049_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca nuppajjitthāti dhammayamake viya uppādakkhaṇātikkamavasena
tika-abh03t:1049_2: atthaṃ aggahetvā”ti likhitaṃ, taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ. Yesu pana potthakesu “paccuppannātītavāre
tika-abh03t:1049_3: suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca nuppajjitthāti…pe… tasmiṃ
tika-abh03t:1049_4: bhave anuppannapubbavasena attho gahetabbo”ti pāṭho dissati, so eva sundarataroti.
tika-abh03t:1052_1: lokiyaabyākatehi missakattā tāni upādāya manindriyādīnaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ viya
tika-abh03t:1052_2: pariññeyyatā ca vuttā. Yadi pariññeyyamissakattā pariññeyyatā hoti, kasmā dhammayamake
tika-abh03t:1052_3: “yo kusalaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveti, so abyākataṃ dhammaṃ parijānātī”tiādinā abyākatapadena
tika-abh03t:1052_4: yojetvā yamakāni na vuttānīti? Yathā “kusalaṃ bhāvemi, akusalaṃ pajahāmī”ti kusalākusalesu
