tika-abh03t:1052_5: bhāvanāpahānābhiniveso hoti, tathā “vedanākkhandho anicco, dhammāyatanaṃ anicca”ntiādinā
tika-abh03t:1052_6: khandhādīsu parijānābhiniveso hoti, tattha vedanākkhandhādayo “anicca”ntiādinā parijānitabbā,
tika-abh03t:1052_7: te ca vedanākkhandhādibhāvaṃ gahetvā parijānitabbā, na abyākatabhāvanti.
tika-abh03t:1053_0: Kasmā panettha dukkhasaccabhājanīye āgatassa domanassassa pahātabbatāva vuttā, na
tika-abh03t:1053_2: aggahitā kusalākusalāpi pariññeyyāti? Saccaṃ, yathā pana vedanākkhandhādibhāvo bhāvetabbapahātabbabhāvehi
tika-abh03t:1053_3: vināpi hoti, na evaṃ domanassindriyabhāvo pahātabbabhāvena vinā hotīti imaṃ visesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1053_4: dassetuṃ domanassindriyassa pahātabbatāva idha vuttā, na pariññeyyabhāvassa abhāvatoti
tika-abh03t:1053_5: daṭṭhabbo. Akusalaṃ ekantato pahātabbamevāti etena pahātabbameva, na appahātabbanti
tika-abh03t:1053_6: appahātabbameva nivāreti, na pariññeyyabhāvanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññindriyaṃ bhāvetabbaniṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1053_7: na pana sacchikātabbaniṭṭhanti bhāvetabbabhāvo eva tassa gahitoti. “Dve puggalā”tiādi
tika-abh03t:1053_8: “cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātī”tiādikassa parato likhitabbaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā likhitanti
tika-abh03t:1053_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cakkhundriyamūlakañhi atikkamitvā domanassindriyamūlake idaṃ vuttaṃ “dve
tika-abh03t:1053_10: puggalā domanassindriyaṃ na pajahanti no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāventī”ti.
tika-abh03t:1054_0: Ettha ca puthujjano, aṭṭha ca ariyāti nava puggalā. Tesu puthujjano bhabbābhabbavasena
tika-abh03t:1054_1: duvidho, so “puthujjano”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha
tika-abh03t:1054_2: domanassindriyañca na pajahitthā”tiādīsu ca abhinditvā gahito. “Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ
tika-abh03t:1054_3: paṭilabhissantī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti domanassindriyañca
tika-abh03t:1054_4: pajahissantī”tiādīsu ca bhabbo eva bhinditvā gahito. “Ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na
tika-abh03t:1054_6: cakkhundriyañca na parijānissantī”tiādīsu ca abhabbo eva. Aggaphalasamaṅgī ca paṭhamaphalasamaṅgī
tika-abh03t:1054_7: arahā cāti duvidho. Sopi “arahā”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca
tika-abh03t:1054_8: bhāvittha domanassindriyañca pajahitthā”tiādīsu ca abhinditvā gahito. “Yo aggaphalaṃ
tika-abh03t:1054_9: sacchikarotī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu “tayo puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1054_10: sacchikaritthā”tiādīsu ca paṭhamaphalasamaṅgī ca bhinditvā gahito. “Yo aggaphalaṃ
tika-abh03t:1054_11: sacchākāsī”ti āgataṭṭhānesu itarovāti evaṃ puggalabhedaṃ ñatvā tattha tattha sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh03t:1060_0: Dibbanti kāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti laḷanti, tesu vā viharanti, vijayasamatthatāyogena
tika-abh03t:1060_2: karontā voharanti, puññayogānubhāvappattāya jutiyā jotanti, yathābhilāsitañca visayaṃ
tika-abh03t:1060_3: appaṭighātena gacchanti, yathicchitanipphādane sakkontīti vā devā, devanīyā vā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi
tika-abh03t:1060_4: saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti gamanīyā, abhitthavanīyā vā. Sobhāvisesayogena kamanīyāti vā
tika-abh03t:1060_5: devā. Te tividhā – sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti. Bhagavā pana niratisayāya
tika-abh03t:1060_8: ca vohārātisayena, paramāya paññāsarīrappabhāsaṅkhātāya jutiyā, anopamāya ca ñāṇasarīragatiyā,
tika-abh03t:1060_10: sadevakena lokena saraṇanti gamanīyato, abhitthavanīyato, bhattivasena kamanīyato
tika-abh03t:1060_11: ca sabbe te deve tehi guṇehi atikkanto atisayo vā devoti devātidevo. Sabbadevehi
tika-abh03t:1060_12: pūjanīyataro devoti vā devātidevo, visuddhidevabhāvaṃ vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkāraṃ pattattā
tika-abh03t:1060_13: aññadevehi atirekataro vā devo devātidevo. Devānanti upapattidevānaṃ tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1060_14: Sakkādīhi devehi pahārādaasurindādīhi dānavehi ca pūjito. Kāyavacīsaṃyamassa sīlassa
tika-abh03t:1060_15: indriyasaṃvarassa cittasaṃyamassa samādhissa ca paṭipakkhānaṃ accantapaṭippassaddhiyā suddhasaṃyamo.
tika-abh03t:1061_0: Isisattamoti catusaccāvabodhagatiyā isayoti saṅkhyaṃ gatānaṃ sataṃ pasatthānaṃ isīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1061_1: atisayena santo pasatthoti attho. Vipassīādayo ca upādāya bhagavā “sattamo”ti vutto.
tika-abh03t:1061_2: Yato viññāṇaṃ paccudāvattati, taṃ nāmarūpaṃ samudayanirodhanena nirodhesīti nāmarūpanirodhano.
tika-abh03t:1061_3: Atigambhīranayamaṇḍitadesanaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāma desesi pakaraṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh03t:1064_0: “Ke pana te nayā, kiñca taṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti nayidaṃ pucchitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Nidānakathāyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1064_1: paṭṭhānasamānane anulomādīnaṃ nayānaṃ paṭṭhānassa ca dassitattāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento
tika-abh03t:1064_2: “sammāsambuddhena hi…pe… nāmāti hi vutta”nti tattha vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāḷiṃ āhari.
tika-abh03t:1065_0: Paṭṭhānanāmattho pana tikapaṭṭhānādīnaṃ tikapaṭṭhānādināmattho, imassa pakaraṇassa
tika-abh03t:1065_1: catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānasamodhānatā cettha vattabbā. Evañhi saṅkhepato paṭṭhāne
tika-abh03t:1065_2: ñāte vitthāro sukhaviññeyyo hotīti. Tattha ca nāmattho paṭhamaṃ vattabboti “tattha
tika-abh03t:1065_3: yesaṃ…pe… nāmattho tāva evaṃ veditabbo”ti vatvā sabbasādhāraṇassa paṭṭhānanāmasseva
tika-abh03t:1065_4: tāva atthaṃ dassento “kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha. Pa-kāro hīti upasaggapadaṃ
tika-abh03t:1065_5: dasseti. So “pavibhattesu dhammesu, yaṃ seṭṭhaṃ tadupāgamuntiādīsu viya nānappakāratthaṃ
tika-abh03t:1065_6: dīpeti. Nanu pakārehi vibhattā pavibhattāti pa-iti upasaggo pakāratthameva dīpeti,
tika-abh03t:1065_7: na nānappakāratthanti? Na, tesaṃ pakārānaṃ nānāvidhabhāvato. Atthato hi āpannaṃ nānāvidhabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:1065_8: dassetuṃ nānā-saddo vuttoti. Tattha ekassapi dhammassa hetuādīhi anekapaccayabhāvato
tika-abh03t:1065_9: ca ekekassa paccayassa anekadhammabhāvato ca nānappakārapaccayatā veditabbā.
tika-abh03t:1066_0: Hetupaccayādivasena vibhattattāti etena dhammasaṅgahādīsu vuttato kusalādivibhāgato
tika-abh03t:1066_1: sātisayavibhāgataṃ paṭṭhānanāmalābhassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Goṭṭhāti vajā. Paṭṭhitagāvoti
tika-abh03t:1066_2: gatagāvo. Āgataṭṭhānasminti mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ vadati. Pavattagamanattā etthāti vacanaseso.
tika-abh03t:1066_3: Atha vā gacchati etthāti gamanaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇassa nissaṅgavasena pavattassa gamanattā
tika-abh03t:1066_4: gamanadesabhāvato ekekaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti attho. Tattha aññehi gatimantehi atisayayuttassa
tika-abh03t:1066_6: purisassa papātaṭṭhānaṃ viya dhammasaṅgaṇīādīnaṃ sāsaṅgagamanaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ imassa
tika-abh03t:1066_7: ca mahāpatho viya nirāsaṅgagamanaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ dassento atisayayuttagamanaṭṭhānabhāvo
tika-abh03t:1067_0: Tikānanti tikavasena vuttadhammānaṃ. Samantāti anulomādīhi sabbākārehipi gatāni catuvīsati
tika-abh03t:1067_2: vattabbe samantasaddassa parayogaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā samantā cha
tika-abh03t:1067_3: cha hutvāti etena anulomādisabbakoṭṭhāsato tikādichachabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tena samantasaddo
tika-abh03t:1067_4: tikādichachapaṭṭhānavisesanaṃ hoti, na catuvīsativisesanaṃ, tasmā samantato paṭṭhānāni
tika-abh03t:1067_5: tāni catuvīsatīti katvā “catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānānī”ti vuttaṃ. Samantato vā dhammānulomāditikādipaṭiccavārādipaccayānulomādihetumūlakādippakārehi
tika-abh03t:1067_6: pavattāni paṭṭhānāni samantapaṭṭhānāni, anūnehi nayehi pavattānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tāni
tika-abh03t:1067_7: pana catuvīsati honti. Tenevāha “imesaṃ catuvīsatiyā khuddakapaṭṭhānasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1068_0: Hetu ca so paccayo cāti iminā vacanena hetuno adhipatipaccayādibhūtassa ca gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1068_1: siyāti taṃ nivārento āha “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti. Etenapi so eva doso āpajjatīti punāha
tika-abh03t:1068_2: “hetubhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Tena idha hetu-saddena dhammaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ,
tika-abh03t:1068_3: atha kho dhammasattiviseso gahitoti dasseti. Tassa hi paccayasaddassa ca samānādhikaraṇataṃ
tika-abh03t:1068_4: sandhāya “hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti, “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti ca vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā
tika-abh03t:1068_5: parato pāḷiyaṃ “hetū hetusampayutta…pe… hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā tena tena hetubhāvādiupakārena
tika-abh03t:1068_6: tassa tassa dhammassa upakārattaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yo hi dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-abh03t:1068_7: appaccakkhāya tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati vā, so tassa paccayo”ti “mūlaṭṭhena upakārako
tika-abh03t:1068_8: dhammo hetupaccayo”ticcevamādinā dhammappadhānaniddesena dhammato aññā dhammasatti
tika-abh03t:1068_9: nāma natthīti dhammeheva dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idhāpi vā hetu
tika-abh03t:1068_10: ca so paccayo cāti dhammeneva dhammasattiṃ dasseti. Na hi hetupaccayotiādiko uddeso
tika-abh03t:1068_11: kusalādiuddeso viya dhammappadhāno, atha kho dhammānaṃ upakārappadhānoti. Etīti etassa
tika-abh03t:1068_12: attho vattatīti, tañca uppattiṭṭhitīnaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. Tenevāha – “tiṭṭhati vā
tika-abh03t:1068_13: uppajjati vā”ti. Koci hi paccayo ṭhitiyā eva hoti yathā pacchājātapaccayo, koci uppattiyāyeva
tika-abh03t:1068_14: yathā anantarādayo, koci ubhayassa yathā hetuādayoti.
tika-abh03t:1069_0: Upakārakalakkhaṇoti ca dhammena dhammasattiupakāraṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hinoti
tika-abh03t:1069_1: patiṭṭhāti etthāti hetu. Anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ hi-saddo mūla-saddo viya patiṭṭhatthoti
tika-abh03t:1069_2: daṭṭhabboti. Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena
tika-abh03t:1069_3: viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati pavattati vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ āpajjatīti hetu.
tika-abh03t:1070_0: “Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā
tika-abh03t:1070_1: ca kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”tiādīhi kusalabhāvassa yonisomanasikārapaṭibaddhatā
tika-abh03t:1070_2: siddhā hotīti āha “yonisomanasikārapaṭibaddho kusalabhāvo”ti. Eteneva akusalābyākatabhāvā
tika-abh03t:1070_3: kusalabhāvo viya na hetupaṭibaddhāti dassitaṃ hoti. Yaṃ paneke maññeyyuṃ “ahetukahetussa
tika-abh03t:1070_4: akusalabhāvo viya sahetukahetūnaṃ sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo aññesaṃ taṃsampayuttānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1070_5: hetupaṭibaddho”ti, tassa uttaraṃ vattuṃ “yadi cā”tiādimāha. Alobho kusalo vā siyā
tika-abh03t:1070_6: abyākato vā, yadi alobho sabhāvato kusalo, kusalattā abyākato na siyā. Atha abyākato,
tika-abh03t:1070_7: taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo viya. Yasmā pana ubhayathāpi
tika-abh03t:1070_8: so hoti, tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu phassādīsu sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddhakusalādibhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:1070_9: pariyesatha, na sabhāvato, evaṃ hetūsupi kusalāditā aññapaṭibaddhā pariyesitabbā,
tika-abh03t:1070_10: na sabhāvatoti. Yaṃ vuttaṃ “sampayuttahetūsu sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo”ti, taṃ na
tika-abh03t:1070_11: yujjati, sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā hotīti hetūsu viya sampayuttesupi
tika-abh03t:1070_12: yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, na hetupaṭibaddhoti siddhaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1071_0: Ārabhitvāpīti ettha pi-saddena imamatthaṃ dasseti – rūpāyatanādimatte yasmiṃ kismiñci
tika-abh03t:1071_1: ekasmiṃ aṭṭhatvā “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti aniyamena sabbarūpāyatana…pe… dhammāyatanānañca
tika-abh03t:1071_2: ārammaṇapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā na koci dhammo na hotīti.
tika-abh03t:1072_0: “Chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne
tika-abh03t:1072_1: citte chandādayo dhurabhūtā jeṭṭhakabhūtā sayaṃ sampayuttadhamme sādhayamānā hutvā
tika-abh03t:1072_2: pavattanti, taṃsampayuttadhammā ca tesaṃ vase vattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato,
tika-abh03t:1072_3: tena te adhipatipaccayā honti. Garukātabbampi ārammaṇaṃ tanninnapoṇapabbhārānaṃ paccavekkhaṇaassādamaggaphalānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1072_4: attano vase vattayamānaṃ viya paccayo hoti, tasmāyaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakatā
tika-abh03t:1073_0: Manoviññāṇadhātūtiādi cittaniyamoti ettha ādi-saddena santīraṇānantaraṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1073_1: cutianantarā paṭisandhīti yassa yassa cittassa anantarā yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh03t:1073_3: vasena ijjhatīti dasseti. Bhāvanābalena pana vāritattāti ettha yathā rukkhassa vekhe
tika-abh03t:1073_4: dinne pupphituṃ samatthasseva pupphanaṃ na hoti, agadavekhe pana apanīte tāyayeva
tika-abh03t:1073_5: samatthatāya pupphanaṃ hoti, evamidhāpi bhāvanābalena vāritattā samuṭṭhāpanasamatthasseva
tika-abh03t:1073_6: asamuṭṭhāpanaṃ, tasmiñca apagate tāyayeva samatthatāya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1074_0: Byañjanamattatovettha nānākaraṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ, na atthatoti upacayasantatiadhivacananiruttipadānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1074_1: viya saddatthamattato nānākaraṇaṃ, na vacanīyatthatoti adhippāyo. Teneva saddatthavisesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1074_4: sahāvaṭṭhānābhāvato ca “idamito heṭṭhā uddhaṃ tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attanā ekattamiva
tika-abh03t:1075_0: Uppādanasamatthatāti ca abyāpārattā dhammānaṃ yasmiṃ yadākāre niruddhe vattamāne
tika-abh03t:1075_1: vā sati taṃtaṃvisesavantā dhammā honti, tassa sova ākāro vuccatīti daṭṭhabbo. Dhammānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1075_2: pavattimeva ca upādāya kālavohāroti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaphalasamāpattīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1075_4: kālantaratā natthīti daṭṭhabbā. Na hi tesaṃ antarā arūpadhammānaṃ pavatti atthi,
tika-abh03t:1075_5: yaṃ upādāya kālantaratā vucceyya, na ca rūpadhammappavatti arūpadhammappavattiyā
tika-abh03t:1075_6: antaraṃ karoti aññasantānattā. Rūpārūpadhammasantatiyo hi dve aññamaññaṃ visadisasabhāvattā
tika-abh03t:1075_7: aññamaññopakārabhāvena vattamānāpi visuṃyeva honti. Ekasantatiyañca purimapacchimānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1075_8: majjhe vattamānaṃ taṃsantatipariyāpannatāya antarakārakaṃ hoti. Tādisañca kañci nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaphalasamāpattīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1075_9: majjhe natthi, na ca abhāvo antarakārako hoti abhāvattāyeva, tasmā javanānantarassa
tika-abh03t:1075_10: javanassa viya, bhavaṅgānantarassa bhavaṅgassa viya ca nirantaratā suṭṭhu ca anantaratā
tika-abh03t:1075_11: hotīti tathā uppādanasamatthatā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacutīnampi daṭṭhabbā. Uppattiyā
tika-abh03t:1075_12: paccayabhāvo cettha anantarapaccayādīnaṃ pākaṭoti uppādanasamatthatāva vuttā. Paccuppannānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1075_13: pana dhammānaṃ pubbantāparantaparicchedena gahitānaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ alabhantānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1075_14: “atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā anantarādipaccayabhāvo
tika-abh03t:1075_15: vuttoti na so uppattiyaṃyevāti viññāyati. Na hi kusalādiggahaṇaṃ viya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1075_16: aparicchedaṃ, yato uppattimattasamaṅginoyeva ca gahaṇaṃ siyā, teneva ca atītattike
tika-abh03t:1076_0: Uppajjamānova sahuppādabhāvenāti etthāpi uppattiyā paccayabhāvena pākaṭena ṭhitiyāpi
tika-abh03t:1076_1: paccayabhāvaṃ nidassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, paccayuppannānaṃ pana sahajātabhāvena upakārakatā
tika-abh03t:1077_0: Attano upakārakassa upakārakatā aññamaññapaccayatā, upakārakatā ca aññamaññatāvaseneva
tika-abh03t:1077_1: daṭṭhabbā, na sahajātādivasena. Sahajātādipaccayo hontoyeva hi koci aññamaññapaccayo
tika-abh03t:1077_2: na hoti, na ca purejātapacchājātabhāvehi upakārakassa upakārakā vatthukhandhā aññamaññapaccayā hontīti.
tika-abh03t:1078_0: Taruādīnaṃ pathavī viya adhiṭṭhānākārena pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ, cakkhādayo ca
tika-abh03t:1078_1: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ upakārakā cittakammassa paṭādayo viya nissayākārena khandhādayo
tika-abh03t:1079: Tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissitoti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ nissayoti vadati. Tattha yo bhuso, taṃ upanissayoti niddhāreti.
tika-abh03t:1080_0: Pakatoti ettha pa-kāro upasaggo, so attano phalassa uppādane samatthabhāvena suṭṭhukatataṃ
tika-abh03t:1080_1: dīpeti. Tathā ca kataṃ attano santāne kataṃ hotīti āha “attano santāne”ti. Karaṇañca
tika-abh03t:1080_2: duvidhaṃ nipphādanaṃ upasevanañcāti dassetuṃ “nipphādito vā”tiādimāha. Tattha upasevito
tika-abh03t:1080_3: vāti etena kāyaallīyāpanavasena upabhogūpasevanaṃ vijānanādivasena ārammaṇūpasevanañca
tika-abh03t:1080_4: dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena anāgatānampi cakkhusampadādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpasevanena yathāpaṭisevitānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1081_0: Yathā pacchājātena vinā santānāvicchedahetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ dhammānaṃ ye pacchājātākārena
tika-abh03t:1081_1: upakārakā, tesaṃ sā vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā upakārakatā pacchājātapaccayatā,
tika-abh03t:1081_2: tathā nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārakabhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1081_3: vatthārammaṇānaṃ purejātākārena upakārakatā purejātapaccayatā, evaṃ sabbattha paccayānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1082_0: Gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsācetanā viyāti etena manosañcetanāhāravasena pavattamānehi
tika-abh03t:1082_1: arūpadhammehi rūpakāyassa upatthambhitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Teneva “āhārāsā viyā”ti avatvā
tika-abh03t:1083_0: Kusalādibhāvena attanā sadisassa payogena karaṇīyassa punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ pavattanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1083_1: āsevanaṭṭho, attasadisasabhāvatāpādanaṃ vāsanaṃ vā. Ganthādīsu purimāpurimābhiyogo
tika-abh03t:1083_2: viyāti purimā purimā āsevanā viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1084_0: Cittappayogo cittakiriyā, āyūhananti attho. Yathā hi kāyavacīpayogo viññatti, evaṃ
tika-abh03t:1084_1: cittappayogo cetanā. Sā tāya uppannakiriyatāvisiṭṭhe santāne sesapaccayasamāgame
tika-abh03t:1084_2: pavattamānānaṃ vipākakaṭattārūpānampi teneva kiriyabhāvena upakārikā hoti. Tassa
tika-abh03t:1084_3: hi kiriyabhāvassa pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti, na aññathāti. Sahajātānaṃ pana tena upakārikāti kiṃ vattabbanti.
tika-abh03t:1085_0: Nirussāhasantabhāvenāti etena saussāhehi vipākadhammadhammehi kusalākusalehi sārammaṇādibhāvena
tika-abh03t:1085_1: sadisavipākabhāvaṃ dasseti. So hi vipākānaṃ payogena asādhetabbatāya payogena aññathā
tika-abh03t:1085_2: vā sesapaccayesu siddhesu kammassa kaṭattāyeva siddhito nirussāho santabhāvo hoti,
tika-abh03t:1085_3: na kilesavūpasamasantabhāvo, tathāsantasabhāvatoyeva bhavaṅgādayo duviññeyyā. Pañcadvārepi
tika-abh03t:1085_4: hi javanappavattiyā rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā viññāyati, abhinipātasampaṭicchanasantīraṇamattā
tika-abh03t:1085_5: pana vipākā duviññeyyāyeva. Nirussāhasantabhāvāyāti nirussāhasantabhāvatthāya. Etena
tika-abh03t:1086_0: Satipi janakatte upatthambhakattaṃ āhārānaṃ padhānakiccanti āha “rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattenā”ti.
tika-abh03t:1086_1: Upatthambhakattañhi satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhāpakarūpāhārassa
tika-abh03t:1086_2: ca hoti, asatipi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpūpatthambhakarūpāhārassa, asati pana upatthambhakatte
tika-abh03t:1086_3: āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ. Janayamānopi hi āhāro avicchedavasena
tika-abh03t:1087_0: Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha na adhipatipaccayadhammānaṃ viya pavattinivārake abhibhavitvā
tika-abh03t:1087_1: pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho, atha kho dassanādikiccesu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi
tika-abh03t:1087_3: anaññātaññassāmīti pavattiyaṃ ājānane aññātāvībhāve ca saddhādisahajātehīti evaṃ
tika-abh03t:1087_4: taṃtaṃkiccesu cakkhādipaccayehi cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanīyatā. Tesu tesu hi kiccesu
tika-abh03t:1087_5: cakkhādīnaṃ issariyaṃ tappaccayānañca tadanuvattanena tattha pavattīti. Itthipurisindriyānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1087_6: pana yadipi liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā atthi, sā pana na paccayabhāvato. Yathā hi jīvitāhārā
tika-abh03t:1087_7: yesaṃ paccayā honti, te tesaṃ anupālakaupatthambhakā atthi, avigatapaccayabhūtā ca
tika-abh03t:1087_8: honti, na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci pakārena upakārakā honti, kevalaṃ
tika-abh03t:1087_9: pana yathāsakeheva paccayehi pavattamānānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā itthādiggahaṇassa paccayabhāvo
tika-abh03t:1087_10: hoti, tato aññenākārena taṃsahitasantāne appavattito liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā indriyatā
tika-abh03t:1087_11: ca tesaṃ vuccati, tasmā na tesaṃ indriyapaccayabhāvo vutto. Cakkhādayo arūpadhammānaṃyevāti
tika-abh03t:1088_1: nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ, cintanaṃ vā vitakkādīnaṃyeva sādhāraṇo byāpāro upanijjhāyanaṭṭho.
tika-abh03t:1088_4: nivattanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti eteneva siddhe “ṭhapetvā
tika-abh03t:1088_5: sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti kasmā vuttaṃ? Vedanābhedesu pañcasu sukhadukkhadvayassa
tika-abh03t:1088_6: ekantena ajhānaṅgattadassanatthaṃ jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā. Satipi vā jhānaṅgavohāre
tika-abh03t:1088_8: pana yadipi jhānapaccayattābhāvo atthi, jhānapaccayabhāvo pana na natthīti “sabbānipi
tika-abh03t:1088_9: satta jhānaṅgānī”ti ettha gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Tattha “sabbānipī”ti vacanaṃ sabbakusalādibhedasaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1089_0: Yato tato vāti sammā vā micchā vāti attho. Ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā ahetukacittesu
tika-abh03t:1089_1: na labbhantīti idaṃ ahetukacittesu na labbhanti, na sahetukacittesūti sahetukacittesu
tika-abh03t:1089_2: alābhābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na ahetukacittesu lābhābhāvadassanatthanti. Evaṃ
tika-abh03t:1089_3: atthe gayhamāne ahetukacittesu katthaci kassaci lābho na vāritoti ettakameva viññāyeyya,
tika-abh03t:1089_4: na savitakkāhetukacittesu jhānapaccayasseva alābhābhāvadassanatthaṃ katanti. Ahetukacittesu
tika-abh03t:1089_5: vā lābhābhāvadassanatthe pana imasmiṃ vacane savitakkāhetukacittesu jhānapaccayassa
tika-abh03t:1089_6: lābhābhāvo āpajjati, tasmā yena alābhena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ manodhātuādīnaṃ saṅgahasuññatavāresu
tika-abh03t:1089_7: jhānaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ, taṃ alābhaṃ sandhāya esa jhānapaccayassapi ahetukacittesu alābho
tika-abh03t:1089_8: vuttoti veditabbo. Yathā hi sahetukesu vitakkādīnaṃ sahajāte saṃkaḍḍhitvā ekattagatabhāvakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1089_9: upanijjhāyanabyāpāro balavā, na tathā ahetukacittesu hoti. Imasmiṃ pana pakaraṇe
tika-abh03t:1089_10: dubbalampi upanijjhāyanaṃ yadipi kiñcimattampi atthi, tena upakārakatā hotīti savitakkāhetukacittesupi
tika-abh03t:1089_11: jhānapaccayo vuttova, tasmā ye evaṃ paṭhanti “na ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā
tika-abh03t:1089_12: yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇaahetukacittesu labbhantī”ti, tesaṃ so pāṭho sundarataro,
tika-abh03t:1090: Samaṃ pakārehi yuttatāya ekībhāvopagamena viya upakārakatā sampayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t:1091_0: Yuttānampi sataṃ vippayuttabhāvena nānattūpagamena upakārakatā vippayuttapaccayatā.
tika-abh03t:1091_1: Na hi vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena ayuttānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇādibhāvena upakārakānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1091_2: vippayuttānaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā atthīti. Rūpānaṃ pana rūpehi satipi avinibbhoge
tika-abh03t:1091_3: vippayogoyeva natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā. Vuttañhi “catūhi sampayogo catūhi vippayogo”ti.
tika-abh03t:1092_0: Paccuppannalakkhaṇenāti paccuppannasabhāvena. Tena “atthi me pāpakammaṃ kata”nti,
tika-abh03t:1092_1: “atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti ca evamādīsu vuttaṃ nibbattaupalabbhamānatālakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1092_2: atthibhāvaṃ nivāreti. Satipi janakatte upatthambhakappadhānā atthibhāvena upakārakatāti
tika-abh03t:1093_0: Ārammaṇe phusanādivasena vattamānānaṃ phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti ekasmiṃ
tika-abh03t:1093_1: phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo na hoti, asati pana hoti, tena natthibhāvena upakārakatā
tika-abh03t:1093_2: natthipaccayatā. Satipi purimataracittānaṃ natthibhāve na tāni natthibhāvena upakārakāni,
tika-abh03t:1093_3: anantarameva pana attano atthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ alabhamānānaṃ natthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ
tika-abh03t:1093_4: dadamānaṃ viya upakārakaṃ hotīti “pavattiokāsadānena upakārakatā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:1094_0: Ettha ca abhāvamattena upakārakatā okāsadānaṃ natthipaccayatā, sabhāvāvigamena appavattamānānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1094_1: sabhāvavigamena upakārakatā vigatapaccayatā, natthitā ca nirodhānantarasuññatā, vigatatā
tika-abh03t:1094_2: nirodhappattatā, ayametesaṃ viseso, tathā atthitāya sasabhāvato upakārakatā atthipaccayatā,
tika-abh03t:1094_3: sabhāvāvigamena nirodhassa appattiyā upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayabhāvaviseso
tika-abh03t:1094_4: dhammāvisesepi veditabbo. Dhammānañhi sattivisesaṃ sabbaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā
tika-abh03t:1094_5: tathāgatena catuvīsatipaccayavisesā vuttāti bhagavati saddhāya “evaṃvisesā ete dhammā”ti
tika-abh03t:1094_6: sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayehi tadabhisamayāya yogo kātabbo.
tika-abh03t:1095_0: Catūsu khandhesu ekassapi asaṅgahitattābhāvato nāmadhammekadesatā anantarādīnaṃ natthīti
tika-abh03t:1095_1: “nāmadhammāvā”ti vatvā na kevalaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāve bhajantānaṃ catunnaṃyeva
tika-abh03t:1095_2: khandhānaṃ nāmatā, atha kho nibbānañca nāmamevāti dassento “nibbānassa asaṅgahitattā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:1095_3: Purejātapaccayo rūpekadesoti ettha ekadesavacanena rūparūpato aññaṃ vajjeti, rūparūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:1095_4: pana kusalattike anāgatampi purejātapaccayabhāvena aññattha āgatameva. Vuttañhi “anidassanaappaṭigho
tika-abh03t:1095_5: dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo – ārammaṇapurejātaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1095_6: vatthupurejātaṃ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ vatthuṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ āpodhātuṃ kabaḷīkāraṃ
tika-abh03t:1099_0: 1. Yo hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭho, so evaṃ veditabboti etena hetusaṅkhātassa paccayadhammassa
tika-abh03t:1099_2: hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭhoti. Yo pana hetubhāvena yathāvutto paccayadhammo yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1099_3: paccayuppannānaṃ paccayo hoti, so hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭhoti veditabboti dasseti. Ubhayathāpi
tika-abh03t:1099_4: hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭhoti dassitaṃ hoti. Esa nayo sesapaccayesupi.
tika-abh03t:1099_5: Upakārakatā pana dhammasabhāvo eva, na dhammato aññā atthīti. Tathā tathā upakārakaṃ
tika-abh03t:1099_6: taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ dassento hi bhagavā taṃ taṃ upakārakataṃ dassetīti.
tika-abh03t:1100_0: Hetū hetusampayuttakānanti ettha paṭhamo hetu-saddo paccattaniddiṭṭho paccayaniddeso.
tika-abh03t:1100_1: Tena etassa hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayatāti dasseti. Dutiyo paccayuppannavisesanaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1100_2: Tena na yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayabhāvena paccayo hoti, atha kho hetunā
tika-abh03t:1100_3: sampayuttānamevāti dasseti. Nanu ca sampayuttasaddassa sāpekkhattā dutiye hetusadde
tika-abh03t:1100_4: avijjamānepi aññassa apekkhitabbassa aniddiṭṭhattā attanāva sampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena
tika-abh03t:1100_5: paccayoti ayamattho viññāyatīti? Nāyaṃ ekanto. Hetusaddo hi paccattaniddiṭṭho “hetupaccayena
tika-abh03t:1100_6: paccayo”ti ettheva byāvaṭo yadā gayhati, tadā sampayuttavisesanaṃ na hotīti sampayuttā
tika-abh03t:1100_7: avisiṭṭhā ye keci gahitā bhaveyyunti evaṃ sampayuttasaddena attani eva byāvaṭena
tika-abh03t:1100_8: hetusaddena visesanena vinā yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti taṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:1100_9: “athāpi…pe… attho bhaveyyā”ti āha. Nanu yathā “arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammāna”nti,
tika-abh03t:1100_10: “arūpino indriyā sampayuttakāna”nti ca vutte dutiyena āhāraggahaṇena indriyaggahaṇena
tika-abh03t:1100_11: ca vināpi āhārindriyasampayuttakāva gayhanti, evamidhāpi siyāti? Na, āhārindriyāsampayuttassa
tika-abh03t:1100_12: abhāvato. Vajjetabbābhāvato hi tattha dutiyaāhārindriyaggahaṇe asatipi taṃsampayuttakāva
tika-abh03t:1100_13: gayhantīti taṃ na kataṃ, idha pana vajjetabbaṃ atthīti vattabbaṃ dutiyaṃ hetuggahaṇanti.
tika-abh03t:1101_0: Evampi hetū hetusampayuttakānanti ettha hetusampayuttakānaṃ so eva sampayuttakahetūti
tika-abh03t:1101_1: visesanassa akatattā yo koci hetu yassa kassaci hetusampayuttakassa hetupaccayena
tika-abh03t:1101_2: paccayoti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, paccattaniddiṭṭhasseva hetussa puna sampayuttavisesanabhāvena
tika-abh03t:1101_3: vuttattā, etadatthameva ca vināpi dutiyena hetusaddena hetusampayuttabhāve siddhepi
tika-abh03t:1101_4: tassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Atha vā asati dutiye hetusadde hetusampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena
tika-abh03t:1101_5: paccayo, na pana hetūnanti evampi gahaṇaṃ siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ so vutto, tena
tika-abh03t:1101_6: hetusampayuttabhāvaṃ ye labhanti, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ hetūnaṃ aññesampi hetupaccayena
tika-abh03t:1101_7: paccayoti dassitaṃ hoti. Yasmā pana hetujhānamaggā patiṭṭhāmattādibhāvena nirapekkhā,
tika-abh03t:1101_8: na āhārindriyā viya sāpekkhā eva, tasmā etesveva dutiyaṃ hetādiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Āhārindriyā
tika-abh03t:1101_9: pana āharitabbaisitabbāpekkhā eva, tasmā te vināpi dutiyena āhārindriyaggahaṇena
tika-abh03t:1101_10: attanā eva āharitabbe ca isitabbe ca āhārindriyabhūte aññe ca sampayuttake paricchindantīti
tika-abh03t:1101_11: taṃ tattha na kataṃ, idha ca dutiyena hetuggahaṇena paccayuppannānaṃ hetunā paccayabhūteneva
tika-abh03t:1101_12: sampayuttānaṃ hetūnaṃ aññesañca paricchinnattā puna visesanakiccaṃ natthīti pañhāvāre
tika-abh03t:1101_13: “kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”ntiādīsu dutiyaṃ hetuggahaṇaṃ na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1102_0: Niddisitabbassa apākaṭattāti taṃ-saddo purimavacanāpekkho vuttasseva niddeso “rūpāyatanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1102_2: eva pavattati. Ettha ca paccattaniddiṭṭho hetusaddo “hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ettha
tika-abh03t:1102_3: byāvaṭo sampayuttasaddena viya taṃ-saddenapi anapekkhanīyo añño ca koci niddisitabbappakāsako
tika-abh03t:1102_4: vutto natthi, tasmā “taṃsampayuttakāna”nti ca na vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1103_1: pubbe vuttena taṃ-saddena niddisitabbaṃ pākaṭīkataṃ, tena “taṃsamuṭṭhānāna”nti ettha
tika-abh03t:1103_2: taṃgahaṇaṃ katanti. Kiṃ pana tasmiṃ hetusampayuttakasadde taṃ-saddena niddisitabbaṃ
tika-abh03t:1103_3: pākaṭībhūtanti? Yehi hetūhi sampayuttā “hetusampayuttakā”ti vuttā, te hetū ceva sampayuttakavisesanabhūtā
tika-abh03t:1103_4: tabbisesitā ca hetusampayuttakā. Tenāha “te hetū cevā”tiādi. Aññathā “te hetū cevā”ti
tika-abh03t:1103_5: etassa paccattaniddiṭṭhena hetusaddena sambandhe sati yathā idha teneva taṃ-saddena
tika-abh03t:1103_6: niddisitabbā pākaṭā, evaṃ pubbepi bhavituṃ arahantīti “niddisitabbassa apākaṭattā
tika-abh03t:1103_7: ‘taṃsampayuttakāna’nti na vutta”nti idaṃ na yujjeyyāti. Duvidhampi vā hetuggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1103_8: apanetvā taṃsaddavacanīyataṃ codeti pariharati ca. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti ca hetusamuṭṭhānānanti
tika-abh03t:1104_1: vacanena paṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpassa aggahaṇato taṃ na vuttaṃ, sahajātapaccayavibhaṅge
tika-abh03t:1104_2: cittacetasikānaṃ tassa kaṭattārūpassa paccayabhāvo na vutto bhaveyya. Yadi ca tattha
tika-abh03t:1104_6: hi taṃsamuṭṭhānavacanena tattha tattha vuttaṃ samuṭṭhānavacanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Nanu
tika-abh03t:1104_8: vuttāti? Na vuttā. Cittacetasikānaṃ paccayabhāvo eva hi tattha vuttoti.
tika-abh03t:1105_1: ceteti, yañca pakappeti, yañca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti, viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā ārammaṇe
tika-abh03t:1105_2: sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti, tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe viruḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti
tika-abh03t:1105_3: hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti imasmimpi sutte paṭisandhināmarūpassa viññāṇapaccayatā
tika-abh03t:1106_0: Purimatarasiddhāya pathaviyā bījapatiṭṭhānaṃ viya purimatarasiddhe kamme tannibbattasseva
tika-abh03t:1106_1: viññāṇabījassa patiṭṭhānaṃ kammassa kaṭattā uppattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “kammaṃ
tika-abh03t:1106_2: khettaṃ, viññāṇaṃ bīja”nti. Kassa pana taṃ khettaṃ bījañcāti? Nāmarūpaṅkurassa.
tika-abh03t:1107_0: Ayañca panatthoti paṭisandhiyaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ cittapaṭibaddhavuttitā. Okāsavasenevāti
tika-abh03t:1107_1: nāmarūpokāsavaseneva. So hi tassa atthassa okāsoti. Vatthurūpamattampīti vadanto
tika-abh03t:1107_3: paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti, sahabhavanamattaṃ vā. Tattha kāyabhāvādikalāpānaṃ katthaci
tika-abh03t:1107_4: abhāvato katthaci abhāvābhāvato “vatthurūpamattampi vinā”ti āha. Sassāmiketi etasseva
tika-abh03t:1108_0: Pavattiyaṃ kaṭattārūpādīnaṃ paccayabhāvapaṭibāhanatoti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1108_1: paccayabhāvappasaṅgoyeva natthi “hetū sahajātāna”nti vacanato. Na hi yesaṃ hetū sahajātapaccayo
tika-abh03t:1108_2: na honti, tāni hetusahajātāni nāma honti. Yadi siyuṃ, “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto abyākato
tika-abh03t:1108_3: dhammo uppajjati na hetupaccayā”tiādi ca labbheyya, na pana labbhati, tasmā na tāni
tika-abh03t:1108_4: hetusahajātānīti? Saccametaṃ, yo pana hetūhi samānakāluppattimattaṃ gahetvā hetusahajātabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:1108_5: maññeyya, tassāyaṃ pasaṅgo atthīti idaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhagavā pana vacanānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1108_6: lahugarubhāvaṃ na gaṇeti, bodhaneyyānaṃ pana ajjhāsayānurūpato dhammasabhāvaṃ avilomento
tika-abh03t:1108_7: tathā tathā desanaṃ niyāmetīti na katthaci akkharānaṃ bahutā vā appatā vā codetabbāti.
tika-abh03t:1111_0: 2. Uppajjanakkhaṇeyevāti etena vattamānakkhaṇekadesena sabbaṃ vattamānakkhaṇaṃ gayhatīti
tika-abh03t:1111_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi uppajjanakkhaṇeyeva cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ rūpādīni ārammaṇapaccayo,
tika-abh03t:1111_2: atha kho sabbasmiṃ vattamānakkhaṇeti. Tena ālambiyamānānampi rūpādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādivattamānatāya
tika-abh03t:1111_3: pure pacchā ca vijjamānānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayattābhāvaṃ dasseti, ko pana vādo anālambiyamānānaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1111_4: Na ekato hontīti nīlādīni sabbarūpāni saha na honti, tathā saddādayopīti attho. “Yaṃ
tika-abh03t:1111_5: ya”nti hi vacanaṃ rūpādīni bhindatīti. Tattha purimenatthena “uppajjantī”ti vacanena
tika-abh03t:1111_7: pacchimena “yaṃ ya”nti vacanena rūpādibhedadīpanatthanti. “Yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā”ti
tika-abh03t:1111_8: etassa vaṇṇanāyaṃ dassitasabbārammaṇādivasena vā idhāpi attho gahetabboti.
tika-abh03t:1112_0: Evaṃ vuttanti yathā nadīpabbatānaṃ sandanaṃ ṭhānañca pavattaṃ avirataṃ avicchinnanti
tika-abh03t:1112_1: sandanti tiṭṭhantīti vattamānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ “ye ye dhammā”ti atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1112_2: sabbasaṅgahasamudāyavasena gahitattā tesaṃ uppajjanaṃ pavattanaṃ aviratanti uppajjantīti
tika-abh03t:1112_3: vattamānavacanaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo. Ime pana na hetādipaccayā sabbepi atītānāgatānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1112_4: honti. Na hi atīto ca anāgato ca atthi, yassete paccayā siyuṃ. Evañca katvā atītattike
tika-abh03t:1112_5: atītānāgatānaṃ na koci paccayo vutto, tasmā idhāpi “uppajjantī”ti vacanena yesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1112_6: rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā ārammaṇapaccayā honti, te paccuppannāva dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1112_7: Tesu hi dassitesu atītānāgatesu taṃtaṃpaccayā ahesuṃ bhavissanti cāti ayamattho dassito
tika-abh03t:1112_8: hoti, na pana taṃtaṃpaccayavantatā. Paccayavanto hi paccuppannāyevāti.
tika-abh03t:1113_0: Ettha ca “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti ekavacananiddesaṃ katvā puna “te te dhammā”ti
tika-abh03t:1113_1: bahuvacananiddeso “yaṃ ya”nti vuttassa ārammaṇadhammassa anekabhāvopi atthīti dassanattho.
tika-abh03t:1113_2: Cattāro hi khandhā saheva ārammaṇapaccayā honti, te sabbepi ārabbha uppajjamānampi
tika-abh03t:1113_3: tesu ekekaṃ ārabbha uppajjamānaṃ na na hoti, tasmā vedanādīsu phassādīsu ca ekekassapi
tika-abh03t:1113_5: ārammaṇapaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ “te te”ti. Tattha yo ca rūpādiko ekekova yaṃyaṃ-saddena
tika-abh03t:1113_6: vutto, ye ca aneke phassādayo ekekavasena yaṃyaṃ-saddena vuttā, te sabbe gahetvā
tika-abh03t:1113_7: “te te”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā yasmiṃ kāle ārabbha uppajjanti, tasmiṃ kāle
tika-abh03t:1113_8: nīlādīsu cittuppādesu ca ekekameva ārabbha uppajjantīti dassanatthaṃ “yaṃ ya”nti
tika-abh03t:1113_9: vuttaṃ, te pana ālambiyamānā rūpārammaṇadhammā ca aneke, tathā saddādiārammaṇadhammā
tika-abh03t:1114_1: cāti imesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hotīti idaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena
tika-abh03t:1114_3: iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sati yathā “appamāṇā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
tika-abh03t:1114_4: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ “nibbāna”nti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca taṃ
tika-abh03t:1114_5: vuttaṃ. Na hi nibbānaṃ pubbe nivuṭṭhaṃ asaṅkhatattā, na ca pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena
tika-abh03t:1114_6: pubbe nivuṭṭhesu appamāṇakkhandhesu ñātesu nibbānajānane na tena payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-abh03t:1114_7: Yathā hi cetopariyañāṇaṃ cittaṃ vibhāventameva cittārammaṇajānanassa kāmāvacarassa
tika-abh03t:1114_8: paccayo hoti, evamidampi appamāṇakkhandhe vibhāventameva tadārammaṇajānanassa kāmāvacarassa
tika-abh03t:1114_9: paccayo hotīti. Diṭṭhanibbānoyeva ca pubbe nivuṭṭhe appamāṇakkhandhe anussarati,
tika-abh03t:1114_10: tena yathādiṭṭhameva nibbānaṃ tesaṃ khandhānaṃ ārammaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na pana pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena
tika-abh03t:1114_11: tadārammaṇavibhāvanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Vibhūtameva hi taṃ tassāti. Evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇepi
tika-abh03t:1114_12: yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, tasmā nibbānaṃ na kassaci rūpāvacarassa ārammaṇanti “catunnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1117_0: 3. Dhuranti dhuraggāhaṃ. Jeṭṭhakanti seṭṭhaṃ. Chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānanti
tika-abh03t:1117_1: ettha purimachandassa samānarūpena tadanantaraṃ niddiṭṭhena taṃsambandhena chandasaddeneva
tika-abh03t:1117_3: sampayuttakāna”nti avatvā “chandasampayuttakāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo itaresupi.
tika-abh03t:1118_0: Garukāracittīkāravasena vāti kusalābyākatānaṃ pavattiṃ dasseti. Aladdhaṃ laddhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1118_1: laddhaṃ avijahitabbaṃ. Yena vā vinā na bhavitabbaṃ, taṃ laddhabbaṃ, tassevattho avijahitabbanti.
tika-abh03t:1118_2: Anavaññātanti avaññātampi adosadassitāya assādanena anavaññātaṃ katvā.
tika-abh03t:1119_0: Micchattaniyatā appanāsadisā mahābalā vinā adhipatinā nuppajjantīti “ekantenevā”ti
tika-abh03t:1119_1: āha. Kammakilesāvaraṇabhūtā ca te saggāvaraṇā ca maggāvaraṇā ca paccakkhasaggānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1119_2: kāmāvacaradevānampi uppajjituṃ na arahanti, ko pana vādo rūpārūpīnanti.
tika-abh03t:1120_0: Kāmāvacarādibhedato pana tividho kiriyārammaṇādhipati lobhasahagatākusalasseva ārammaṇādhipatipaccayo
tika-abh03t:1120_1: hotīti idaṃ parasantānagatānaṃ sārammaṇadhammānaṃ “ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa
tika-abh03t:1120_2: dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti etassa abhāvato “bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassā”ti
tika-abh03t:1120_3: ettha ca ārammaṇādhipatino anuddhaṭattā adhipatipaccayatā natthīti viññāyamānepi
tika-abh03t:1120_4: “bahiddhā khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādivacanaṃ nissāya arahato kiriyadhammā
tika-abh03t:1120_5: puthujjanādīhi garuṃ katvā assādiyantīti iminā adhippāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Sanidassanasappaṭighā
tika-abh03t:1120_6: khandhā”tiādīsu viya khandhasaddo rūpe eva bhavituṃ arahatīti vicāritametaṃ. Puthujjanādikāle
tika-abh03t:1120_7: vā anāgate kiriyadhamme garuṃ katvā assādanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. “Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme
tika-abh03t:1120_8: khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandatī”tiādivacanato kiriyadhammā rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1120_9: adhipatipaccayo honteva, te ca “atītārammaṇe anāgate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādivacanato
tika-abh03t:1120_10: anāgatā tebhūmakāpi adhipatipaccayo hontīti. Āvajjanakiriyasabbhāvato pana idampi vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1123_0: 4. Yathā okāsadānavisesabhāvena natthivigatā vuttā, na evaṃ anantarasamanantarā,
tika-abh03t:1123_1: ete pana cittaniyāmahetuvisesabhāvena vuttā, tasmā taṃ cittaniyāmahetuvisesabhāvaṃ
tika-abh03t:1123_2: dassento “cakkhuviññāṇadhātū”tiādinā dhātuvasena kusalādivasena ca niddesamāha. Tattha
tika-abh03t:1123_4: “purimā purimā pacchimāya pacchimāyā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Tathā ca sati dhātuvisesena
tika-abh03t:1123_5: cittavisese dassanaṃ yaṃ kātuṃ āraddho, taṃ vocchijjeyya. “Manoviññāṇadhātu manodhātuyā”ti
tika-abh03t:1123_6: idampi na sakkā vattuṃ niyāmābhāvato, “manodhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”ti ca tatheva
tika-abh03t:1123_7: na sakkā. Na hi manodhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyāyeva anantarapaccayoti niyāmo atthi,
tika-abh03t:1123_8: tasmā pākaṭā pañcaviññāṇadhātuyo ādiṃ katvā yāva dhātuvisesaniyāmo atthi, tāva nidassanena
tika-abh03t:1123_9: nayaṃ dassetvā puna niravasesadassanatthaṃ “purimā purimā kusalā”tiādimāha. Sadisakusalānanti
tika-abh03t:1123_10: vedanāya vā hetūhi vā sadisakusalānaṃ anurūpakusalānanti vā attho. Tena bhūmibhinnānampi
tika-abh03t:1123_11: paccayabhāvo vutto hoti. Bhavaṅgaggahaṇena kusalākusalamūlakesu cutipi gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1124_1: visesetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmāvacaravipāko kāmāvacarakiriyarāsissa ca anantarapaccayo
tika-abh03t:1124_2: hoti, honto ca āvajjanassevāti ayañhettha adhippāyo. Āvajjanaggahaṇeneva cettha voṭṭhabbanampi
tika-abh03t:1127_0: 6. “Aññamaññassāti añño aññassā”ti porāṇapāṭho. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayena
tika-abh03t:1127_1: paccayo”ti ettha vuttassa “aññamañña”nti imassa attho vattabbo, na avuttassa “aññamaññassā”ti
tika-abh03t:1127_2: imassa, na ca samānatthassapi saddantarassa atthe vutte saddantarassa attho vutto
tika-abh03t:1127_3: hoti, tasmā “aññamaññanti añño aññassā”ti paṭhanti. Okkantīti pañcavokārapaṭisandhiyeva
tika-abh03t:1127_4: vuccati, na itarāti iminā adhippāyenāha “pañcavokārabhave paṭisandhikkhaṇe”ti. Rūpino
tika-abh03t:1127_5: dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānanti idaṃ yadipi pubbe “okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1127_6: tathāpi na tena khaṇantare paccayabhāvo rūpīnaṃ nivāritoti tannivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1127_7: Kañci kāleti keci kismiñci kāleti vā attho. Tena rūpino dhammā keci vatthubhūtā kismiñci
tika-abh03t:1127_8: paṭisandhikāleti rūpantarānaṃ vatthussa ca kālantare arūpīnaṃ sahajātapaccayaṃ pubbe
tika-abh03t:1127_9: anivāritaṃ nivāreti. Evañca katvā “kañci kāla”nti vā “kismiñci kāle”ti vā vattabbe
tika-abh03t:1127_10: vibhattivipallāso kato. Tena hi “kañcī”ti upayogekavacanaṃ “rūpino dhammā”ti etena
tika-abh03t:1127_11: saha sambandhena paccattabahuvacanassa ādeso, “kāle”ti iminā sambandhena bhummekavacanassāti
tika-abh03t:1127_12: viññāyati. Purimena ca “eko khandho vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā nāmasahitasseva
tika-abh03t:1127_13: vatthussa “nāmassa paccayo”ti vattabbatte āpanne etena kevalasseva tathā vattabbataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1128_0: Tayo na aññamaññavasenāti labbhamānepi katthaci aññamaññasahajātapaccayabhāve vacanena
tika-abh03t:1128_1: asaṅgahitattā tassa evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catusamuṭṭhānikassa rūpassa ekadesabhūte
tika-abh03t:1128_2: kammasamuṭṭhānarūpe samudāyekadesavasena sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, niddhāraṇe vā.
tika-abh03t:1131_0: 8. Nissayapaccayaniddese “rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kismiñci kāle”ti idaṃ
tika-abh03t:1131_1: na labbhati. Yaṃ panettha labbhati “rūpino dhammā kecī”ti, tattha te eva dhamme dassetuṃ
tika-abh03t:1131_3: āruppavipāka”nti idaṃ na vattabbanti ce? Na, “tebhūmakavipākassā”ti vutte pañcavokārabhave
tika-abh03t:1134_0: 9. Te tayopi rāsayoti upanissaye tayo anekasaṅgāhakatāya rāsayoti vadati. Etasmiṃ
tika-abh03t:1134_1: pana upanissayaniddese ye purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ anantarūpanissayā honti, te tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1134_2: sabbesaṃ ekanteneva honti, na kesañci kadāci, tasmā yesu padesu anantarūpanissayo
tika-abh03t:1134_3: saṅgahito, tesu “kesañcī”ti na sakkā vattunti na vuttaṃ. Ye pana purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1134_4: ārammaṇapakatūpanissayā honti, te tesaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekantena honti, yesaṃ uppattipaṭibāhikā
tika-abh03t:1134_5: paccayā balavanto honti, tesaṃ na honti, itaresaṃ honti. Tasmā yesu padesu anantarūpanissayo
tika-abh03t:1134_6: na labbhati, tesu “kesañcī”ti vuttaṃ. Siddhānaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ yehi paccayuppannehi
tika-abh03t:1134_7: akusalādīhi bhavitabbaṃ, tesaṃ kesañcīti ayañcettha attho, na pana avisesena akusalādīsu kesañcīti.
tika-abh03t:1135_0: Purimā purimā kusalā…pe… abyākatānaṃ dhammānanti yesaṃ upanissayapaccayena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1135_1: tesaṃ abyākatānaṃ pacchimānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi rūpābyākataṃ upanissayaṃ labhatīti.
tika-abh03t:1135_2: Kathaṃ? Ārammaṇānantarūpanissaye tāva na labhati anārammaṇattā pubbāparaniyamena
tika-abh03t:1135_3: appavattito ca, pakatūpanissayañca na labhati acetanena rūpasantānena pakatassa abhāvato.
tika-abh03t:1135_4: Yathā hi arūpasantānena saddhādayo nipphāditā utubhojanādayo ca upasevitā, na evaṃ
tika-abh03t:1135_5: rūpasantānena. Yasmiñca utubījādike kammādike ca sati rūpaṃ pavattati, na taṃ tena
tika-abh03t:1135_6: pakataṃ hoti. Sacetanasseva hi uppādanupatthambhanupayogādivasena cetanaṃ pakappanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1135_7: pakaraṇaṃ, rūpañca acetananti. Yathā ca nirīhakesu paccayāyattesu dhammesu kesañci
tika-abh03t:1135_8: sārammaṇasabhāvatā hoti, kesañci na, evaṃ sappakaraṇasabhāvatā nippakaraṇasabhāvatā
tika-abh03t:1135_9: ca daṭṭhabbā. Utubījādayo pana aṅkurādīnaṃ tesu asantesu abhāvato eva paccayā, na
tika-abh03t:1135_10: pana upanissayādibhāvatoti. Purimapurimānaṃyeva panettha upanissayapaccayabhāvo bāhullavasena
tika-abh03t:1135_11: pākaṭavasena ca vutto. “Anāgate khandhe patthayamāno dānaṃ detī”tiādivacanato pana
tika-abh03t:1135_12: anāgatāpi upanissayapaccayā honti, te purimehi ārammaṇapakatūpanissayehi taṃsamānalakkhaṇatāya
tika-abh03t:1136_0: Puggalopi senāsanampīti puggalasenāsanaggahaṇavasena upanissayabhāvaṃ bhajante dhamme
tika-abh03t:1136_2: sabbe saṅgaṇhāti. “Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”tiādīsu
tika-abh03t:1136_4: bhajantāva dhammā upanissayapaccayena paccayoti imamatthaṃ dassentena puggalādīsupi
tika-abh03t:1136_5: ayaṃ nayo dassito hotīti. Paccuppannāpi ārammaṇapakatūpanissayā paccuppannatāya senāsanasamānalakkhaṇattā
tika-abh03t:1136_6: ettheva saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Vakkhati hi “paccuppannaṃ utuṃ bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1136_7: upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādetī”tiādinā senāsanassa paccuppannabhāvaṃ viya paccuppannānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1136_8: utuādīnaṃ pakatūpanissayabhāvaṃ, “paccuppannaṃ cakkhuṃ…pe… vatthuṃ paccuppanne khandhe
tika-abh03t:1136_9: garuṃ katvā assādetī”tiādinā cakkhādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayabhāvañcāti. Paccuppannānampi
tika-abh03t:1136_10: ca tādisānaṃ pubbe pakatattā pakatūpanissayatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1137: Kasiṇārammaṇādīni ārammaṇameva honti, na upanissayoti iminā adhippāyena “ekaccāyā”ti āha.
tika-abh03t:1138_0: Arūpāvacarakusalampi yasmiṃ kasiṇādimhi jhānaṃ anuppāditaṃ, tasmiṃ anuppannajhānuppādane
tika-abh03t:1138_1: sabbassa ca uppannajhānassa samāpajjane iddhividhādīnaṃ abhiññānañca upanissayoti
tika-abh03t:1138_2: imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “tebhūmakakusalo catubhūmakassapi kusalassā”ti. Vuttampi cetaṃ
tika-abh03t:1138_3: “arūpāvacaraṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya rūpāvacaraṃ jhānaṃ vipassanaṃ maggaṃ abhiññaṃ samāpattiṃ
tika-abh03t:1138_5: upanissayabhāvavasena, paṭisandhiniyāmakassa cutito purimajavanassa ca vasena upanissayo,
tika-abh03t:1138_8: tebhūmakakiriyassa ca yathāyogaṃ paccayabhāvo veditabbo. Pāḷiyampi hi pakatūpanissayo
tika-abh03t:1139_0: Iminā pana nayenāti lokuttaranibbattanaṃ upanissāya sinehuppādanalesenāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1139_1: Lokuttarā pana dhammā akusalānaṃ na kenaci paccayena paccayo hontīti na idaṃ sārato
tika-abh03t:1139_2: daṭṭhabbanti adhippāyo. Kāmāvacarāditihetukabhavaṅgaṃ kāyikasukhādi ca rūpāvacarādikusalānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1139_3: upanissayo, arūpāvacaravipāko rūpāvacarakusalassa taṃ patthetvā tannibbattakakusaluppādanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:1139_4: uppādiyamānassa, rūpāvacarakiriyassa ca pubbe nivuṭṭhādīsu arūpāvacaravipākajānanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:1139_5: jhānābhiññāyo uppādentassa arahato, catubhūmakavipākānaṃ pana taduppādakakusalūpanissayabhāvavasena
tika-abh03t:1139_6: so so vipāko upanissayo. Tenāha “tathā tebhūmakavipāko”ti. Yadipi arahattaphalattaṃ
tika-abh03t:1139_7: jhānavipassanā uppādeti anāgāmī, na pana tena taṃ kadāci diṭṭhapubbaṃ puthujjanādīhi
tika-abh03t:1139_8: sotāpattiphalādīni viya, tasmā tāni viya tesaṃ jhānādīnaṃ imassa ca aggaphalaṃ na
tika-abh03t:1139_9: jhānādīnaṃ upanissayo. Upaladdhapubbasadisameva hi anāgatampi upanissayoti. Tenāha
tika-abh03t:1140_1: catubhūmakassapi kusalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Yonisomanasikāre vattabbameva
tika-abh03t:1140_2: natthi, taṃ upanissāya rāgādiuppādane akusalassa, kusalākusalūpanissayabhāvamukhena
tika-abh03t:1140_3: catubhūmakavipākassa. Evaṃ kiriyassapi yojetabbaṃ. Tenāha “kiriyasaṅkhātopi pakatūpanissayo
tika-abh03t:1140_6: Imasmiṃ paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe āgatanayenāti idaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato
tika-abh03t:1140_7: dhammo uppajjati na upanissayapaccayā, kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpa”nti
tika-abh03t:1140_8: evamādikaṃ upanissayapaṭikkhepaṃ, anulome ca anāgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Suttantikapariyāyenāti
tika-abh03t:1142: Taṃ rukkhā upanissāya, vaḍḍhante te vanappatī”ti. –
tika-abh03t:1146_0: 10. Nayadassanavasena yāni vinā ārammaṇapurejātena na vattanti, tesaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1146_1: ārammaṇapurejātadassanena manodvārepi yaṃ yadārammaṇapurejātena vattati, tassa tadālambitaṃ
tika-abh03t:1146_2: sabbampi rūparūpaṃ ārammaṇapurejātanti dassitameva hoti, sarūpena pana adassitattā
tika-abh03t:1146_3: “sāvasesavasena desanā katā”ti āha. Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmayato iddhividhābhiññāya
tika-abh03t:1146_4: ca aṭṭhārasasu yaṃkiñci ārammaṇapurejātaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1147_0: Tadārammaṇabhāvinoti ettha paṭisandhibhāvino vatthupurejātābhāvena itarassapi abhāvā
tika-abh03t:1147_1: aggahaṇaṃ. Bhavaṅgabhāvino pana gahaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ na vā kātabbaṃ paṭisandhiyā viya
tika-abh03t:1150: 11. Tassevāti idaṃ kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākānaṃ niravasesadassitapurejātadassanavasena vuttaṃ, rūpāvacaravipāko pana āhārasamuṭṭhānassa na hotīti.
tika-abh03t:1156_1: āha. Satipi hi vipākadhammadhammatte na cetanāvajjā evaṃsabhāvāti. Attano phalaṃ
tika-abh03t:1156_2: uppādetuṃ samatthenāti kammassa samatthatā tassa kammapaccayabhāvo vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1157: Pañcavokāreyeva, na aññatthāti etena kāmāvacaracetanā ekavokāre rūpampi na janetīti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1160: 14. Vipākapaccayaniddese yesaṃ ekantena vipāko vipākapaccayo hoti, tesaṃ vasena nayadassanaṃ kataṃ. Na hi āruppe bhūmidvayavipāko rūpassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh03t:1163: 15. Kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitovāti asitapītādivatthūhi saha ajjhoharitovāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pātabbasāyitabbānipi hi sabhāvavasena kabaḷāyeva hontīti.
tika-abh03t:1164_0: Sesatisantatisamuṭṭhānassa anupālakova hutvāti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānassa āhārapaccayabhāvo
tika-abh03t:1164_1: vicāretvā gahetabbo. Na hi cittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro nocittasamuṭṭhāno tadubhayañca
tika-abh03t:1164_2: cittasamuṭṭhānakāyassa āhārapaccayo vutto, tividhopi pana so nocittasamuṭṭhānakāyassa vuttoti.
tika-abh03t:1167: 16. Arūpajīvitindriyampi saṅgahitanti missakattā jīvitindriyaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ vajjitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1168_0: Avinibbhuttadhammānanti ettha ayaṃ adhippāyo – rūpārūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinibbhuttavohāro
tika-abh03t:1168_1: natthīti arūpānaṃ indriyapaccayabhūtāni paccayantarāpekkhāni cakkhādīni attano vijjamānakkhaṇe
tika-abh03t:1168_2: avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharantānipi indriyapaccayā siyuṃ. Yo pana
tika-abh03t:1168_3: nirapekkho indriyapaccayo avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ hoti, so attano vijjamānakkhaṇe tesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1168_4: indriyapaccayataṃ apharanto nāma natthi. Yadi ca itthindriyapurisindriyāni indriyapaccayo
tika-abh03t:1168_5: liṅgādīnaṃ siyuṃ, avinibbhuttānaṃ tesampi siyuṃ. Na hi rūpaṃ rūpassa, arūpaṃ vā arūpassa
tika-abh03t:1168_6: vinibbhuttassa indriyapaccayo atthīti. Sati cevaṃ itthipurisindriyehi avinibbhuttattā
tika-abh03t:1168_7: kalalādikāle ca liṅgādīni siyuṃ, yesaṃ tāni indriyapaccayataṃ phareyyuṃ, na ca pharanti.
tika-abh03t:1168_8: Tasmā na tehi tāni avinibbhuttakāni, avinibbhuttattābhāvato ca tesaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ
tika-abh03t:1168_9: na pharanti. Aññesaṃ pana yehi tāni sahajātāni, tesaṃ abījabhāvatoyeva na pharanti,
tika-abh03t:1168_10: tasmā āpannavinibbhuttabhāvānaṃ tesaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ avinibbhuttānaṃ aññesañca samānakalāpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1168_11: indriyapaccayatāya apharaṇato tāni indriyapaccayo na hontīti. Yesaṃ bījabhūtāni itthipurisindriyāni,
tika-abh03t:1168_12: tesaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ aparamatthabhāvatoti keci, te pana kalalādikālepi liṅgādīnaṃ tadanurūpānaṃ atthitaṃ icchanti.
tika-abh03t:1169_0: Jātibhūmivasena vuttesu bhedesu kusalajātiyaṃ rūpāvacarakusalameva āruppe ṭhapetabbanti
tika-abh03t:1169_1: “ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ avasesā kusalākusalā”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamalokuttaraṃ
tika-abh03t:1169_2: pana domanassayuttañca visuṃ ekā jāti bhūmi vā na hotīti āruppe alabbhamānampi na
tika-abh03t:1169_3: ṭhapitaṃ. Hetuādīsupi “tathā apariyāpannakusalahetu, tathā akusalahetū”tiādīsu esa nayo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t:1170_0: Ṭhitikkhaṇeti idaṃ rūpajīvitindriyassa sahajātapaccayattābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1170_1: Uppādakkhaṇepi pana tassa indriyapaccayatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Vakkhati hi “abyākataṃ
tika-abh03t:1170_2: dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe… asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe… indriyapaccayaṃ kammapaccayasadisa”nti.
tika-abh03t:1170_3: Na hi asaññasattānaṃ indriyapaccayā uppajjamānassa rūpassa rūpajīvitindriyato añño
tika-abh03t:1170_4: indriyapaccayo atthi, pañcavokāre pavatte ca kaṭattārūpassa. Paṭiccavārādayo ca cha
tika-abh03t:1170_5: uppādakkhaṇameva gahetvā pavattā, evañca katvā pacchājātapaccayo etesu anulomato na tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-abh03t:1173_1: somanassadomanassasaṅkhātāni jhānaṅgāni natthi, sukhadukkhasaṅkhātāni pana somanassadomanassabhūtāneva
tika-abh03t:1173_2: jhānaṅgāni, na kāyikasukhadukkhabhūtānīti imassa dassanatthaṃ somanassadomanassaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1173_3: kataṃ. Nanu ca “dvipañcaviññāṇavajjesū”ti vacaneneva kāyikasukhadukkhāni vajjitānīti
tika-abh03t:1173_6: upekkhācittekaggatāhi saddhiṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānipi vajjitānīti ettakameva viññāyati,
tika-abh03t:1173_7: na pana yāni sukhadukkhāni jhānaṅgāni honti, tesaṃ jhānaṅgabhūto sukhabhāvo dukkhabhāvo
tika-abh03t:1173_8: ca visesito, tasmā somanassadomanassabhāvavisiṭṭhoyeva sukhadukkhabhāvo sukhadukkhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1173_11: dassitaṃ hoti. Yathāvajjitā pana sukhadukkhopekkhekaggatā kasmā vajjitāti? Yattha
tika-abh03t:1173_12: jhānaṅgāni uddharīyanti cittuppādakaṇḍe, tattha ca jhānaṅganti anuddhaṭattā. Kasmā
tika-abh03t:1173_13: pana na uddhaṭāti taṃ dassetuṃ “pañcannaṃ pana viññāṇakāyāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh03t:1174_1: dasseti. “Tesu vijjamānānipi upekkhāsukhadukkhānī”ti porāṇapāṭho. Tattha upekkhāsukhadukkheheva
tika-abh03t:1174_2: taṃsamānalakkhaṇāya cittekaggatāyapi yathāvutteneva kāraṇena anuddhaṭabhāvo dassitoti
tika-abh03t:1174_3: daṭṭhabbo. Pubbe pana satta aṅgāni dassentena cattāri aṅgāni vajjitānīti tesaṃ vajjane
tika-abh03t:1174_4: kāraṇaṃ dassentena na samānalakkhaṇena lesena dassetabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathā hesāti. Yadi
tika-abh03t:1174_5: ca lesena dassetabbaṃ, yathāvuttesupi tīsu ekameva vattabbaṃ siyā, tiṇṇaṃ pana vacanena
tika-abh03t:1174_6: tato aññassa jhānaṅganti uddhaṭabhāvo āpajjati, yathāvuttakāraṇato aññena kāraṇena
tika-abh03t:1174_8: paṭhanti. Ye pana “jhānaṅgabhūtehi somanassādīhi sukhadukkhena avibhūtabhāvena pākaṭatāya
tika-abh03t:1174_9: indriyakiccayuttatāya ca samānānaṃ sukhādīnaṃ jhānaṅganti anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1174_10: vattabbaṃ, na cittekaggatāyāti sā ettha na gahitā”ti vadanti, tesaṃ taṃ rucimattaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1174_11: Yadi jhānaṅgasamānānaṃ jhānaṅganti anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ, cittekaggatā
tika-abh03t:1174_12: cettha jhānaṅgabhūtāya vicikicchāyuttamanodhātuādīsu cittekaggatāya samānāti tassā
tika-abh03t:1174_13: anuddhaṭabhāve kāraṇaṃ vattabbamevāti. Sesāhetukesupi jhānaṅgaṃ uddhaṭameva uddharaṇaṭṭhāne
tika-abh03t:1177_0: 18. Paññā vitakko sammāvācākammantājīvā vīriyaṃ sati samādhi micchādiṭṭhi micchāvācākammantājīvāti
tika-abh03t:1177_1: imāni dvādasaṅgānīti ettha duvidhampi saṅkappaṃ vīriyaṃ samādhiñca vitakkavīriyasamādhivacanehi
tika-abh03t:1177_2: saṅgaṇhitvā “ayameva kho, āvuso, aṭṭhaṅgiko micchāmaggo abrahmacariyaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ
tika-abh03t:1177_4: maggaṅgavohārasiddhito tehi saha dvādasaṅgāni idha labbhamānāni ca alabbhamānāni
tika-abh03t:1177_5: ca maggaṅgavacanasāmaññena saṅgaṇhitvā vuttāni. Evañhi suttantavohāropi dassito hoti,
tika-abh03t:1177_6: evaṃ pana dassentena “maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānī”ti evaṃ uddharitvā tassa pāṭhagatassa
tika-abh03t:1177_7: maggaṅgasaddassa atthabhāvena imāni dvādasaṅgāni na dassetabbāni. Na hi pāḷiyaṃ maggaṅgasaddassa
tika-abh03t:1177_8: micchāvācākammantājīvoti attho vattabbo. Tehi sammāvācādīhi paṭipakkhā cetanādhammā
tika-abh03t:1177_9: tappaṭipakkhabhāvatoyeva “micchāmaggaṅgānī”ti sutte vuttāni, na pana maggapaccayabhāvena.
tika-abh03t:1177_10: Maggaṅgāni maggapaccayabhūtāni ca idha pāḷiyaṃ “maggaṅgānī”ti vuttāni, na ca aññaṃ
tika-abh03t:1177_11: uddharitvā aññassa attho vattabbo. Pariyāyanippariyāyamaggaṅgadassanatthaṃ pana icchantena
tika-abh03t:1177_12: pāḷigatamaggaṅgasaddapatirūpako añño maggaṅgasaddo ubhayapadattho uddharitabbo yathā
tika-abh03t:1177_13: “adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti. Idha pana “maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānī”ti
tika-abh03t:1177_14: pāḷigatoyeva maggaṅgasaddo uddhaṭo, na ca atthuddharaṇavasena dassetvā adhippetatthaniyamanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1177_15: kataṃ, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ maggaṅgasaddassa micchāvācādīnaṃ atthabhāvo mā hotūti “sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappavācākammantājīvavāyāmasatisamādhimicchādiṭṭhisaṅkappavāyāmasamādhayoti
tika-abh03t:1177_16: imāni dvādasaṅgānī”ti paṭhanti. Nanu evaṃ “ahetukacittuppādavajjesū”ti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1177_17: Na hi tesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo yathāvuttā santi, ye vajjetabbā siyunti? Na, uppattiṭṭhānaniyamanatthattā.
tika-abh03t:1180: 20. Sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvatoti etena sampayogāsaṅkāvatthubhūto upakārakabhāvo vippayuttapaccayatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t:1183_0: 21. Kusalādivasena pañcavidho atthipaccayo vutto, na nibbānaṃ. Yo hi atthibhāvābhāvena
tika-abh03t:1183_1: anupakārako atthibhāvaṃ labhitvā upakārako hoti, so atthipaccayo hoti. Nibbānañca
tika-abh03t:1183_2: nibbānārammaṇānaṃ na attano atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakaṃ hutvā atthibhāvalābhena
tika-abh03t:1183_3: upakārakaṃ hoti. Uppādādiyuttānaṃ vā natthibhāvopakārakatāviruddho upakārakabhāvo
tika-abh03t:1184_0: Sati ca yesaṃ paccayā honti, tehi ekato puretaraṃ pacchā ca uppannatte sahajātādipaccayattābhāvato
tika-abh03t:1184_1: āha “āhāro indriyañca sahajātādibhedaṃ na labhatī”ti. Tadabhāvo ca etesaṃ dhammasabhāvavasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1187_0: 22-23. Paccayalakkhaṇameva hettha nānanti etena natthivigatapaccayesu atthiavigatapaccayesu
tika-abh03t:1187_1: ca byañjanamatteyeva nānattaṃ, na attheti idaṃ yo paccayoti attho, tasmiṃ nānattaṃ
tika-abh03t:1187_2: natthi, byañjanasaṅgahite paccayalakkhaṇamatteyeva nānattanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti viññāyati.
tika-abh03t:1191_0: “Lobhadosamohā vipākapaccayāpi na honti, sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena
tika-abh03t:1191_1: paccayā hontī”tiādimapāṭho. Ettha ca lobhadosamohānaṃ paccekaṃ sattarasahi paccayehi
tika-abh03t:1191_2: paccayabhāvo vutto, sabbe hetū saha aggahetvā ekadhammassa anekapaccayabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh03t:1191_3: amohādīnaṃ visuṃ gahitattāti dosassapi sattarasahi paccayabhāvo āpajjati, tathā ca
tika-abh03t:1191_4: sati dosassapi garukaraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. “Akusalo pana ārammaṇādhipati
tika-abh03t:1191_5: nāma lobhasahagatacittuppādo vuccatī”ti etthāpi lobhadosasahagatacittuppādāti vattabbaṃ
tika-abh03t:1191_6: siyā, na pana vuttaṃ, tasmā dosassa adhipatipaccayatāpi nivāretabbā. Na ca “sesāna”nti
tika-abh03t:1191_7: vacanena adhipatipaccayo nivārito, atha kho saṅgahito purejātādīhi yathāvuttehi sesattāti
tika-abh03t:1191_8: tannivāraṇatthaṃ dosaṃ lobhamohehi saha aggahetvā visuñca aggahetvā “doso adhipatipaccayopi
tika-abh03t:1191_9: na hoti, sesānaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hotī”ti paṭhanti. Iminā nayenāti etena
tika-abh03t:1191_11: dasseti. Na hi etaṃ ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvadassananti rūpādīnaṃ pakatūpanissayabhāvo
tika-abh03t:1192_0: Catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ bhedā cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayoti bhedaṃ anāmasitvā te eva gahetvā
tika-abh03t:1192_1: āha “catūsu khandhesū”ti. Micchāvācākammantājīvā tehi ceva kammāhārapaccayehi cāti
tika-abh03t:1192_2: ekūnavīsatidhāti idamevaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Na hi micchāvācādayo micchādiṭṭhi viya
tika-abh03t:1192_3: maggapaccayā honti cetanāya maggapaccayattābhāvato. Yadi ca bhaveyya, pañhāvāre “kammapaccayā
tika-abh03t:1192_4: magge tīṇī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, tasmā micchāvācādīnaṃ maggapaccayabhāvo na vattabbo.
tika-abh03t:1192_5: Paṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanā hesā. Sesapaccayabhāvo ca cetanāya anekapaccayabhāvavacanena vuttoyevāti
tika-abh03t:1192_6: na idaṃ paṭhitabbanti na paṭhanti. “Ahirikaṃ…pe… middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ vicikicchā”tiādimapāṭho,
tika-abh03t:1192_7: vicikicchā pana adhipatipaccayo na hotīti taṃ tattha apaṭhitvā “vicikicchāissāmacchariyakukkuccāni
tika-abh03t:1193_1: honti, puna tathā hadayavatthū”ti purimapāṭho, mahābhūtāni pana vippayuttapaccayā
tika-abh03t:1193_2: na hontīti “purejātaatthiavigatavasena navadhā paccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayaṃ
tika-abh03t:1193_3: pakkhipitvā dasadhā vatthu”nti paṭhanti. Ettakamevettha apubbanti etasmiṃ purejātapaccaye
tika-abh03t:1193_6: etesaṃ apubbatā natthīti. Indriyādīsu apubbaṃ natthīti rūpajīvitindriyassapi arūpajīvitindriyato
tika-abh03t:1193_7: apubbassa paccayabhāvassa abhāvaṃ maññamānena apubbatā na vuttā. Tassa pana purejātapaccayabhāvato
tika-abh03t:1193_8: apubbatā. Kabaḷīkārāhārassa ca purejātena saddhiṃ sattadhā paccayabhāvo yojetabbo.
tika-abh03t:1194_0: Ākāroti mūlādiākāro. Atthoti tenākārena upakārakatā. “Yenākārenā”ti etassa vā atthavacanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1194_2: ca lokuttaravipākeyeva labbhatīti. Evaṃ sabbattha labbhamānālabbhamānaṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1194_3: Vippayuttaṃ apaṭhitvā “chahākārehī”ti purimapāṭho, taṃ pana paṭhitvā “sattahākārehī”ti
tika-abh03t:1194_4: paṭhanti. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo hettha vuccati, na ca yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ nissayo hoti, taṃ
tika-abh03t:1195_0: Anantarasamanantaresu yaṃ kammapaccayo hoti, taṃ na āsevanapaccayo. Yañca āsevanapaccayo
tika-abh03t:1195_1: hoti, na taṃ kammapaccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Pakatūpanissayo pakatūpanissayovā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1195_2: kammapaccayopi pana so hoti, tasmā “kammapaccayo cā”ti paṭhanti. Ayaṃ panettha attho
tika-abh03t:1195_3: – pakatūpanissayo yebhuyyena pakatūpanissayova hoti, koci panettha kammapaccayo ca
tika-abh03t:1195_4: hotīti. “Ārammaṇapurejāte panettha indriyavippayuttapaccayatā na labbhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1195_5: Tattha ārammaṇapurejātanti yadi kañci ārammaṇabhūtaṃ purejātaṃ vuttaṃ, ārammaṇabhūtassa
tika-abh03t:1195_6: vatthussa vippayuttapaccayatā labbhatīti sā na labbhatīti na vattabbā. Atha pana
tika-abh03t:1195_8: tassa nissayapaccayatā na labbhatīti “nissayindriyavippayuttapaccayatā na labbhatī”ti
tika-abh03t:1195_9: vattabbaṃ. Ito uttaripīti purejātato paratopīti attho, ito vā indriyavippayuttato
tika-abh03t:1195_10: nissayindriyavippayuttato vā uttari ārammaṇādhipatiādi ca labbhamānālabbhamānaṃ veditabbanti
tika-abh03t:1195_11: attho vattabbo. Kammādīsu pana labbhamānālabbhamānaṃ na vakkhatīti purimoyevettha attho adhippeto.
tika-abh03t:1196_0: “Kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārapaccayovā”ti purimapāṭho, atthiavigatapaccayopi pana so hoti,
tika-abh03t:1196_1: tena “kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārapaccayattaṃ avijahantova atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi
tika-abh03t:1197_0: “Yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ dasannaṃ hetuadhipatīnañcāti imesaṃ vasenā”ti
tika-abh03t:1197_1: purimapāṭho, “yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ maggavajjānaṃ navannaṃ hetuadhipatijhānānañcāti
tika-abh03t:1197_2: imesaṃ vasenā”ti pacchimapāṭho, tesu vicāretvā yutto gahetabbo.
tika-abh03t:1198_0: Samanantaraniruddhatāya ārammaṇabhāvena ca sadiso paccayabhāvo paccayasabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t:1198_1: viruddhapaccayatā paccayavisabhāgatā. “Iminā upāyenā”ti vacanato hetuādīnaṃ sahajātānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1199_0: Janakāyeva, na ajanakāti janakabhāvappadhānāyeva hutvā paccayā honti, na upatthambhakabhāvappadhānāti
tika-abh03t:1199_1: attho daṭṭhabbo. Yesaṃ hetuādayo paccayā honti, te tehi vinā neva uppajjanti, na
tika-abh03t:1199_2: ca pavattantīti tesaṃ ubhayappadhānatā vuttā. Na hi te anantarādayo viya jananeneva pavattiṃ karontīti.
tika-abh03t:1200_0: Sabbesaṃ ṭhānaṃ kāraṇabhāvo sabbaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ etesaṃ atthīti sabbaṭṭhānikā. Upanissayaṃ
tika-abh03t:1200_1: bhindantena tayopi upanissayā vattabbā, abhinditvā vā upanissayaggahaṇameva kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1200_2: Tattha bhindanaṃ pakatūpanissayassa rūpānaṃ paccayattābhāvadassanatthaṃ, ārammaṇānantarūpanissayānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1200_3: pana pubbe ārammaṇādhipatianantaraggahaṇehi gahitattā tesu ekadesena anantarūpanissayena
tika-abh03t:1200_4: itarampi dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purejātapacchājātāpi asabbaṭṭhānikā arūparūpānaññeva
tika-abh03t:1200_5: yathākkamena paccayabhāvatoti ettha purejātapaccayo anantarādīsu eva vattabbo taṃsamānagatikattā,
tika-abh03t:1200_6: na ca yugaḷabhāvo pacchājātena saha kathane kāraṇaṃ asabbaṭṭhānikadassanamattassa
tika-abh03t:1200_7: adhippetattāti taṃ tattha paṭhitvā “pacchājātopi asabbaṭṭhāniko rūpānaṃyeva paccayabhāvato”ti paṭhanti.
tika-abh03t:1204: Ekekaṃ tikadukanti ekekaṃ tikaṃ dukañcāti attho, na tikadukanti.
tika-abh03t:1205_0: Paccayā cevāti ye kusalādidhamme paṭiccāti vuttā, te paṭiccatthaṃ pharantā kusalādipaccayā
tika-abh03t:1205_1: cevāti attho. Tenevāha “te ca kho sahajātāvā”ti. Yehi pana hetādipaccayehi uppatti
tika-abh03t:1205_2: vuttā, te sahajātāpi honti asahajātāpīti. Ettha paṭiccasahajātavārehi samānatthehi
tika-abh03t:1205_3: paṭiccasahajātābhidhānehi samānatthaṃ bodhentena bhagavatā pacchimavārena purimavāro,
tika-abh03t:1205_4: purimavārena ca pacchimavāro ca bodhitoti veditabbo. Esa nayo paccayanissayavāresu
tika-abh03t:1205_5: saṃsaṭṭhasampayuttavāresu ca, evañca niruttikosallaṃ janitaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh03t:1206_0: “Te te pana pañhe uddharitvā puna kusalo hetu hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammāna”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1206_1: “Kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”nti pañhāvārapāṭhoti pamādalekhā esāti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh03t:1206_3: niyametvā tasmiṃ niyame kusalādīnaṃ hetupaccayādīhi uppattiṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1206_4: kataṃ, na tattha “ime nāma te dhammā hetādipaccayabhūtā”ti viññāyanti, tasmā tattha
tika-abh03t:1206_5: “siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evamādīhi saṅgahite
tika-abh03t:1206_7: pañhā nijjaṭā niggumbā ca katvā na vibhattā, idha pana “siyā kusalo dhammo kusalassa
tika-abh03t:1206_8: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādīhi saṅgahitā hetādipaccayabhūtā kusalādayo
tika-abh03t:1206_9: paccayuppannā ca nicchitā, na koci pucchāsaṅgahito attho anicchito nāma atthīti āha
tika-abh03t:1206_10: “sabbepi te pañhā nijjaṭā niggumbā ca katvā vibhattā”ti. Pañhā pana uddharitvā vissajjanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1206_11: sabbattha samānanti na taṃ sandhāya nijjaṭatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1207: Uppattiyā paññāpitattāti pucchāmatteneva uppattiyā ṭhapitattā pakāsitattā, nānappakārehi vā ñāpitattāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1208_0: 25-34. Parikappapucchāti vidhipucchā. Kiṃ siyāti eso vidhi kiṃ atthīti attho. Kiṃ
tika-abh03t:1208_1: siyā, atha na siyāti sampucchanaṃ vā parikappapucchāti vadati. Kimidaṃ sampucchanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1208_2: nāma? Samecca pucchanaṃ, “kiṃ suttantaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya, atha abhidhamma”nti aññena
tika-abh03t:1208_3: saha sampadhāraṇanti attho. Yo kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā, so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-abh03t:1208_4: paṭicca siyāti etasmiṃ atthe sati pacchājātavipākapaccayesupi sabbapucchānaṃ pavattito
tika-abh03t:1208_5: “yo kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya pacchājātapaccayā vipākapaccayā, so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-abh03t:1208_6: paṭicca siyā”ti ayamattho viññāyeyya, tathā ca sati pacchājātapaccayā vipākapaccayāti
tika-abh03t:1208_7: uppajjamānaṃ niddhāretvā tassa kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhavanassa pucchanato kusalānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1208_8: tehi paccayehi uppatti anuññātāti āpajjati, na ca taṃtaṃpaccayā uppajjamānānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1208_9: kusalādidhamme paṭicca bhavanamatthitā ettha pucchitā, atha kho uppatti, evañca katvā
tika-abh03t:1208_10: vissajjane “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjatī”ti uppattiyeva vissajjitāti,
tika-abh03t:1208_11: tasmā ayamattho sadosoti “atha vā”ti atthantaravacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1209_0: Tattha “kusalo dhammo uppajjeyyā”ti uppattiṃ anujānitvā “hetupaccayā siyā eta”nti
tika-abh03t:1209_1: tassā hetupaccayā bhavanapucchanaṃ, “uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti hetupaccayā uppattiṃ
tika-abh03t:1209_2: anujānitvā tassā “siyā eta”nti bhavanapucchanañca na yuttaṃ. Anuññātañhi nicchitamevāti.
tika-abh03t:1209_3: Tasmā ananujānitvā “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti
tika-abh03t:1209_4: evaṃ yathāvuttaṃ uppajjanaṃ kiṃ siyāti pucchatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uppajjeyyāti vā idampi
tika-abh03t:1209_5: sampucchanameva, kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo kiṃ uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti
tika-abh03t:1209_6: attho. Siyāti yathāpucchitasseva uppajjanassa sambhavaṃ pucchati “kiṃ evaṃ uppajjanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1209_7: siyā sambhaveyyā”ti, ayaṃ nayo siyāsaddassa pacchāyojane. Yathāṭhāneyeva pana ṭhitā
tika-abh03t:1209_8: “siyā”ti esā sāmaññapucchā, tāya pana pucchāya “idaṃ nāma pucchita”nti na viññāyatīti
tika-abh03t:1209_9: tassāyeva pucchāya visesanatthaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya
tika-abh03t:1209_10: hetupaccayā”ti pucchati, evaṃ visesitabbavisesanabhāvena dvepi pucchā ekāyeva pucchāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh03t:1210_1: Yadipi paṭigamanuppattīnaṃ purimapacchimakālatā natthi, paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ pana
tika-abh03t:1210_4: purimapacchimakālavohāro hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Gamanaṃ vā uppatti evāti gacchantassa
tika-abh03t:1210_5: paṭigamanaṃ uppajjantassa paṭiuppajjanaṃ samānakiriyā. Paṭikaraṇañhi paṭisaddatthoti.
tika-abh03t:1210_6: Tasmā “kusalaṃ dhamma”nti upayoganiddiṭṭhaṃ paccayaṃ uppajjamānaṃ paṭicca tadāyattuppattiyā
tika-abh03t:1210_7: paṭigantvāti ayamettha attho, tena paṭiccāti sahajātapaccayaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh03t:1211_0: 35-38. Tāsu pāḷiyaṃ dveyeva dassitāti hetārammaṇaduke dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ dassitattā
tika-abh03t:1211_1: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca ekamūlakādibhāvo pucchānaṃ vuttoti veditabbo, paccayānaṃ pana vasena
tika-abh03t:1211_2: sabbapaṭhamo paccayantarena avomissakattā suddhikanayo, dutiyo ārammaṇādīsu ekekassa
tika-abh03t:1211_3: hetu eva ekamūlakanti katvā ekamūlakanayo. Evaṃ hetārammaṇadukādīnaṃ adhipatiādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1211_4: mūlabhāvato dukamūlakādayo nayā veditabbā. Tevīsatimūlakanayo ca tato paraṃ mūlassa
tika-abh03t:1211_5: abhāvato “sabbamūlaka”nti pāḷiyaṃ vutto. Tattha napuṃsakaniddesena eka…pe… sabbamūlakaṃ
tika-abh03t:1211_6: paccayagamanaṃ pāḷigamanaṃ vāti viññāyati, eka…pe… sabbamūlakaṃ nayaṃ asammuyhantenāti
tika-abh03t:1211_7: upayogo vā, idha ca sabbamūlakanti ca tevīsatimūlakasseva vuttattā paccanīye vakkhati
tika-abh03t:1211_8: “yathā anulome ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṃ…pe… yāva tevīsatimūlakaṃ, evaṃ paccanīyepi vitthāretabba”nti.
tika-abh03t:1212_0: 39-40. “Ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayāti ettāvatā ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā hetupaccayapariyosāno
tika-abh03t:1212_1: ekamūlakanayo dassito”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati vinaye viya cakkabandhanavasena pāḷigati
tika-abh03t:1212_2: āpajjati, na heṭṭhimasodhanavasena. Heṭṭhimasodhanavasena ca idha abhidhamme pāḷi
tika-abh03t:1212_3: gatā, evañca katvā vissajjane “ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatipaccayā tīṇi,
tika-abh03t:1212_4: adhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇī”tiādinā heṭṭhimaṃ sodhetvāva pāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh03t:1212_5: Yo cettha “ekamūlakanayo”ti vutto, so suddhikanayova. So ca visesābhāvato ārammaṇamūlakādīsu
tika-abh03t:1212_6: na labbhati. Na hi ārammaṇādīsu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ādimhi ṭhapitepi paccayantarena sambandhābhāvena
tika-abh03t:1212_7: ādimhi vuttasuddhikato visesattho labbhati, teneva vissajjanepi ārammaṇamūlakādīsu
tika-abh03t:1212_8: suddhikanayo na dassitoti, tasmā “ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā…pe…
tika-abh03t:1212_9: ārammaṇapaccayā avigatapaccayā”ti ayaṃ heṭṭhimasodhanavasena ekasmiṃ ārammaṇapaccaye
tika-abh03t:1212_10: hetupaccayādike yojetvā vutto ekamūlakanayo daṭṭhabbo. “Ārammaṇapaccayā…pe… avigatapaccayā”ti
tika-abh03t:1212_11: vā ekamūlakesu anantarapaccayassa mūlakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā ekamūlakādīni saṃkhipitvā
tika-abh03t:1212_13: anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā aññamaññapaccayāti idaṃ mūlameva
tika-abh03t:1212_14: dassetvā ekamūlakādīnaṃ saṃkhipanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na suddhikadassanaṃ, nāpi sabbamūlake
tika-abh03t:1213_0: 41. Tato nissayādīni mūlānipi saṃkhipitvā avigatamūlakanayaṃ dassetuṃ “avigatapaccayā
tika-abh03t:1213_1: hetupaccayā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Etasmiñca suddhikassa adassanena ārammaṇamūlakādīsu visuṃ
tika-abh03t:1213_2: visuṃ suddhikanayo na labbhatīti ñāpito hoti. Na hi ādi katthaci saṃkhepantaragato
tika-abh03t:1213_3: hoti. Ādiantehi majjhimānaṃ dassanañhi saṅkhepo, ādito pabhuti katici vatvā gatidassanaṃ
tika-abh03t:1213_4: vāti. Dutiyacatukkaṃ vatvā “vigatapaccayā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā ṭhapitaṃ. Tena osānacatukkaṃ
tika-abh03t:1213_5: dasseti. Tatiyacatukkato pabhuti vā pañcakamūlāni saṃkhipitvā sabbamūlakassa avasānena niṭṭhapeti.
tika-abh03t:1214_0: Ettha ca dukamūlakādīsu yathā hetuārammaṇadukena saddhiṃ avasesā paccayā yojitā,
tika-abh03t:1214_1: hetārammaṇādhipatitikādīhi ca avasesāvasesā, evaṃ hetuadhipatidukādīhi hetuadhipatianantaratikādīhi
tika-abh03t:1214_2: ca avasesāvasesā yojetabbā siyuṃ. Yadi ca sabbesaṃ paccayānaṃ mūlabhāvena yojitattā
tika-abh03t:1214_4: natthi. Te eva hi paccayā uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttā, tathāpi ārammaṇamūlakādīsu ārammaṇādhipatidukādīnaṃ
tika-abh03t:1214_5: avasesāvasesehi, hetumūlake ca hetuadhipatianantaratikādīnaṃ avasesāvasesehi yojane
tika-abh03t:1214_6: atthi visesoti. Yasmā pana evaṃ yojiyamānesupi sukhaggahaṇaṃ na hoti, na ca yathāvuttāya
tika-abh03t:1214_7: yojanāya sabbā sā yojanā paññavatā na sakkā viññātuṃ, tasmā tathā ayojetvā anupubbeneva
tika-abh03t:1214_8: yojanā katāti daṭṭhabbā. Dhammānaṃ desanāvidhāne hi bhagavāva pamāṇanti. Gaṇanāgāthā
tika-abh03t:1214_9: ādimapāṭhe kāci viruddhā, tasmā suṭṭhu gaṇetvā gahetabbā.
tika-abh03t:1215_0: “Dvāvīsatiyā tikesu ekekaṃ tikaṃ dukānaṃ satena satena saddhiṃ yojetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh03t:1215_1: taṃ dukatikapaṭṭhāne kesañci potthakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Kesuci pana ekeko duko dvāvīsatiyā
tika-abh03t:1215_2: dvāvīsatiyā tikehi yojito, tañca gamanaṃ yuttaṃ. Na hi tattha tikassa yojanā atthi,
tika-abh03t:1215_3: atha kho tikānaṃ ekekena padena dukassāti. Tattha chasaṭṭhiyā tikapadesu ekekena
tika-abh03t:1215_4: saṃsanditvā chasaṭṭhi hetudukā, tathā sahetukadukādayo cāti dukānaṃ chasatādhikāni
tika-abh03t:1215_5: chasahassāni honti. Tesu ekekasmiṃ paṭiccavārādayo satta vārā nayā pucchā ca sabbā
tika-abh03t:1216_0: “Dukasate ekekaṃ dukaṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikehi saddhiṃ yojetvā”ti ca vuttaṃ, tampi tikadukapaṭṭhāne
tika-abh03t:1216_1: kesañci potthakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Vuttanayena pana yuttagamanesu ekeko tiko dukasatena
tika-abh03t:1216_2: yojito. Tattha hetupadaṃ pakkhipitvā vutto eko kusalattiko, tathā nahetupadaṃ…pe…
tika-abh03t:1216_3: araṇapadanti kusalattikānaṃ dve satāni honti, tathā vedanāttikādīnampīti sabbesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1216_4: catusatādhikāni cattāri sahassāni honti. Tesu ekekasmiṃ vāranayapucchā tikapaṭṭhāne
tika-abh03t:1217_0: “Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato panāti etena idaṃ dasseti – “anulomamhī”ti
tika-abh03t:1217_1: “tikādayo chanayā”ti ca avisesena vuttattā paṭiccavārādivasena sattavidhampi anulomaṃ
tika-abh03t:1217_2: saha gahetvā “cha anulomamhī”ti vuttaṃ, anulomādivasena catubbidhaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1217_3: saha gahetvā “tikañca paṭṭhānavara”nti, tathā catubbidhāni dukapaṭṭhānādīni saha
tika-abh03t:1217_4: gahetvā “dukuttama”ntiādiṃ vatvā “cha nayā sugambhīrā”ti vuttanti imamatthaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh03t:1217_5: imasmiṃ paccayānulome sattappabhede chapi ete paṭṭhānā paṭṭhānanayā catuppabhedā
tika-abh03t:1217_6: pucchāvasena uddharitabbāti. Evañhi sabbasmiṃ paṭṭhāne sabbo paccayānulomo dassito
tika-abh03t:1217_7: hotīti. Paccanīyagāthādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca dukatikapaṭṭhānādīsu visesitabbehi
tika-abh03t:1217_8: tikehi paṭṭhānaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ. Dukānaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ. Dukavisesitā
tika-abh03t:1217_9: vā tikā dukatikā, dukatikānaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ dukatikapaṭṭhānanti iminā nayena vacanattho
tika-abh03t:1217_10: veditabbo. Dukādivisesitassa cettha tikādipadassa dukādibhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Dukapaṭṭhānameva
tika-abh03t:1217_11: hi tikapadasaṃsandanavasena dukapadasaṃsandanavasena ca pavattaṃ dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1220_0: 42-44. Tevīsatimūlakanti idañcettha dumūlakaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti idaṃ dukamūlake
tika-abh03t:1220_1: pucchānaṃ mūlabhūtā tevīsati dukā sambhavantīti tassa “tevīsatimūlaka”nti nāmaṃ katvā
tika-abh03t:1220_2: yāva yattako pabhedo atthi, tāva tattakaṃ tevīsatimūlakaṃ yathānulome vitthāritaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1220_3: Evaṃ paccanīyepi vitthāretabbanti dukamūlakena tikamūlakādīsu nayaṃ dassetīti iminā
tika-abh03t:1220_4: adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā. Yadi pana yāva tevīsatimaṃ mūlaṃ yathā vitthāritanti ayamattho
tika-abh03t:1220_5: adhippeto, “yāva tevīsatimaṃ mūla”ntveva pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ siyā. Na hi “tevīsatimūlaka”nti
tika-abh03t:1220_6: etassa byañjanassa tevīsatimaṃ mūlakanti ayamattho sambhavati. Yathā anulome “ekekapadassā”tiādinā
tika-abh03t:1220_7: pana ekamūlādisabbamūlakapariyosānaṃ tattha nayadassanavasena dassitaṃ ekekassa padassa
tika-abh03t:1220_8: vitthāraṃ dassetīti sabbamūlakameva cettha “tevīsatimūlaka”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1220_9: Tañhi tevīsatiyā paccayānaṃ avasesassa paccayassa mūlabhāvato “tevīsatimūlaka”nti
tika-abh03t:1220_10: ca tato paraṃ mūlassa aññassa abhāvato “sabbamūlaka”nti ca vuccati.
tika-abh03t:1223_0: 45-48. Anulome vuttesu sabbesu ekamūlakādīsu ekekaṃ padaṃ parihāpetvāti tattha ekamūlake
tika-abh03t:1223_1: catuvīsati paccayapadāni idha ekamūlake tevīsati, eko pana paccayo mūlabhāvena ṭhito
tika-abh03t:1223_2: apubbatābhāvato agaṇanūpago. Tattha dumūlake tevīsati paccayapadāni gaṇanūpagāni,
tika-abh03t:1223_3: idha dumūlake dvāvīsatīti evaṃ parihāpetvāti attho.
tika-abh03t:1224_0: Anulomato ṭhitassa paccanīyato alabbhamānānaṃ suddhikapaccayānañca alabbhamānataṃ
tika-abh03t:1224_1: sandhāya “labbhamānapadāna”nti vuttaṃ. Na hi aññathā pucchāvasena koci paccayo alabbhamāno
tika-abh03t:1224_2: nāma atthīti. Vissajjanāvaseneva vā pavattaṃ anulomapaccanīyadesanaṃ sandhāya “labbhamānapadāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1231_0: 53. Yā kusalattike labhanti, na tāyeva vedanāttikādīsūti tikapadanānattamattena vinā
tika-abh03t:1231_1: mūlāvasānavasena sadisataṃ sandhāya “na tāyevā”ti vuttaṃ, na ca kevalaṃ tikantareyeva,
tika-abh03t:1231_2: kusalattikepi pana yā paṭiccavāre labhanti, na tāyeva paccayavārādīsūti sabbapucchāsamāharaṇaṃ
tika-abh03t:1231_3: idha kattabbameva. Dhammānulomapaccanīye ca tikapaṭṭhāne vitakkattikapītittikānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1231_4: vissajjane sabbāpetā vissajjanaṃ labhantīti ettha pītittikaggahaṇaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1231_5: Na hi tattha ekūnapaññāsa pucchā vissajjanaṃ labhantīti.
tika-abh03t:1232_0: Tena saddhinti tena sahajātapaccayabhūtena saddhinti attho daṭṭhabbo. “Yāva nirodhagamanā
tika-abh03t:1232_1: uddhaṃ pajjatī”ti ca “uppādādayo vā pāpuṇātī”ti ca vacanehi khaṇattayasamaṅgī uppajjatīti
tika-abh03t:1232_2: vuccatīti anuññātaṃ viya hoti, uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgīyeva pana evaṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh03t:1233_0: Yasmā pana eko khandho ekassātiādi idha kusalavacanena gahite khandhe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh03t:1233_1: Vedanāttikādīsu pana ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dvinnaṃ, dve paṭicca ekassapi, hetudukādīsu
tika-abh03t:1233_2: ca saṅkhārakkhandhekadesaṃ paṭicca saṅkhārakkhandhekadesassapi uppatti vuttāti saha
tika-abh03t:1233_3: uppajjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayo honto ekekassapi dukatikādibhedānañca paccayo
tika-abh03t:1234_0: “Rūpena saddhiṃ anuppattito āruppavipākañca na gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana na
tika-abh03t:1234_1: sabbasmiṃ etasmiṃ vacane gahetabbaṃ, atha kho “cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti ettheva.
tika-abh03t:1234_2: Na kevalañca āruppavipākova, atha kho lokuttaravipākakiriyābyākatampi āruppe uppajjamānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1234_3: ettha na gahetabbaṃ. “Vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”ti
tika-abh03t:1234_4: ettha pana na kiñci rūpena vinā saha vā uppajjamānaṃ sahetukaṃ vipākakiriyābyākataṃ
tika-abh03t:1234_5: aggahitaṃ nāma atthi. Tattha pana yaṃ rūpena saha uppajjati, tassa paccayuppannavisesaṃ
tika-abh03t:1235_0: “Vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti ettake vattabbe paccayabhūtassa vatthussa “kaṭattā ca
tika-abh03t:1235_1: rūpa”nti etasmiṃ sāmaññavacane paccayuppannabhāvena aggahitatāpattiṃ nivāretuṃ “khandhe
tika-abh03t:1235_2: paṭicca vatthū”ti vuttaṃ. Khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti vā vatthukhandhānaṃ
tika-abh03t:1236_0: Mahābhūtepi paṭicca uppattidassanattanti yaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ kaṭattārūpañca
tika-abh03t:1236_1: upādārūpaṃ upādārūpaggahaṇena vinā “khandhe paṭicca uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, tassa mahābhūtepi
tika-abh03t:1236_2: paṭicca uppattidassanatthanti attho. Etasmiṃ pana dassane khandhapaccayasahitāsahitañca
tika-abh03t:1236_3: sabbaṃ upādārūpaṃ ito paresu sahajātapaccayādīsu saṅgahitanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh03t:1237: Mahābhūte paṭicca upādārūpanti vuttanayenāti “mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti ettha atthato ayaṃ nayo vuttoti sandhāyāha.
tika-abh03t:1238: 54. Rūpamissakā pahāyāti yāsu pucchāsu rūpena vinā paccayuppannaṃ na labbhati, atha kho rūpamissakameva labbhati, tā pahāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t:1239_0: 57. “Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī”ti vacanatoti gabbhaseyyakapaṭisandhiyā
tika-abh03t:1239_1: pañcakkhandhasabbhāvena tāya samānalakkhaṇā sabbāpi pañcavokārapaṭisandhi okkantināmakāti
tika-abh03t:1239_2: sādheti. Paripuṇṇadhammānaṃ vissajjanaṃ ettha atthīti paripuṇṇavissajjanā.
tika-abh03t:1240_0: Ettha ca “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo…pe… mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:1240_1: kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpa”nti ettāvatā pañcavokāre sabbaṃ cittakammasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
tika-abh03t:1240_2: dassitaṃ. Avasesaṃ pana dassetuṃ “bāhira”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bāhiranti etena anindriyabaddharūpaṃ
